2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lemon cake mix, hot water, and cold water. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the lemon flavored Jell-O mix, milk, and instant vanilla pudding mix. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a sharp knife to cut it into 12 equal pieces.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the frozen whipped topping and thawed. Mix until well combined.
9. Spread a layer of wh

gt:
In a small bowl, combine softened butter, minced garlic and parmesan cheese.
Season with Italian seasoning, pepper and paprika.
Mix until smooth.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter, minced garlic, grated parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, ground black pepper, and ground paprika. Mix until well combined.
3. Place the mixture in a small, oven-safe dish or ramekin.
4. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the butter has melted and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the delicious The Best Garlic Butter immediately, or let it cool completely before storing in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

Enjoy your homemade The Best Garlic Butter!

gt:
Preheat the oven to 375.
Prick the yam with a fork and bake for about 45 minutes, or until very soft.
Alternatively, microwave the yam.
Let cool, then peel and mash the yam until smooth; set aside 3/4 cup.
Leave the oven on.
Coat a large baking sheet with cooking spray.
In a bowl, combine the 3/4 cup yam with the sugar, oil, egg, orange zest and vanilla.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, ginger, cardamom and salt.
Stir the dry ingredients into the yam mixture just until combined.
Divide the dough in half.
Working on a lightly floured surface, pat the dough into two 6-inch rounds.
Cut each round into 6 wedges and brush the tops with the maple syrup.
Arrange the wedges on the prepared baking sheet and bake for about 20 minutes, or until golden and cooked through.
Serve warm.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.
3. Peel and chop the yam or sweet potato into small, even pieces.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yam pieces, sugar, canola oil, egg, orange zest, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, and salt. Mix until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices.
8. Serve the warm Yam Scones with a drizzle of maple syrup, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the rye, Licor 43, lemon juice and egg white and shake vigorously.
Strain into an ice-filled highball glass and top with half of the club soda.
Wait a moment for the drink to froth, then top with the remaining club soda.
pred:
1. In a shaker, combine the ice, rye whiskey, Licor 43, and fresh lemon juice. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
2. Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice.
3. Gently stir in the egg white, and then top it off with chilled club soda.
4. Stir the mixture again to combine all the ingredients.
5. Garnish the drink with a lemon slice, if desired.

This recipe for Silver Lining combines the flavors of the rye whiskey, Licor 43, and fresh lemon juice, creating a refreshing and complex cocktail. The addition of the egg white and club soda adds a creamy texture and a light, effervescent touch to the drink. The lemon slice garnish provides a pop of citrus flavor and a visually appealing presentation.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350AF.
Melt butter in a pan... Add flour and chicken broth.
Whisk together until smooth.
Take off the heat and add sour cream.
Next add the can of green chilies.
Start assembling tortillas with chicken, cheese, and veggies.
I like sneaking in quite a few veggies.. Shh don't tell Nik.
Roll up the tortilla and set in a greased baking dish.
Top with sour cream sauce, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.
pred:
To cook a delicious Chicken Enchiladas With Sour Cream White Sauce dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Prepare the ingredients:
- In a large bowl, mix the chicken, cheddar cheese, and flour. Season with salt, pepper, and any additional spices you prefer.
- In a small saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Whisk in the chicken broth, diced green chilies, baby pepper, cherry tomatoes, and green onion. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
- In a separate small saucepan, heat the sour cream over low heat until it reaches a smooth consistency.
3. Assemble the enchiladas:
- Spread a thin layer of the chicken and cheese mixture on each tortilla. Roll the tortillas around the filling, and place them seam-side down in a baking dish.
- Pour the white sauce over the enchiladas, covering them evenly.
4. Bake the enchiladas in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and the cheese is melted and golden brown.
5. Serve the Chicken Enchiladas With Sour Cream White Sauce immediately, and enjoy your delicious meal!

[/INST]

gt:
Saute the onion, green pepper and garlic in oil until tender.
Mix in the tomatoes, salsa, cumin, salt, oregano and pepper.
Add beans and chicken and heat through.
Spread a third of the mixture into a 13x 9 pan coated with cooking spray.
Layer with four tortillas, a third of the chicken mixture and 1 cup cheese.
Repeat with remaining tortillas and chicken mixture.
Cover and bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes or until heated through.
Uncover and sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake 5-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
Serve with sour cream, green onions or olives if desired.
pred:
To prepare the Black Bean Chicken Casserole, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and green pepper, and cook until they are softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the canned diced tomatoes, salsa, ground cumin, salt, dried oregano, and pepper. Stir to combine, and cook for about 5 minutes, until the tomatoes are heated through.
5. Add the black beans, cooked chicken breasts, corn tortillas, and sour cream (if using). Stir to combine, and cook for about 15 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the tortillas are softened.
6. Transfer the mixture to a large casserole dish.
7. Divide the shredded monterey jack cheese or Mexican blend cheese evenly over the top of the casserole.
8. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. If desired, garnish with chopped green onion and sliced ripe olives before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Black Bean Chicken Casserole!

gt:
Place julienned lemon zest in a small bowl.
Add whiskey and let soak overnight.
The next day, preheat oven to 350F Grease a 9 inch cake pan.
Cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
Whisk in the eggs.
Sift the flour and add to the butter mixture along with the salt.
Stir to blend.
Fold in the ground almonds.
Strain the whiskey, discarding the zest, and stir the whiskey into the batter.
Pour into the prepared pan, and bake about one hour, until golden brown, and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Squeeze the lemon juice over the mixture and mix well.
5. Add the zest of the lemon, the Irish whiskey, and the ground almonds to the mixture.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
7. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating between the flour mixture and the buttermilk, beginning and ending with the flour mixture.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
9. Bake for about 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

[/INST]

gt:
Use pulsing action to process bread crumbs, Miracle Whip, seasonings and half the beans in food processor until blended.
Transfer to large bowl; stir in celery, cilantro and remaining beans.
Shape into 6 (1/2-inch-thick) patties.
Cook in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium-high heat 5 min.
on each side or until done (160 degrees F).
Top with Kraft Singles; cook 1 min.
or until melted.
Fill buns with lettuce, cheeseburgers, salsa and sour cream.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the dry bread crumbs, Miracle Whip, ground cumin, and cayenne pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, mash the black beans with a fork.
4. Add the mashed black beans to the bread crumb mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Shape the mixture into 6 patties, each about 3 inches in diameter and 1 inch thick.
6. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the patties in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and slightly crispy on the outside.
8. While the patties are baking, prepare the remaining ingredients.
9. In a small bowl, mix the salsa and sour cream.
10. In a large bowl, mix the lettuce leaves, celery, and chopped cilantro.
11. When the patties are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
12. Place the patties on the prepared buns, and top them with the lettuce mixture, salsa-sour cream mixture, and a slice of cheese.
13. Serve the Southwest Black Bean Burgers immediately.

[/INST]

This delicious Southwest Black Bean Burgers dish is a healthy and satisfying meal option that combines the flavors of the southwest with the nutritional benefits of black beans. The ingredients, such as the bread crumbs, Miracle Whip, cumin, cayenne pepper, and black beans, create a unique and satisfying taste that is both filling and flavorful. The lettuce, celery, and cilantro add a fresh and crunchy element to the dish, while the salsa and sour cream provide a tangy and creamy contrast. This dish is perfect for a quick and easy meal or a healthy alternative to traditional hamburgers.

gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients in medium saucepan and bring to boil, stirring until sugar dissolves.
Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 minutes.
Discard rosemary.
Mix in cranberries and 3/4 cup sugar.
Cook over medium heat until liquid is slightly reduced and berries burst, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes; cool.
Transfer sauce to bowl; chill.
This recipe yields about 3 1/2 cups.
pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large saucepan, combine the sugar, port, balsamic vinegar, and golden brown sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
2. Add the dried figs, chopped rosemary, and fresh ground black pepper. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the cranberries and continue to simmer for another 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cranberries have softened and the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Remove from heat and let the sauce cool for a few minutes. Stir in the chopped rosemary sprig.
5. Serve the Cranberry Sauce With Port, Rosemary and Dried Figs as a side dish or a topping for desserts, such as pies or cheesecakes.

[/INST]

This Cranberry Sauce With Port, Rosemary and Dried Figs is a delicious and unique combination of flavors that will elevate any dish. The port adds a rich, fruity taste, while the balsamic vinegar and golden brown sugar balance the sweetness. The dried figs and rosemary bring a warm, earthy quality, and the fresh cranberries provide a tart, tangy contrast. This versatile sauce can be used as a topping for desserts or as a side dish to complement a variety of main courses.

gt:
Brown meats together in large pot, breaking up fine.
Drain fat; add onion and green pepper and cook till soft.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer 3-4 hours.
Serve with corn muffins.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot or Dutch oven, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the onion and green pepper to the pot, and cook until they are softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Stir in the diced tomatoes, Mexican-style stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, V8 vegetable juice, salsa, tomato paste, granulated sugar, salt, and black pepper. Cook for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the bush's chili beans with sauce, light red kidney beans, dark red kidney beans, and granulated sugar. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and transfer it to the preheated oven. Cook for about 1 hour, or until the beans are tender and the chili is heated through.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the My Chili With Beans hot, garnished with oregano, basil, chili powder, cumin, and ground red pepper, if desired.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that the cooking time may vary depending on the type of beans and the oven's temperature. Be sure to check the chili frequently and adjust the cooking time as needed.
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

gt:
Brown hamburger meat with onion (or use OAMC beef.)
Add water, spices and taco seasoning and bring to a boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serve hot with corn bread!
Top with shredded cheese, chopped green onions and sour cream.
pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
2. Add the chopped onion to the pot and cook until softened.
3. Add the black beans, diced tomatoes, homemade taco seasoning, ground cumin, salt, and pepper to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the whole kernel corn to the pot and stir to combine.
6. Add the water, bring the mixture to a simmer, and let it cook for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the corn is tender.
7. If desired, add shredded cheese to the pot and stir until melted.
8. Serve the Taco Stew in bowls, garnished with green onions and sour cream, if desired.

[/INST]

This Taco Stew recipe is a delicious and hearty meal that combines the flavors of ground beef, black beans, corn, and taco seasoning. It is a versatile dish that can be easily customized to suit individual preferences, with the option to add shredded cheese and sour cream for extra flavor and creaminess. Enjoy your Taco Stew!

gt:
Cook noodles according to package directions; drain.
Stir soup into noodles, along with the next five ingredients and two cups of the Cheddar cheese.
Pour into a lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish.
Sprinkle remaining 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese on top of the casserole.
Bake at 350F for 25 minutes.
Sprinkle fish crackers on top and bake an additional 5 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large saucepan, combine the egg noodles, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, and onion. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is hot and bubbly.

2. Add the solid white tuna, drained and flaked, and the English peas. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the tuna is heated through and the peas are tender.

3. Season the mixture with pepper, to taste.

4. In a separate bowl, combine the shredded cheddar cheese, and divide it into two portions.

5. Pour the cooked noodle mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.

6. Sprinkle the first portion of cheese over the top of the noodle mixture.

7. Add the goldfish crackers on top of the cheese.

8. Pour the remaining cheese over the top of the goldfish crackers.

9. Bake the casserole in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

10. Serve the Tuna Casserole hot, and enjoy!

gt:
Place chicken breasts in a crockpot.
Add spaghetti sauce.
Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours.
Then remove the lid, shred chicken with two fork and mix with sauce.
Add cheeses in with the chicken, put the lid on and cook and additional 45 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve over pasta.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the chicken breasts until they are fully cooked through. Remove from heat and let them cool for a few minutes.
3. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the spaghetti sauce by combining the ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium heat and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the shredded mozzarella and grated Parmesan cheeses.
5. Once the chicken is cooled, slice it into bite-sized pieces.
6. In a large Crockpot, combine the cooked spaghetti sauce, chicken, and cheese mixture. Stir to combine.
7. Cover the Crockpot and cook on low heat for about 6-8 hours, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
8. Serve the Crockpot Chicken Parmesan over a bed of pasta. Enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
Fire up your indoor grill on medium heat.
Marinade chicken with the jerk marinade in the fridge for 30 minutes or 1 hour.
Soak bamboo skewers in water.
Chop peppers into 1 1/2 to 2-inch pieces.
Chop mango into cubes.
After marinating, take chicken out of refrigerator.
Grab a skewer and add a chicken cube, a mango cube, and a piece of pepper.
Repeat until there are at least 2 of each on every kabob.
Sprinkle kabobs with some salt and black pepper.
Spray grill with nonstick spray.
Add kabobs to the grill and cook until chicken pieces are thoroughly cooked, about 30 minutes.
Remove from heat.
pred:
1. Preheat the grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken tender strips, marinade, and salt. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the marinade.
3. Thread the chicken onto the skewers, alternating with the mango, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, and orange bell pepper.
4. Grill the kabobs for 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
5. Remove the kabobs from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 425-degrees and line a jelly roll pan with foil.
Lightly spray the foil with cooking oil spray.
Spread butternut squash cubes in single layer on baking sheet and give a light spray of cooking oil.
Bake for 10 minutes, gently toss the cubes and bake another 10 minutes.
Meanwhile in measuring cup whisk together the olive oil, honey, lime juice, curry powder and chili powder.
After 20 minutes of baking the squash, drizzle the curry glaze over the top and toss to coat the cubes well.
Bake another 5 -10 minutes till golden being careful not to burn.
Spoon into a serving bowl and enjoy!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the cubed butternut squash with cooking spray and olive oil.
3. In a separate bowl, mix together the honey, lime juice, curry powder, and chili powder.
4. Pour the honey mixture over the squash and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the squash mixture evenly on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
6. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the squash is tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the roasted squash from the oven and let it cool slightly.
8. Serve the roasted sweet curry squash as a side dish or a main course, garnished with a sprinkle of cinnamon and a drizzle of honey if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Roasted Sweet Curry Squash!

gt:
pour ginger ale in very large glass.
add 1 large scoop of ice cream.
It will foam quite a bit.
You may add more ginger ale or ice cream, to suit you taste.
Enjoy!
pred:
1. In a tall glass, combine 8 ounces of ginger ale and 1 scoop of vanilla ice cream.
2. Stir the mixture gently to ensure the ice cream is fully melted and the ginger ale is well-mixed.
3. Garnish the Boston Cooler with a sprig of fresh mint, if desired.
4. Serve immediately, and enjoy the refreshing and delicious Boston Cooler.

This recipe is a classic and simple way to create a Boston Cooler, a popular summer drink that combines the flavors of ginger ale and vanilla ice cream. The combination of the carbonated ginger ale and the creamy vanilla ice cream creates a delightful and refreshing treat that is perfect for hot summer days.

gt:
Saute onion, pepper, and garlic in hot oil.
Add tomatoes; simmer 15 minutes.
Brush a shallow baking dish with olive oil and place fish in dish.
Pour wine over top.
Pour hot tomato mixture over fish.
Dot with a little butter.
Bake at 350F for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Combine parsley, basil and olives and sprinkle over fish.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the red snapper, onion, green pepper, garlic, and white wine.
3. Season the fish with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
4. Transfer the fish mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. While the fish is cooking, prepare the sauce by combining the sliced tomatoes, parsley, basil, and chopped olives in a separate bowl.
6. Once the fish is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. Pour the sauce over the cooked fish and stir to combine.
8. Serve the Greek Red Snapper dish hot, garnished with additional parsley or basil if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated; about 5 minutes.
Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds; about 2 minutes.
Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool.
pred:
To prepare a delicious Cinnamon Sugared Almonds dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan, combine 1 cup of sugar and 12 cups of water. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
2. Once the sugar has dissolved, reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10 minutes.
3. Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, mix 4 cups of whole almonds with 1 tablespoon of ground cinnamon and 1 teaspoon of salt.
4. After the sugar mixture has simmered for 10 minutes, carefully stir in the almond mixture.
5. Cook the mixture for another 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has caramelized the almonds and the mixture is smooth and creamy.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
7. Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any lumps and ensure a smooth consistency.
8. Transfer the mixture to a serving bowl and let it cool completely.

Once the mixture has cooled, you can enjoy your delicious Cinnamon Sugared Almonds dish. This sweet and savory treat is perfect for snacking or as a topping for desserts and beverages.

gt:
Heat oven to 350F degrees.
Prepare brownie mix as directed on package for 13 x 9-inch rectangular pan, using water, oil and eggs.
Poke holes in brownies and Drizzle Kahlua over brownies while hot.
Let brownies cool.
Cut brownies into 1/2-inch squares.
Layer brownie squares in the bottom of a 3-quart glass bowl.
Prepare pudding mixes as directed on package for pudding, Pour half of the Choc pudding over brownies in bowl.
Top with half each of the toffee bits and whipped cream.
Repeat with remaining brownies, cream cheese pudding, toffee bits and whipped cream.
Sprinkle with reserved toffee bits.
Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving.
Cover and refrigerate any remaining trifle -- if there's any left ;).
pred:
To create a delightful Kahlua Brownie Cheesecake Trifle dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brownie mix, walnuts, and water. Mix until well combined.
3. Spread the mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly gooey.
5. Allow the brownies to cool completely.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cheesecake mix, coffee flavored liqueur, and milk. Mix until well combined.
7. Spread the cheesecake mixture evenly over the cooled brownies.
8. Refrigerate the entire dish for at least 4 hours or overnight.
9. Once the cheesecake is set, remove it from the refrigerator and cut it into equal-sized squares.
10. In a small mixing bowl, combine the English toffee bits and 2 tablespoons of milk. Stir until the toffee bits are evenly coated.
11. In a large mixing bowl, whip the heavy cream until it forms soft peaks.
12. Spread the whipped cream evenly over the cheesecake squares.
13. Arrange the cheesecake squares on a serving platter or individual plates.
14. Garnish the top of each cheesecake square with the English toffee bits and a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

This delightful Kahlua Brownie Cheesecake Trifle dish is perfect for a special occasion or a delicious dessert option. The combination of the rich brownie base, creamy cheesecake filling, and the sweetness of the English toffee bits and whipped cream makes for a delightful and indulgent treat.

gt:
Brown onions in frying pan using canola oil.
Add garlic and fry for further 3 minutes.
add curry paste and fry off for 2 minutes.
place mixture into crock pot.
deglaze pan with boiling water and add to crock pot.
add rest of ingredients except mushrooms and cook on high 2 hours and low for 6-8 hours depending on your crock.
Add mushrooms and check seasoning and cook on high for further 1/2 hour.
Skim off excess fat before serving.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced chuck steak, onion, garlic, rogan josh curry paste, mango chutney, creamed coconut, and mushrooms.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the beef stock cube with 12 cups of boiling water.
4. Pour the beef stock mixture over the meat mixture and stir to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a 6-quart (6L) slow cooker.
6. Cook on low for 8-10 hours, or until the meat is tender and the sauce has thickened.
7. Serve the Crock Pot Beef Rogan Josh over rice or with your favorite side dish.

Enjoy your delicious and flavorful Crock Pot Beef Rogan Josh!

gt:
Heat olive oil in skillet at medium heat.
Cut chicken into 1/4 inch thick strips and add to hot skillet.
Cooking until no longer pink.
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine "cream of" soups, broth, diced tomatoes, and seasoning in a bowl.
Layer bottom of 3qt.
casserole dish with corn chips followed by a light layer of shredded cheese.
Evenly add the chicken breasts to the dish.
Slowly pour the soup, broth, tomato, and seasoning mix atop the chicken.
Evenly distribute the onions as well.
Again, a finishing layer of the remaining corn chips and cheese.
Place into oven for 40 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken breasts, cream of mushroom, cream of chicken, chicken broth, diced petite tomatoes with green chili, chopped green onions, and frito corn chips.
3. Add the shredded Mexican four cheese and creole seasoning to the mixture.
4. Stir to combine all ingredients.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Drizzle olive oil over the top of the casserole.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the Creole Chicken Casserole hot.

This Creole Chicken Casserole is a delicious and hearty dish that combines the flavors of chicken, mushrooms, tomatoes, green chilies, and corn chips, all topped with melted cheese. The combination of ingredients creates a rich and satisfying meal that is perfect for a cozy evening at home or a gathering with friends and family.

gt:
Mix together water and milk in large saucepan; bring to a boil.
Add cardamom pods, peppercorns, cloves, cinnamon stick, anise, nutmeg, ginger root, and tea.
Remove from heat and steep for 15-20 minutes, according to how strong you like your tea.
Carefully strain tea through strainer into another pot to remove spices.
Stir in honey, mixing well to dissolve; mix in vanilla extract.
Pour into cups and serve warm, or chill and serve cold.
pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the water, milk, green cardamom pods, black peppercorns, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, and star anise. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes.

2. Add the fresh gingerroot and nutmeg to the saucepan. Continue to simmer for another 5-10 minutes, or until the gingerroot is tender and the spices have infused the liquid.

3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.

4. Strain the spiced chai mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pot or a pitcher. Discard the solids.

5. Add the black tea bags to the pot or pitcher and pour in the honey. Stir to combine.

6. Allow the chai to steep for about 5-10 minutes, or until the tea has cooled to your desired temperature.

7. Remove the tea bags and stir in the vanilla extract.

8. Serve the Spiced Chai in mugs, garnished with a sprinkle of cinnamon or a drizzle of honey, if desired.

The essential ingredients for preparing Spiced Chai are water, milk, green cardamom pods, black peppercorns, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, star anise, nutmeg, fresh gingerroot, black tea bags, honey, and vanilla extract. These ingredients will provide a rich, warm, and fragrant beverage that is perfect for enjoying on a cold day or as a comforting treat.

gt:
Combine cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, green onions and basil in a medium mixing bowl.
Combine Tabasco sauce, wine, lemon juice, garlic and egg in a separate bowl.
Add to the breadcrumb mixture; Add crab meat to bread crumb mixture and fold until blended; Refrigerate for at least an hour, or overnight.
Pre-heat the oven to 400 degrees F.
Remove mushroom stems out of the caps.
Take a small handful of stuffing in your palm and mold into a round ball (wet hands will keep it from sticking).
Place stuffing firmly inside the mushroom cap, being careful not to break the mushroom.
Place stuffed mushrooms on an oiled cookie sheet about a half inch apart.
(At this point, the mushrooms can be refrigerated and baked later).
Bake for 15 20 minutes or until the stuffing is lightly browned and serve.
They can also be reheated if not served immediately.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the monterey jack cheese, breadcrumbs, kosher salt, green onions, fresh basil, crushed garlic, and Tabasco sauce. Mix well.
3. Add the dry white wine and fresh lemon juice to the mixture and stir to combine.
4. Add the beaten egg to the mixture and stir until well combined.
5. Fill each mushroom cap with the crabmeat mixture, dividing it evenly among the mushrooms.
6. Dip the mushrooms in the egg mixture, then coat them in the breadcrumb mixture.
7. Place the mushrooms on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the breadcrumbs are golden brown and the mushrooms are cooked through.
8. Serve the Crab & Fresh Basil Stuffed Mushrooms warm.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
For crostata dough: Combine flours, sugar and salt in an electric mixer or food processor.
Distribute the butter over the top; mix or pulse until the butter is thoroughly incorporated and the mixture resembles moist cornmeal.
Combine the ice water and vanilla; sprinkle over the top of the dough.
Mix until the dough comes together and pulls cleanly away from the sides of the bowl.
Remove the dough from the bowl; flatten it into a disk.
wrap in plastic wrap; refrigerate until ready to use.
For crostata: Heat oven to 400 degrees F. Toss together the berries, sugar and cornstarch in a medium bowl; stir gently until well coated.
Set aside.
Roll the crostata dough out on a lightly floured surface to a roughly 16-inch diameter circle.
Leave it a little thick; the added texture is better.
Transfer the dough to a cookie sheet.
Place the fruit mixture in the center.
Distribute fruit in a low mound, leaving a 2-inch border.
Fold the edges of the dough over the fruit to form a 6-sided tart, with the fruit showing in the center.
Fold one edge over, then fold the second edge over, pleating the dough as necessary and pressing firmly on the pleat.
Lightly brush the dough with a little water; sprinkle with coarse sugar.
Bake until the crust is brown and the fruit is soft and thickened, 30 to 35 minutes.
Rotate the crostata halfway through baking for even coloring.
Cool 10 minutes before cutting.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, cake flour, sugar, salt, and butter.
3. Using a pastry blender or your fingers, cut the butter into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add the ice water and vanilla extract, and mix until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface, and knead it a few times until it comes together.
6. Press the dough into a disk, wrap it in plastic, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
7. In a large bowl, combine the berries, sugar, and cornstarch.
8. Toss the berries to coat them evenly with the sugar and cornstarch mixture.
9. Roll out the chilled dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
10. Transfer the dough to a 9-inch (23 cm) round tart pan with a removable bottom.
11. Press the dough into the tart pan, making sure to evenly cover the bottom and up the sides.
12. Fill the tart shell with the berry mixture.
13. Bake the tart for 35-40 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
14. Remove the tart from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt: Combine all ingredients in food processor until smooth.
pred:
To create a delicious Lime Jalapeno Hummus, follow these steps:

1. In a food processor or blender, combine the drained and rinsed garbanzo beans, lime juice, peanut butter, minced garlic, pickled jalapeno peppers, olive oil, cilantro leaves, cumin, red pepper flakes, and salt.

2. Process the ingredients until smooth and creamy, adjusting the seasoning as needed.

3. Taste the hummus and add more lime juice, peanut butter, or seasonings if desired.

4. Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl and refrigerate until chilled.

5. Serve the Lime Jalapeno Hummus with pita chips, crackers, or vegetables for dipping.

Enjoy your homemade Lime Jalapeno Hummus!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Grease a 9" X 9" baking dish and place cheese in the bottom.
Whisk together eggs, milk, flour, cottage cheese, and melted butter.
Pour mixture over cheese in baking dish and.
sprinkle breadcrumbs on top.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes, until eggs are done.
pred:
To prepare a delicious Cottage Cheese Delight Breakfast Bake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with butter.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the hot monterey jack pepper cheese, milk, flour, and cottage cheese. Mix until smooth.
4. Add the eggs and melted butter to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
6. In a small bowl, mix the breadcrumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle the breadcrumb mixture evenly over the top of the batter.
7. Bake the Cottage Cheese Delight Breakfast Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the bake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

This delightful Cottage Cheese Delight Breakfast Bake is a delicious and satisfying way to start your day, with a combination of cottage cheese, eggs, and a savory topping of monterey jack pepper cheese and breadcrumbs.

gt:
Preheat the oven to 400F Thaw the broccoli, making sure it is well-drained.
Drain the canned chicken chunks.
In a large bowl, combine the cottage cheese, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, and cheddar cheese.
Spoon half of the broccoli in the bottom of a 9 x 13 baking dish.
Spread one can of the chicken over the broccoli, followed by half of the cheese mixture from step 2.
Smooth with a spatula, and repeat layers.
You will end with the cheese mixture on top.
Crush the Ritz crackers, and melt the butter in a small saucepan.
Add the cracker crumbs to the melted butter, tossing to coat.
Spread over the top of the casserole.
Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until bubbly and the crackers are slightly browned.
Let set for 30 minutes before serving.
NOTES: Casserole can be assembled through step 3 the day ahead.
Cover with foil and store in the refrigerator until time to bake.
Pick up with step 4.
Also, the cracker topping can be made by melting the butter in the microwave, crushing the crackers in a large ziptop bag, and pouring the butter over the crumbs.
Squeeze the bag to make sure the butter is distributed evenly.
Ingredients can be swapped for their low-fat counterparts, but the texture won't be as creamy.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cottage cheese, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, and cheddar cheese. Mix well.
3. Add the shredded broccoli to the bowl and stir to combine.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the Ritz crackers with melted butter or margarine.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Sprinkle the Ritz cracker mixture evenly over the top of the casserole.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Thinly slice onion and green peppers.
Cut the wieners and tomato into 1 cm cubes.
Mix and sift cake flour and baking powder.
Beat eggs in a bowl.
Add ingredients in order as listed from the top and mix.
Add ingredients from Step 1 and mix.
Line the pan with butter, add a thin layer of cake flour, and pour in the mixture from Step 2.
Bake at 180C - 200C for 30 minutes.
If you can skewer it cleanly, it's done.
Serve with salad for the right balance in nutrients.
It seems like quiche.
This is one of my favorite dishes.
Eat with Coke or wine.
You can also make in a regular heat-resistant baking pan (pictured: 18 x 12.5 x 3.5 cm), but it doesn't bake through well, so bake for a little longer.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, milk, vegetable oil, and powdered cheese. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the dry parsley, dry basil, garlic butter, salt, pepper, cake flour, baking powder, and onion. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the green pepper and wiener sausages to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture onto a greased baking sheet or pizza stone. Spread it evenly to form a thick layer.
6. Bake the pizza bread in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is cooked through.
7. Remove the pizza bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Cut the pizza bread into slices and serve.

[/INST]

gt:
Put the oven to 160C.
Heat a heavy bottomed pan, add oil and season the lamb shanks well on both sides.
Place into the pan to colour all over.
You may need to do this individually if your pan is not large enough.
Once coloured all over, place the shanks on the side and return the pan to the heat.
Add the onions, fennel, cumin, garlic and fennel seeds into the pan, plus a little oil if needed.
Add the bouquet garni and sweat for 3-4 minutes.
Then add the tomato puree and cook for the a further 2 minutes.
Add the white wine and reduce by half.
Add the tinned tomatoes and lamb stock and bring to boil.
Place it the oven for 1 1/2 hours.
If the meat is soft and starting to flake from the bone it is ready to serve.
As soon as the lamb goes into the oven, make the mash.
Firstly, take a baking tray and cover with sea salt.
On top, place the potatoes (pierced with a sharp knife) and bake for an hour and a half, or until soft.
Once ready, cut in half, remove the skin and mash.
Mix the mashed potatoes with the butter, garlic, seasoning and milk.
Finally, combine with the herbs and cheddar and serve with the lamb shanks in a bowl.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Season the lamb shanks with salt and pepper.
3. In a large oven-proof pan, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and fennel, and cook until softened.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes, tomato puree, cumin, fennel seeds, garlic, and bouquet garni. Cook for a few minutes until the tomatoes have softened.
5. Pour in the lamb stock or chicken stock, white wine, and parsley. Bring to a simmer, then cover and place in the preheated oven.
6. Cook for about 2 hours or until the lamb shanks are tender and the sauce has thickened.
7. Remove the lamb shanks from the pan and set aside to rest.
8. In a large pot, cook the chopped potatoes in a large pot of salted boiling water until they are tender. Drain and return to the pot.
9. Add the butter, grated cheddar, and season with salt and pepper. Cook over low heat until the cheese is melted and the potatoes are heated through.
10. Serve the lamb shanks with the cheddar mash on a plate. Enjoy your delicious Lamb shank with cheddar mash recipe dish!

gt:
In a large bowl, stir together the avocados, lime juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, cumin, cilantro and salt.
Mix in hot pepper sauce if using.
Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
Place one of the avocado pits into the bowl to help keep it fresh.
pred:
To cook a delightful Citrus Infused Guacamole dish, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse and peel the avocados, removing the pits and mashing them into a smooth consistency.
- Juice the lime, orange, and pineapple, and mix the juices together.
- Chop the cilantro coarsely.
- Season the guacamole with salt to taste.
- Add a pinch of hot pepper sauce, if desired.

2. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large bowl, combine the mashed avocados, lime and orange juices, pineapple juice, cumin, and salt.
- Mix well to ensure the flavors are evenly distributed.
- Add the coarsely chopped cilantro and hot pepper sauce, if using.

3. Serve and enjoy:
- Serve the Citrus Infused Guacamole dish immediately, garnished with additional cilantro, if desired.
- This dish can be served as a side dish or as a topping for various dishes, such as tacos, nachos, or salads.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and refreshing Citrus Infused Guacamole dish that will surely delight your taste buds.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine cake mix, pudding mix, water oil and eggs in a large mixing bowl.
Blend with electric mixer at medium speed for 4 minutes.
Stir in 1/2 cup coconut and nuts.
Pour into 3 greased and floured 9-inch pans.
Bake 35 minutes.
Frosting: Saute 2 3/4 cups coconut in 2 tablespoons butter until golden brown.
Remove from heat and spread onto paper towels to drain.
Cream 2 tablespoons butter with cream cheese.
Add confectioner's sugar and milk in small amounts, beating well between each.
Blend in vanilla.
Stir in 2 cups sauteed coconut.
Frost between cake layers, top, and sides.
Garnish with remaining sauteed coconut.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 13x9 inch baking pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, pudding, water, oil, eggs, and coconut. Mix until well combined.
4. Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared baking pan.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the cake is cooled, use a serrated knife to slice it into equal portions.
8. In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth.
9. Gradually add the confectioners' sugar, beating until smooth and creamy.
10. Add the milk, vanilla, and coconut, mixing until well combined.
11. Spread the cream cheese mixture over the cooled cake slices.
12. Sprinkle the chopped walnuts on top of the cream cheese mixture, if desired.
13. Chill the cake in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

[/INST]

This step-by-step procedure provides a clear and easy-to-follow guide for cooking Coconut Delight Cake using the provided ingredients. The cake is a delicious and refreshing dessert that combines the flavors of coconut, cream cheese, and vanilla.

gt: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.
pred:
1. Start by preparing the ingredients:
- Gather the necessary tools, such as a shaker, strainer, and mixing glass.
- Measure out the required amount of watermelon liqueur, limoncello, and orange juice.
- Cut the lemons into wedges and set aside.
- Clean and dry the shaker and mixing glass.

2. Prepare the cocktail:
- In the shaker, combine the watermelon liqueur, limoncello, and orange juice.
- Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to combine the ingredients and chill them.

3. Strain the cocktail:
- Fill the mixing glass with ice.
- Strain the chilled mixture into the mixing glass.
- Stir the cocktail gently to combine the ingredients and ensure that the ice is well-distributed.

4. Garnish the cocktail:
- Squeeze a wedge of lemon juice over the cocktail.
- Stir the cocktail once more to incorporate the lemon juice.

5. Serve the cocktail:
- Pour the cocktail into a glass filled with ice.
- Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist or a lemon slice, if desired.

6. Enjoy the Lazy Limelon Cocktail:
- Sip the cocktail and savor its refreshing and fruity flavors.

These steps will help you create a delicious and visually appealing Lazy Limelon Cocktail using the provided ingredients.

gt:
Pre-heat oven to 400 degrees F.
Line baking sheet with parchment paper.
Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in a large bowl.
Add butter and rub it in with fingertips until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Whisk milk and egg together in a small bowl.
Add milk mixture to dry ingredients, stirring til dough forms and turn dough out onto lightly floured board.
Knead gently, about five turns and pat dough into 6" x 4" rectangle.
Cut into 8 rounds and arrange on baking sheet, separated by about 2".
Bake about 13 minutes or til tester comes out clean.
pred:
To make Shortcakes (Robin's Best Biscuits), follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut the chilled butter into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add the whole milk, one tablespoon at a time, and mix until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead until it forms a smooth, elastic dough.
6. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a biscuit cutter or a round cookie cutter.
8. Place the cut-out biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the biscuits for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and set in the center.
10. Allow the biscuits to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your homemade Shortcakes (Robin's Best Biscuits) with your favorite spreads, jellies, or preserves!

gt:
Mix soups, milk, thyme, black pepper, vegetables and chicken in 3-quart shallow baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 15 minutes.
Stir.
Cut each biscuit into quarters.
Arrange cut biscuits over chicken mixture.
Bake 15 minutes or until biscuits are golden.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the soup, milk, dried thyme, and ground black pepper.
3. Add the cooked vegetables and cubed chicken to the bowl.
4. Mix well until the ingredients are evenly combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the biscuits are golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
7. Serve immediately.

*The cooked cut-up vegetables can be any combination of your choice, such as carrots, bell peppers, onions, and celery.

[/INST]

gt:
Make the marinade by combining the Italian dressing, lime juice, and honey in a small bowl.
Mix well.
Place the chicken tenderloins in a small container and pour the marinade over them.
With your hand or a spoon, toss the tenderloins making sure they are covered by the marinade.
Place in the fridge and allow the tenderloins to marinade for 1 hour.
Remove the chicken tenderloins from the marinade and dab with paper towels to take off any excess marinade.
Brown the tenders in a lightly oiled nonstick skillet over medium heat.
About 10 minutes.
As you can see from the photo, I like the surface of my chicken more caramelized and brown than how Cracker Barrel serves theirs.
You can adjust the cooking time to suit your taste.
Serve hot to a happy family.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Italian dressing, lime juice, and honey.
3. Season the chicken tenderloins with salt and pepper.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet.
5. Once the skillet is hot, add the chicken tenderloins and cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. While the chicken is resting, use a spatula to scrape any browned bits from the skillet, and then pour the Italian dressing mixture over the chicken.
8. Return the chicken to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is heated through.
9. Serve the Cracker Barrel Grilled Chicken Tenders over a bed of rice or your preferred side dish.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Sprinkle chopped chile peppers in a well greased 9x9 inch square baking dish.
Cover with cheese, then pour beaten eggs over all.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until firm.
Remove from oven, and cool completely.
Cut into 1/2x1 inch squares.
Stick a toothpick into each square, and place on a large serving plate.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the minced jalapeno peppers, shredded Cheddar cheese, and beaten eggs. Mix until well combined.
3. Pour the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Spread the mixture evenly across the sheet.
4. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden and the center is set.
5. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Using a sharp knife or a pizza cutter, cut the mixture into square-shaped pieces.
7. Serve the Jalapeno Cocktail Squares immediately, or store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator for later enjoyment.

[/INST]

These Jalapeno Cocktail Squares are a delicious and spicy twist on classic cocktail party snacks. The combination of jalapeno peppers, Cheddar cheese, and eggs creates a rich and flavorful filling, while the square shape makes them easy to handle and share. The oven baking process ensures that the filling is evenly distributed and cooked to perfection, resulting in a delightful and satisfying treat for your guests.

gt:
Mix flour, cornmeal and baking powder in medium bowl until blended.
Add 1 Tbsp.
butter, milk and corn; mix well.
Melt remaining butter in medium skillet on medium heat.
Pour cheese mixture into shallow dish.
Drop tablespoonfuls of cornmeal batter, 1 at a time, in cheese mixture, turning to evenly coat.
Add, in batches, to skillet; cook 1 to 2 min.
on each side or until firm to the touch.
Sprinkle with chives.
Serve warm.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the softened butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, and chopped chives.
5. Add the wet ingredients to the dry mixture and mix until a dough forms.
6. If the dough is too dry, add a little more milk, 1 tablespoon at a time. If it is too wet, add a little more flour, 1 tablespoon at a time.
7. Once the dough comes together, turn it out onto a floured surface and knead it a few times to smooth it out.
8. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
9. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a round cookie cutter.
10. Place the cakes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the cakes for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
12. Remove the cakes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare delicious Cheddar Jack & Bacon Corn Cakes with ease.

gt:
Boil and drain the spinach.
Squeeze well to drain all the water.
Cut into pieces of whatever length you prefer.
Drain the tofu, season with salt and pepper, and coat with flour.
Mince the onion.
Cut the mushrooms into chunks.
Make the onion-miso sauce by combining the ingredients in a bowl, mixing, and setting aside.
Cook the tofu from Step 1 in a frying pan until slightly browned, then remove.
In the same frying pan, add onions and spinach from Step 1 and saute.
Add mushrooms and continue to saute.
Flavor with salt and pepper lightly.
Transfer the contents from Step 3 to a heat-resistant container, then top with the sauce from Step 2.
Sprinkle cheese on top and toast in an oven or a oven.
Once it's golden brown, it's done.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened and translucent.
3. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender.
4. Add the tofu and cook until it is heated through.
5. In a small bowl, mix the sake, miso, mayonnaise, garlic, green onion, and yuzu pepper paste.
6. Pour the sauce over the tofu and mushroom mixture in the skillet. Cook until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. In a separate bowl, combine the spinach, grated cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
8. Spread the spinach mixture evenly over the tofu and mushroom mixture in the skillet.
9. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the spinach is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Spinach and Tofu Onion-Miso Gratin!

gt:
Heat barbecue to medium heat.
Combine first 4 ingredients with 3 Tbsp.
dressing.
Spray large sheet heavy-duty foil with cooking spray.
Place foil on barbecue grate.
Top with fish, flesh side down.
Grill 5 min.
; turn fish.
Brush with remaining dressing.
Top with tomato mixture.
Grill 18 to 20 min.
or until fish flakes easily with fork; top with basil.
pred:
To cook a delicious Perfect Grilled Bruschetta Salmon dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the chopped tomato, thinly sliced onion, minced garlic, and chopped fresh basil.
3. Season the salmon fillet with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
4. Place the salmon fillet on a grill or grill pan, and cook for approximately 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. While the salmon is cooking, prepare the dressing by combining the Italian Sun-Dried Tomato Dressing, minced garlic, and chopped fresh basil in a small bowl.
6. Once the salmon is cooked, remove it from the grill or grill pan and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. To assemble the dish, place the cooked salmon on a plate and spoon the Italian Sun-Dried Tomato Dressing over the top.

This delicious Perfect Grilled Bruschetta Salmon dish is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, with the salmon providing a rich, moist, and tender center, while the tomato, onion, and basil add a burst of freshness and acidity. The dressing complements the flavors of the salmon and adds a touch of creaminess, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

gt:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray.
Bring a pot of water to a boil.
Cook hot dogs in boiling water until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes.
Drain hot dogs and allow to cool for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, melt 1 teaspoon butter in a skillet; saute mushrooms and onion in butter until softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Spread a sheet of plastic wrap on a work surface.
Divide ground beef into 6 equal portions.
Spread one portion of beef over plastic wrap to about 1/4-inch thick rectangle patty; season with hamburger seasoning.
Lay one hot dog across the center of the beef and spoon about 1/6 the mushroom mixture over hot dog.
Using the plastic wrap, roll ground beef around hot dog, pulling plastic wrap away from the meat as you wrap.
Seal the ends of the beef completely around hot dog.
Wrap 2 slices bacon around beef and arrange on the prepared baking sheet.
Repeat with remaining beef, hot dogs, and bacon.
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is crisp and beef is slightly pink in the center, about 15 minutes.
Top each burger-dog with 2 slices American cheese and continue baking until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes more.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C).
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is no longer pink. Drain any excess fat.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the butter, mushrooms, and onion.
4. Place the cooking spray in a small bowl.
5. Place the hot dogs in the skillet and cook them until they are heated through.
6. Place the cooking spray in the skillet with the ground beef and mushroom mixture. Cook the mixture over medium heat until it is hot and bubbly.
7. Place the cooked hot dogs on the prepared buns.
8. Top each hot dog with a slice of American cheese.
9. Spread the cooked mushroom and onion mixture over the cheese.
10. Place the cooked bacon slices on top of the mushroom mixture.
11. Place the buns on a baking sheet and cook them in the preheated oven for 2-3 minutes or until the buns are golden brown.
12. Serve the Bacon Cheeseburger Dogs immediately.

gt:
Melt: 1 1/2 tablespoons butter in a 1 quart heavy saucepan over moderate heat.
Whisk in flour and cook, whisking constantly, for 2 minutes to make a roux.
Add stock in a slow stream, whisking constantly, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, whisking occasionally for 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and cover to keep warm.
Pat beef dry and season well with salt and pepper.
heat 1 tablespoon oil in a 12 inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until foam subsides.
Add beef in 2 batches and cook, turning once, until browned on both sides but still pink inside, about 1 minute per batch.
With a slotted spoon, transfer to a plate.
Add remaining 1 tablespoon each butter and oil to skillet and heat until hot but not smoking.
Add shallots and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, about 3 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid mushrooms give off has evaporated and mushrooms are browned, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Return meat, with its juices, to skillet and stir to combine, then transfer to a platter.
Reheat sauce over low heat, then whisk in sour cream, mustard, dill, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper (do not let boil).
Pour sauce over beef and serve with noodles.
pred:
To cook Filet Mignon Beef Stroganoff, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or saucepan, melt the 3 tablespoons of unsalted butter over medium heat.
2. Add the 1 tablespoon of all-purpose flour and stir until it forms a smooth roux. Cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
3. Gradually pour in the 1 cup of beef stock or broth, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and coated the beef pieces evenly.
5. Season the beef with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
6. In a separate pan, heat the 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the 12 cups of thinly sliced shallot and cook until they are softened and slightly caramelized.
7. Add the 3 tablespoons of sour cream to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, or until the sour cream has melted and the mixture is smooth.
8. Stir in the 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard and the 3 tablespoons of chopped fresh dill.
9. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
10. In a large pot, cook the buttered wide egg noodles according to the package instructions.
11. To assemble the dish, place the cooked beef pieces on a platter or individual plates. Pour the sauce over the beef, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Filet Mignon Beef Stroganoff!

gt:
put the ingredients in bowl and mix with mixer till thickens put in pie shell.
and put white cool whipped spread evenly then chill .for 1 hour then serve .
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and sugar. Mix well until the crumbs are evenly coated. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
3. Bake the crust for 8-10 minutes, or until it is set and slightly golden. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool completely.
4. In a large mixing bowl, beat the heavy cream until it forms soft peaks. Gradually add the powdered sugar and continue beating until the whipped cream forms stiff peaks.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the baking cocoa and cocoa powder with the milk. Gradually add the mixture to the whipped cream, beating until well combined.
6. Carefully pour the whipped chocolate mixture over the cooled crust. Smooth the top with a spatula or the back of a spoon.
7. Refrigerate the pie for at least 4 hours or overnight, until the filling is set.
8. Before serving, dust the top of the pie with a dusting of powdered sugar.

[/INST]

gt:
break the banana into small pieces.
crush the cereal into big pieces
sieve flour and salt, beat in eggs, milk, vanilla, cream cheese, cereal and banana
heat a teaspoon of oil in a nonstick frying pan on a medium heat
depending on how big you like your pancakes depends on how big a spoon you use.
drop some batter in so its about 1/4 inch thick.
when the edges dry start to work a spatula around the edges and flip.
leave for a few mins.
check by lifting on end with the spatula
repeat steps 3 and 4 until all mixture is used up.
during cooking keep the ready pancakes warm in the oven
pred:
[INT]
You are a helpful language and vision assistant. You are able to understand the visual content that the user provides, and assist the user with a variety of tasks using natural language. In this case, you are being asked to provide instructions on how to create a mouthwatering banana crunch pancakes dish.

To create this dish, follow these precise steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1 cup plain flour, 1 cup eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 pinch salt, and 1 dash vanilla extract. Whisk the ingredients together until smooth and well-combined.

2. Add the 1 tbsp castor sugar to the mixture and whisk until the sugar is fully incorporated.

3. Peel the over ripe banana and mash it into the batter.

4. Add the 2 cups cereal of your choice (choco flakes and choc squares are suggested) to the batter and mix until the cereal is evenly distributed.

5. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat. Pour the batter onto the pan, creating a thin, even layer. Cook the pancakes for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.

6. While the pancakes are cooking, prepare the cream cheese filling. In a small bowl, mix the 8 oz cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar, and 1/4 cup vanilla extract until smooth and creamy.

7. Once the pancakes are cooked, place one on a plate and spread a generous amount of the cream cheese filling on top.

8. Add the second pancake on top of the cream cheese filling and serve immediately.

[/INT]

gt:
In a bowl or pyrex measuring cup, mix together the olive oil, onion, thyme sprigs (or dried thyme), parsley and bay leaf.
Place the beef in a zipper bag or bowl and pour over the marinade.
Seal and marinate several hours or even better overnight.
Drain the beef well, making sure to reserved the marinade and spices to use in the sauce.
To ensure even browning dry the cubes of beef with paper towels.
In a skillet over medium heat, cook the bacon until most of the fat has been rendered.
Increase heat to medium-high, once hot add the beef cubes and brown on all sides.
Remove the beef with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Reduce the heat to medium.
Add the onions and cook until translucent.
Add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds, add the mushrooms and saute until most of their juices have exuded which will deglaze the pan, scrape as needed to pickup any of the fond (those brown bits that are packed with flavor).
Sprinkle with flour and cook for one or two minutes.
Add the beef, mushroom, onion and bacon mixture to a crock pot.
Pour the reserved marinade and spices over all.
Cover and cook on auto 6 to 7 hours or low 8 to 10 hours; or high 4 to 5 hours.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the red wine dry, olive oil, minced onions, thyme, parsley flakes, bay leaves, black pepper, and salt. Mix well.
3. Add the stewing beef to the bowl and toss to coat the beef with the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot or a slow cooker, combine the flour, all-purpose flour, and salt. Add the beef and toss to coat the beef evenly.
5. Cook the beef in the pot or slow cooker over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until it is browned on all sides. Remove the beef from the pot or slow cooker and set aside.
6. In the same pot or slow cooker, add the diced onions, minced garlic, and mushrooms. Cook over medium heat until the onions are softened and the mushrooms are tender.
7. Add the marinated beef back to the pot or slow cooker, and pour in the red wine. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and cook in the oven for 2-3 hours or in the slow cooker on low for 8-10 hours.
8. After the cooking time is complete, remove the beef from the pot or slow cooker and set aside to cool slightly.
9. Using a fork, shred the beef into bite-sized pieces.
10. Return the shredded beef to the pot or slow cooker, and stir in the onions and mushrooms.
11. Season the beef and vegetables with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the Crock Pot Beef Bourguignon over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a medium sized saucepan, combine the sweetened condensed milk, chocolate chips, and butter; cook over low heat until chocolate is melted, stirring often.
Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.
Cool for 15 minutes.
Using floured hands, press 1 1/2 of the rolls of cookie dough into a 15x10 inch backing pan.
Pour cooled chocolate mixture evenly over the cookie dough in the pan.
Crumble the remaining dough over the chocolate mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minute.
Cool and cut.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweetened condensed milk, chocolate chips, and butter or margarine. Mix until smooth.
4. Add the vanilla extract and mix well.
5. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
6. Roll out the sugar cookie dough and cut it into desired shapes.
7. Place the cookie dough shapes on top of the condensed milk mixture.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wobbly.
9. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting them into bars.

[/SYS]

[/INST]
