).
pred:
To prepare a delicious and flavorful Nancy's Turkey Stuffing, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the butter, onion, and celery.
3. Add the cubed bread, and toss to coat the bread with the butter mixture.
4. Season the bread mixture with salt, pepper, and poultry seasoning.
5. Add the chopped celery leaves and stalks to the bowl, and mix well.
6. Gradually add the water, stirring to combine all the ingredients.
7. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
8. After the mixture has chilled, remove it from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for about 15 minutes.
9. Meanwhile, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
10. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
11. On the prepared baking sheet, shape the bread mixture into a loaf or a log, depending on your preference.
12. Bake the stuffing in the preheated oven for about 30-45 minutes, or until it is cooked through and golden brown.
13. Remove the stuffing from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.
14. Serve the Nancy's Turkey Stuffing hot, alongside your favorite side dishes, such as mashed potatoes, green beans, or cranberry sauce.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Nancy's Turkey Stuffing!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Grease and flour three cake pans.
Sift together flour and baking powder.
In a mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together on medium-high speed until fluffy and light, about 3-5 minutes.
Add orange zest and vanilla and beat in 15 seconds more.
With mixer at medium speed, add one egg at a time, letting each egg incorporate before adding the next.
Turn mixer to medium-low.
Add flour in three parts, alternating with the orange juice until smooth.
Don't overbeat.
Spoon equal parts of batter into the three cake pans.
Bake for about 25 minutes.
Remove cakes and cool completely.
Mix the marmalade with a little water and stir till almost pourable.
Spread half the marmalade over one of the layers.
Add the next layer on top and spread with the other half of the marmalade.
Top with the last layer.
Sprinkle the cake with powdered sugar through a sieve and serve.
pred:
To make a delicious Maria Luisa (Salvadoran Layer Cake) dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
3. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and orange zest.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the orange juice and orange marmalade, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
8. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once cooled, dust the cake with powdered sugar.

Enjoy your delicious Maria Luisa (Salvadoran Layer Cake) dish!

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
Cream softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
Add the eggs and mix well.
In a separate bowl combine flour and baking powder.
Then add the mixture to the creamed butter, sugar and eggs.
You can allow the dough to chill so that it is easier to handle.
When ready, take some cookie dough and roll into balls, about 1-1 1/2 inch balls.
Then roll the balls of dough around in the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.
Then if youre like me, take some to your neighbors in order to keep yourself from eating them all.
Seriously, I love these cookies and could eat a dozen at one time.
pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and cinnamon, mixing until a smooth dough forms.

gt:
For the olive tapenade: Spread pine nuts on a cookie sheet and toast under broiler for 13 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add olives, garlic, pesto and pine nuts to food processor.
Pulse until chopped fine.
With the food processor running, slowly add olive oil.

Cook until tomatoes are softened and browned on first side, about 4 minutes.

Press gently on sandwiches to set.
Reheat the pan over medium-high heat for about 1 minute.
Brush the outside of sandwiches lightly with remaining olive oil.
Place sandwiches in pan and weigh down with a heavy skillet or Dutch oven.
Cook sandwiches until bread is golden brown and crisp on both sides and cheese is melted, about 34 minutes per side.
Serve and enjoy!
pred:

12. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet, and bake for 5-7 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
13. Remove the sandwiches from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before slicing them into halves or quarters.

You are now ready to enjoy your Creamy Cinnamon Fruit Dip with your favorite fruits, such as strawberries, grapes, or bananas.
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

gt:
For the dough incorporate the dry ingredients on speed 1, keeping the salt and yeast from touching until the mixing begins.
Add the eggs, butter and liguids.
Mix on speed 1 for 2 minutes and on speed 2 for 8 plus minutes.
When dough is ready form into a ball and let proof until it's doubled in size.
While the dough is proofing, mix the smear ingredients until very spreadable.
And when the dough is ready, roll it out and spread on the smear.
Roll up the dough with as many rolls as possible without tearing the dough.
With the dough stretched to 18 inches cut it into 1 1/2 inch pieces.
Place the 12 pieces onto 9 by 13 inch pan.
Let the rolls double in size.
Bake at 360F for 35 to 45 minutes or until they start to turn golden brown.
While the rolls are baking.
Start mixing the icing.
Mix the room temperature butter and cream cheese until smooth.
Add the rest of the icing ingredients and mix on speed 1 for 2 minutes.
Then mix on speed 3 for 6 minutes.
Take out the gooey rolls when they start to get golden brown.
Let them rest for 5 minutes and apply the icing.
pred:
To create delicious Gooey Cinnamon Rolls, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cake flour, sugar, salt, and yeast. Mix until well combined.
2. Add the eggs, butter, and half and half, and mix until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, add more half and half, a tablespoon at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
3. Cover the bowl with a damp cloth and let the dough rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
4. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. After the dough has risen, punch it down and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
6. Roll out the dough into a large rectangle, about 1/2 inch thick.
7. Spread the softened butter evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
8. Combine the brown sugar, honey, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves in a small bowl.
9. Sprinkle the mixture evenly over the butter.
10. Roll the dough up from the long side, starting from the bottom, and pinch the edges to seal.
11. Place the roll in a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
12. Cover the dish with a damp cloth and let the rolls rise in a warm place for about 30 minutes, or until they have doubled in size.
13. Bake the rolls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 190°F (88°C).
14. Remove the rolls from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before slicing them into individual servings.

Enjoy your delicious Gooey Cinnamon Rolls!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
In a large mixing bowl cream sugar and butter til light and fluffy.
Add 4 eggs and extracts, mix well.
In another bowl combine flour and salt and mix into wet mixture.
Spread half the batter in a 9x13 pan.
On top of that spread 2 cans of pie filling.
Drop the rest of the batter by spoonfuls on top of cherries.
Bake for 30-45 mins or til done.
Mix 2 cups powdered sugar and 4 tablespoons milk, cream, half and half or water til smooth and drizzle over hot bars.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the flour, salt, and vanilla extract, mixing until the dough comes together.
5. Stir in the cherry pie filling and almond extract.
6. Transfer the dough to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the dough comes out clean.
8. Allow the dough to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into bars and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cherry Bar Dessert!

gt:
Start by melting the butter in a sauce pan.
Once the butter is melted, add the flour or flour mix.
Whisk for about 1 minute.
Add the milk and bring to a boil.
Add the cheese and stir.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over mashed potatoes or meat!
pred:
1. In a saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the flour or Pamela's Baking Mix to the melted butter, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
3. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the shredded Gouda cheese, stirring until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
6. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Gouda Gravy over your favorite dish, such as pasta, potatoes, or vegetables.

Enjoy your delicious Gouda Gravy!

gt:
Cover potatoes with cold water.
Add salt.
Bring to a boil.
Cook until potatoes are easily pierced with a paring knife.
Drain.
Place potatoes in a large mixing bowl.
Add butter, herbs, dried spices, and citrus zest.
Toss.
Add honey.
Toss.
Serve.
Variations; Lime, grapefruit, ginger, lemongrass, basil, oregano, mustard, horseradish, white wine,
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, mix the minced rosemary, parsley, honey, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, and salt.
4. Add the zested orange and lemon to the bowl, then mix well.
5. Add the melted butter to the bowl, and mix until the butter is evenly distributed.
6. Toss the potatoes in the herb mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
7. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overcrowded.
8. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
9. Remove the potatoes from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Citrus-Herb Red Potatoes!

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Cream the shortening and the sugar until light.
Add the eggs (room temperature) and the vanilla and mix well.
Combine the flour, salt, and baking soda.
Add this to the creamed mixture.
Stir in the nuts.
Drop about 2 teaspoons per each cookies onto greased cookie sheets.
Bake for about 11 minutes, or until firm.
Cool for about 3 minutes on the sheet and then remove to cool.
pred:
[TUTORIAL]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the shortening and white sugar until fluffy.
3. Add the dark brown sugar, vanilla extract, and eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix together the all-purpose flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the beer nut mix.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased or parchment-lined baking sheet.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Beer Nut Cookies!

gt:
In a saucepan bring water to a boil.
Add rice and stir.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer until tender, about 40 minutes.
Heat butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Saute onion until golden brown; add mushrooms and celery.
Cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low; stir in flour and cook, stirring constantly, until mixture is bubbly.
Gradually add broth; increase heat to medium-high and bring to a boil.
Boil, stirring, for 1 minute.
Reduce heat to low and add cooked rice, half and half, sherry, salt, white pepper, curry powder, dry mustard, paprika and chervil.
Simmer until heated through.
Serve hot and garnish with parsley.
pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the wild rice, butter, and onion. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the rice is tender and the onion is softened.
2. Add the sliced mushrooms, chopped celery, and flour. Cook, stirring constantly, until the vegetables are tender and the flour is lightly browned.
3. Gradually add the vegetable broth, half-and-half, and dry sherry, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the soup has thickened.
5. Stir in the salt, white pepper, curry powder, dry mustard, paprika, and dried chervil. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the flavors are well-blended.
6. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the Curried Wild Rice Soup hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.

[/INST]

gt:
To prepare chicken, combine the first 4 ingredients.
Rub chicken with brown sugar mixture.Heat the oil in a grill pan or nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken; cook 6 minutes on each side or until done.While the chicken is cooking, combine remaining ingredients in a bowl.
Serve with chicken.
pred:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the brown sugar, salt, cumin, and garlic powder. Season the chicken breast halves with this mixture, making sure to coat each piece evenly.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, cider vinegar, hot sauce, and salt.
4. Place the chicken breast halves in the marinade, making sure they are evenly coated. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
5. While the chicken is marinating, prepare the Plum Salsa. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped plum, cilantro, red onion, and cider vinegar. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Remove the chicken from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
7. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
8. Once the chicken is cooked through, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Serve the Grilled Chicken Breasts with Plum Salsa on the side. Enjoy!

gt:
In an oven heated at 350 F, cook corn in husk for 25 minutes.
After taking corn out of oven, let it cool for 5 minutes, and then pull husk layers down, leaving them attached to the base of the cob, which can act as a handle.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Remove the husks from the corn and remove the silk.
3. Place the corn on a baking sheet, and brush it with melted butter.
4. Season the corn with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven, and bake for about 30-40 minutes, or until the corn is tender and slightly charred.
6. Remove the corn from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
In a large skillet heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Stir in chili paste, garlic and scallions.
Stir-fry for 1 minute until smell good.
Add zucchini and mushroom, stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Add shrimp, cook for 2 to 3 minutes or until shrimp are opaque, stirring occasionally.
Finally, season to taste with salt and paprika powder.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the shrimp, mushrooms, zucchini, garlic, scallions, and olive oil. Season with salt, chili paste, and paprika powder.
3. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the shrimp is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
4. Serve the Spicy-shrimp with zucchini as a main course or as a side dish. Enjoy your delicious meal!

[/INST]

gt:
Using an electric mixer, combine all ingredients and mix well.
Shape mixture into 4 patties, each about 3/4-inch thick.
Broil or grill the patties 4-inches from the heat, turning once, until the desired doneness is reached, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Personally, I think this burger goes nicely with a bleu cheese dressing, tomatoes, pickles, lettuce, and thinly sliced onion on a big, crusty bun.
:).
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, sausage, sour cream, onions, pickles, and mustard. Mix well.
3. Shape the mixture into 4 patties, each about 3 inches in diameter and 1 inch thick.
4. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the patties for 12-15 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).
6. Serve the burgers on buns, with your choice of additional toppings, such as lettuce, tomato, or cheese.

[/SYS]

gt:
Put the warm water into a large bowl, then sprinkle in the yeast and a couple teaspoons of the sugar and stir until thoroughly dissolved.
Let proof for 10 minutes.
Add the rest of the sugar, salt, eggs, and evaporated milk.
Gradually stir in 4 cups of the flour and beat with a wooden spoon until smooth and thoroughly blended.
Beat in the shortening, then add the remaining flour, about 1/3 cup at a time, beating it in with a spoon until it becomes too stiff to stir, then working in the rest with your hands.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight in a greased bowl.
Roll the dough out onto a floured board or marble pastry surface to a thickness of 1/8 inch, then cut it into rectangles 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/2 inches with a sharp knife.
Heat the oil in a deep fryer to 360 degrees F.
Fry the beignets about 3 or 4 at a time until they are puffed out and golden brown on both sides, about 2-3 minutes per batch.
Turn them over in the oil with tongs once or twice to get them evenly brown, since they rise to the surface of the oil as soon as they begin to puff out.
Drain each batch on paper towels, place on a platter lined with several layers of paper towels, and keep warm in a 200 degree F oven until they're all done.
Serve 3 beignets per person, sprinkling heavily with powdered sugar, and serve hot with cafe au lait.
pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the warm water, sugar, and yeast. Allow the mixture to sit for about 5-10 minutes or until the yeast is foamy.
2. Add the salt, eggs, evaporated milk, and flour to the bowl, and mix until a smooth batter forms.
3. Gradually add the vegetable shortening, stirring until it is fully incorporated into the batter.
4. Heat oil in a deep fryer or a large pot to a temperature of 350-375°F (175-190°C).
5. Using a spoon or a spatula, scoop the batter onto the hot oil, creating small, round balls.
6. Fry the Beignets for about 3-4 minutes or until they are golden brown on both sides.
7. Remove the Beignets from the oil using a slotted spoon or a spider, and place them on a wire rack to drain and cool.
8. Once cooled, dust the Beignets with confectioners' sugar or roll them in the sugar for a sweet coating.

Enjoy your delicious Beignets!

gt:
Mix sugar and butter in large bowl until fluffy.
Add milk, lemon rind, vanilla and egg; mix well.
Add flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg; mix well.
Cover and chill for 30 minutes.
Heat oven to 375.
Mix the 2 Tbsp sugar with the cinnamon.
Shape dough into 1-inch balls.
Roll in the cinnamon mixture.
Place 2-inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake for 7-10 minutes, or until light brown.
Cool for 1 minute before removing from pan.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the milk, lemon zest, vanilla, and egg, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and nutmeg.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a dough forms.
6. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies!

gt:
In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook the pasta until al dente.
Drain pasta and return to the pot.
Cover to keep warm.
If you are re-constituting dried mushrooms, boil slightly in a separate pot or pan until they have absorbed enough water to make them tender.
If you are re-constituting dried mushrooms, add the fresh mushrooms to them for about 1 minute to allow them to absorb some of the wild mushroom flavor.
In a large saute pan, heat the oil over medium-high heat.
Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring, until soft, 3 to 4 minutes.
Add the shallots, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper, and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Add the cream.
Increase the heat to high, and bring to a boil.
Reduce the heat and simmer until the sauce thickens enough to coat the back of a spoon, about 5 minutes.
Add the Parmesan and adjust the seasoning, to taste.
Add the pasta, stir to coat with the sauce, and cook until the pasta is heated through, 1 minute.
Remove from the heat and divide equaly among serving bowls or plates.
Sprinkle each serving with chives and serve immediately.
pred:
To prepare the Orecchiette Pasta With Wild Mushroom Cream Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and shallots, and cook until the mushrooms are tender and the shallots are translucent. Season with salt and pepper.
3. Add the minced thyme leaves and cook for an additional minute.
4. Add the heavy cream to the skillet, stirring to combine. Bring the sauce to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked pasta, mushroom and shallot mixture, and the grated parmesan cheese. Toss to combine.
6. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish, and top with the remaining grated parmesan cheese.
7. Bake the pasta in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Orecchiette Pasta With Wild Mushroom Cream Sauce!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place raisins in a small saucepan, and cover with boiling water.
Soak for 5 minutes, then drain.
Grease and flour a 9 inch tube pan.
Sift together the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Blend in the eggs, then the applesauce.
Beat in the flour mixture.
Stir in raisins and walnuts.
Spread batter evenly into prepared tube pan.
Bake in preheated oven for 80 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of cake comes out clean.
Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely; chill.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flours, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture alternately with the applesauce, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients. Mix just until combined.
4. Fold in the raisins and chopped walnuts.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once cooled, dust the cake with powdered sugar and serve.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Add hot water to stuffing mix; stir just until moistened.
Combine turkey and broccoli in 13x9-inch baking dish.
Mix soup, milk and cheese; pour over turkey mixture.
Top with stuffing.
Bake 30 min.
or until heated through.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the hot water, STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Turkey, and the chopped leftover roasted turkey. Mix well.
3. Add the frozen broccoli florets, thawed and drained, to the bowl. Mix until the broccoli is evenly coated with the turkey mixture.
4. Pour the reduced-fat reduced-sodium condensed cream of chicken soup into the bowl. Stir to combine.
5. Add the fat-free milk and KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Cheddar Cheese to the bowl. Stir until the cheese is melted and the mixture is well combined.
6. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is hot and bubbly.
8. Let the casserole rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Heat oil in 4-qt.
Dutch oven over medium-low heat.
Add onions and bell pepper, and cook 10 minutes, stirring often, or until onions are softened.
Stir in tomatoes, celery, 1 cup water and saffron.
Cover, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, and simmer, partially covered, 10 minutes.
Stir in chickpeas, turnips, carrots, salt and pepper.
Simmer, partially covered, 20 minutes.
Add zucchini, and simmer 10 minutes more.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, if necessary.
Serve with spoonfuls of Spiced Cilantro Dressing.
pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until they are soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the green bell pepper and sauté for another 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the tomatoes, celery, and saffron threads, stirring to combine. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
4. Add the chickpeas, turnips, carrots, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine, then cover the pot and cook for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
5. Serve the Saffron-Laced Moroccan Tagine over a bed of couscous or rice, and drizzle with the Spiced Cilantro Dressing.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Spray a miniature muffin pan with cooking spray.
Insert wonton wrappers into the muffin pan so as to form small cups.
Bake 5 minutes in the preheated oven.
Allow the baked wrappers to cool.
Remove from the pan.
In a medium bowl, mix the sausage, Monterey Jack, Cheddar, black olives and Ranch-style dressing.
Fill the baked wonton wrapper cups with the mixture.
Bake the filled wonton wrappers 10 to 15 minutes, until the sausage mixture is bubbly and slightly brown.
Watch closely so the wonton wrappers do not burn.
pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
To prepare Won Ton Wrapper Appetizers, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the drained black olives, chopped onion, and Ranch-style salad dressing. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the sausage, Monterey Jack cheese, and Cheddar cheese. Mix well.
4. Place the wonton wrappers on a clean surface.
5. Divide the sausage and cheese mixture evenly among the wrappers, leaving a small border around the edges.
6. Fold the wrapper over the filling, pressing the edges to seal.
7. Place the appetizers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the appetizers in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the wrappers are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Won Ton Wrapper Appetizers warm.

Enjoy your delicious Won Ton Wrapper Appetizers!

gt:
Melt some (a tea spoon) butter, fry the egg in it's whole form, sunny side up, add salt n pepper, when the bottom firms place the slice of cheese on top for 2 -3 minutes
When the cheese starts to melt, take out the eggs and make a sandwich with the toast, place the sandwich back in the buttered pan and grill on each side till crispy.
I used multigrain brown toast.
Experiment n play :)
pred:
To cook a delicious situation toast n cheese, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the toast on a baking sheet or a silicone mat, ensuring there is enough space between them for even cooking.
3. Crack the egg into a small bowl, and whisk it gently to break up any lumps.
4. Place the egg on top of the toast, making sure it covers the entire surface.
5. Sprinkle a pinch of salt and pepper over the egg.
6. Place the baking sheet or silicone mat in the preheated oven, and bake for approximately 12-15 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your desired level of doneness.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Once the egg is cooked, use a spatula or a knife to carefully slide it under the toast, and lift it off the baking sheet.
9. Place the cooked egg on top of the cheddar cheese slice, and use a spatula or a knife to spread the melted butter evenly over the top.
10. Serve the situation toast n cheese immediately, and enjoy your delicious breakfast or snack.

Remember to use proper cooking utensils and techniques to ensure a safe and enjoyable meal.

gt:
Mix the salt into the rice, distributing evenly, then mold into barrel shapes using your hands.
If you have one, used a barrel-shaped rice mold to make this process easier.
Cut out the eyes, noses, and mouths from the nori and stick them on the cats.
Cut the ears and cheeks from a slice of ham.
Cut a slice of ham to fit the bodies, put in place.
Then cut cheese as needed to decorate the bodies (refer to image right).
Stamp out circles of cheese using the end of a straw, and attach them to the ham to make buttons.
Then, cut out ham and cheese as needed to make the scarf.
Give the other cat pockets, as shown.
[Barrel Cats]
[Barrel Animals])
[Sleeping Barrel Bears])
pred:
1. Cook the rice in a rice cooker or on the stovetop until it reaches the desired consistency.
2. In a small bowl, mix the salt and nori to create a seasoning.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the ham and cheese.
4. Assemble the bento by placing a portion of cooked rice in the rice bowl.
5. Add a layer of the seasoning mixture over the rice.
6. Place the ham and cheese mixture on top of the seasoning.
7. Optionally, you can add a garnish of sliced nori or a sprinkle of sesame seeds for extra flavor and visual appeal.

This Santa Barrel Cats Character Bento is a delicious and visually appealing meal that can be enjoyed by both children and adults. The combination of rice, ham, cheese, and nori seasoning creates a satisfying and balanced meal, while the Santa Barrel Cats character adds a fun and festive touch to the presentation.

gt:
Chop up ingredients finely
Throw everything into bowl
Mix
Simmer for an hour until ingredients are soft
Throw in blender
Jar it up and pasteurize it
Enjoy some homemade hot sauce
pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Kurt's Hot Sauce Batch #1 of 2014, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, combine the 2 Cow horn hot cayenne pepper, 2 Habanero, 17 Dragon tongue hot cayenne pepper, 1 Poblano, 13 Jalapeno, 19 Tabasco pepper, and 1 dash Coriander.
2. Add the 5 clove Garlic and 4 Tomato to the pot.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the 1/2 White onion, 1 dash Salt, 1 bunch Apple cider vinegar, 1 dash Brown sugar, and 1 Splash of PBR.
4. Pour the mixture from the bowl into the pot with the peppers and spices.
5. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
6. Allow the mixture to simmer on low heat for approximately 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. After 30 minutes, remove the pot from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Strain the hot sauce through a fine mesh strainer or cheesecloth to remove any solids.
9. Discard the solids and return the hot sauce to the pot.
10. Stir in the remaining ingredients, if any, to taste.
11. Allow the hot sauce to cool completely before storing it in an airtight container.

The required ingredients for preparing Kurt's Hot Sauce Batch #1 of 2014 are: 2 Cow horn hot cayenne pepper, 2 Habanero, 17 Dragon tongue hot cayenne pepper, 1 Poblano, 13 Jalapeno, 19 Tabasco pepper, 1 dash Coriander, 5 clove Garlic, 4 Tomato, 1/2 White onion, 1 dash Salt, 1 bunch Apple cider vinegar, 1 dash Brown sugar, and 1 Splash of PBR.

gt:
In a small saucepan, combine the sugar and water.
Bring to a simmer over moderately high heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Remove the heat and let cool to room temperature Stir in lemon juice.
In a large pitcher, combine the lemon syrup with the guava nectar, tea and tequila.
Pour the tequila into tall glasses over ice and garnish each with a lemon twist.
pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the sugar, water, and lemon juice. Heat the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dissolved.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
3. Add the guava nectar, tea, and tequila to the saucepan. Stir to combine the ingredients.
4. Place the saucepan in the refrigerator and let the mixture chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pitcher or a bowl.
6. Stir in the lemon twist.
7. Serve the Ila's Iced Tequila in chilled glasses, garnished with a lemon twist, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 375F.
Butter four 1 1/4-cup custard cups or souffle dishes.
Mix all ingredients in bowl.
Let stand until juicy, about 5 minutes.
Divide filling among prepared cups.
Bake until bubbling at edges, about 20 minutes.
Blend first 7 ingredients in large bowl.
Rub in butter with fingertips until coarse meal forms.
Mix in pecans with fingertips.
Crumble topping over hot apples.
Bake until topping is golden brown, apples are tender, and juices are bubbling thickly, about 25 minutes.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
pred:
To prepare a perfect Apple and Cranberry Crisps with Ginger-Pecan Topping, follow these key steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped apples, dried sweetened cranberries, sugar, minced crystallized ginger, all purpose flour, dark brown sugar, old-fashioned oats, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, salt, and cloves. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the chilled unsalted butter cubes to the mixture and stir until the butter is evenly distributed.
4. Transfer the mixture to a 9-inch square baking dish or a similar-sized pan.
5. Bake the crisp mixture in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until the apples are tender and the crisp is golden brown.
6. Remove the crisp from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, prepare the Ginger-Pecan Topping by combining the toasted pecans, coarsely chopped, and the ground ginger and cinnamon.
8. Once the crisp is cooled, evenly spread the Ginger-Pecan Topping over the top of the crisp.
9. Return the crisp to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and bubbly.
10. Remove the crisp from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

By following these steps, you will have a delicious and perfectly prepared Apple and Cranberry Crisps with Ginger-Pecan Topping.

gt:
Beat pudding mixes, milk and juice in medium bowl with whisk 2 min.
(Pudding will be thick.)
Spread 1-1/2 cups onto bottom of crust.
Whisk half the COOL WHIP into remaining pudding mixture; spread over pudding layer in crust.
Top with remaining COOL WHIP.
Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the JELL-O instant pudding, cold milk, and lemon juice. Whisk until smooth.
3. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23 cm) pie dish.
4. Bake the pie for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly wobbly.
5. Allow the pie to cool completely.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the graham cracker crumbs and melted butter. Press the mixture evenly onto the bottom and up the sides of the pie crust.
7. Refrigerate the pie for at least 2 hours before serving.
8. To assemble the pie, spoon a layer of COOL WHIP Whipped Topping over the pie crust.
9. Repeat the layering process with another layer of pie filling, and top with the remaining COOL WHIP Whipped Topping.
10. Chill the pie in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your Triple-Layer Lemon Pie!

gt:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add pasta and cook until tender, about 8 minutes.
Drain and rinse under cold running water to cool.
In a serving bowl, combine the mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, mustard, dill and black pepper.
Gently stir in the pasta, shrimp, celery, cucumber, tomato and shallots.
Mix in salt to taste and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and ground black pepper.
3. Add the cooked pasta, chopped fresh dill weed, and minced shallot to the bowl. Toss to combine.
4. Add the drained shrimp, chopped celery, and diced cucumber to the bowl. Toss to combine.
5. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Serve the Fresh Dill Pasta Salad chilled or at room temperature.

This delicious Fresh Dill Pasta Salad is perfect for a light summer meal or a side dish for a larger gathering. The combination of pasta, shrimp, and fresh vegetables creates a refreshing and flavorful dish that is both satisfying and easy to prepare.

gt:
French Toast : mix eggs in a bowl and add salt & pepper.
Place both slices of bread and make sure they are properly covered in egg.
In a frying pan add oil or butter and once heated place your bread and let it cook for 3 minutes on each side
Once bread is done place bread on the side.
Chicken & Mayo: in a separate bowl add onions; spring onion; 2Tbsp mayonnaise; chicken and a sprinkle of black pepper.
Mix well until chicken is fully coated with Mayo
Put chicken Mayo inside French toast and enjoy
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped red onion, mayonnaise, and minced garlic.
4. Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, making sure both sides are coated.
5. Heat a skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add a small amount of butter or oil.
6. Place the bread slices into the skillet, cooking until golden brown on both sides.
7. Place the cooked bread slices on a plate.
8. Add the chopped spring onions to the skillet and cook until softened.
9. Add the mayonnaise mixture to the skillet and stir to combine.
10. Place the cooked bread slices back into the skillet and allow the sauce to coat the bread evenly.
11. Serve immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Cook and stir ground beef, onion, and jalapeno peppers together in a skillet over medium-high heat until meat is browned and crumbly, 7 to 10 minutes.
Stir taco seasoning into meat mixture; bring to a simmer and cook until flavors combine, about 5 minutes.
Stir meat mixture, shredded lettuce, tomato, Cheddar cheese, salsa, and sour cream together in a large bowl.
Divide taco mixture among 4 bowls and top each with avocado slices.
pred:
To cook a delicious Low-Carb "Tacos" dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the diced onion and cook until softened.
4. Add the diced jalapeno peppers and cook for a few more minutes, until they are slightly softened.
5. Stir in the taco seasoning mix and cook for an additional minute.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the shredded lettuce, chopped tomato, and salsa.
7. Add the cooked ground beef mixture to the bowl with the shredded lettuce and tomato mixture, and stir to combine.
8. Place the mixture in a baking dish and top it with the shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Low-Carb "Tacos" dish immediately, garnished with sliced avocado.

This delicious Low-Carb "Tacos" dish is a satisfying and healthy meal option that can be enjoyed by those following a low-carb diet. The combination of ground beef, shredded lettuce, tomato, and cheese creates a flavorful and filling meal that can be enjoyed with friends or family.

gt:
Cut the chicken into thin strips, place in a small bowl and combine thoroughly with 2 teaspoons of the Meat Magic Cook pasta according to package directions.
Place a skillet over high heat and add the white onions, celery, bell pepper and the remaining 1 teaspoon of Meat Magic.
Cook over high heat, shaking pan and stirring occasionally (don't scrape!)
for 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 cup chicken stock, start scraping up the browned coating on the bottom of the pan and cook another 4 minutes.
Stir in the chicken mixture and cook 4 minutes.
Add the flour and stir well, cooking another 2 minutes.
Now add the mushrooms and garlic, folding in carefully so the mushrooms don't break.
Add 1/2 cup chicken stock and scrape up the pan bottom.
Cook 4 minutes and add another 1/2 cup stock, stirring and scraping.
Continue cooking another 5 minutes, then add the green onions and the remaining 1/2 cup stock.
Stir and scrape well.
Cook 5 more minutes and remove from heat.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, celery, and green bell pepper. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped mushrooms, minced garlic, and green onion. Cook for another 5 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender.
4. In a large bowl, combine the chicken, meat magic seasoning, and chicken stock. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Add the chicken mixture to the skillet with the vegetables. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
6. In a large pot, bring the defatted chicken stock to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until the pasta is al dente.
7. Drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the chicken and vegetables. Stir to combine.
8. Season the pasta mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the pasta mixture to a large baking dish.
10. Dot the top with butter and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
11. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the pasta is heated through.
12. Serve immediately and enjoy your Delicious Chicken Pasta dish.

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
(For glass loaf pan, reduce oven temp to 350F.
).
Spray a 9x5x3 inch metal loaf pan with nonstick spray.
In a large bowl, whisk flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips.
In a medium bowl, whisk milk, canola oil, and eggs.
Add milk mixture to dry ingredients; stir just to blend.
Transfer to prepared pan.
Bake bread for about 35 minutes, until tester inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 10 minutes.
Invert cornbread loaf onto rack ~ cool slightly and serve warm, or at room temperature.
pred:
[INST]To create delicious Chocolate Chip Cornbread, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, canola oil, and eggs.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish or a loaf pan.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
8. Allow the bread to cool for a few minutes before removing it from the pan and transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Chip Cornbread!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F.
Cut tops off rolls; set aside.
Make 1-inch-deep indentation in centre of bottom half of each roll.
Crumble 6 bacon slices; sprinkle into bread bowls.
Top with Velveeta.
Crack egg over Velveeta in each bowl; place on baking sheet.
Bake 20 to 25 min.
or until egg whites are completely set and yolks begin to thicken but do not become firm, adding tops of rolls, cut-sides up, to baking sheet for the last 5 min.
Sprinkle eggs with chives.
Replace tops of rolls.
Serve with remaining bacon slices.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the onion and bell pepper over medium heat until tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Velveeta cheese and chopped chives.
5. In a separate small bowl, whisk the eggs.
6. In a large bowl, combine the cooked bacon, onion, bell pepper, and the egg mixture.
7. Place the cooked dinner rolls on a baking sheet.
8. Fill each roll with the egg mixture, dividing it evenly.
9. Bake the rolls in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the egg is set and the rolls are golden brown.
10. Serve the Cheesy Egg-in-a-Bowl dish immediately.

gt:
Prepare the dry corn bread mix according to package directions.
Cool and crumble.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt the butter and saute the celery and onion until soft.
In a large bowl, combine the celery, onions, 3 cups crumbled corn bread, eggs, chicken stock, sage and salt and pepper to taste; mix well.
Place into prepared dish and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn bread mix, butter, and chopped celery.
3. Add the onion and eggs, beaten, and mix well.
4. Gradually add the chicken stock, stirring to combine.
5. Add the dried sage, salt, and pepper to taste.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Serve hot, garnished with additional sage leaves if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
PREPARATION-.
Roast 6 garlic cloves (see RecipeZaar for various recipes) , chop and set aside.
Brush and clean the mushrooms as needed and then cut the big ones in half, set aside.
In a small cup add the cornstarch and 3 tablespoons of water to form a mixture, set aside.
COOKING INSTRUCTIONS-.
In a Teflon or large pan add the onions and butter and saute for several minutes, until the onions starts to turn brown.
Then add the roasted garlic cloves and stir for another minute.
Next add the mushrooms and cook stir for about 5 minutes covered.
Add the sherry, thyme, oregano, tomato paste and toss, then cook for about 10-15 minutes covered; that is, until the mushrooms are half of their original size.
Add the bell peppers, salt to taste and cook for another minute.
Add the cornstarch & water mixture and stir until the sauce thickens and clings to the mushrooms.
Add the Mozzarella cheese on top, cover for 1 or 2 minutes until the cheese starts to melt.
Then sprinkle the paprika, lemon zest all around (do not toss).
Serve as a side dish and enjoy.
pred:
To prepare a perfect Italian Mushroom and Cheese Side Dish, follow these key steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chopped onion, butter (or margarine), roasted garlic cloves, and mushrooms.
3. In a small bowl, mix the dry sherry, thyme, oregano, tomato paste, bell peppers, cornstarch, and salt.
4. Add the cornstarch mixture to the mushroom mixture and mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with the mozzarella cheese.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Sprinkle the smoked paprika and lemon zest over the dish.
9. Serve the dish immediately.

By following these steps, you will have a delicious and satisfying Italian Mushroom and Cheese Side Dish that will complement any main course.

gt:
Flavor Step - Mix all the marinade ingredients together in a bowl and toss the pork strips in the marinade until they are well coated.
Marinate for 30 minutes at room temperature.
Heat 1-1/2 teaspoons of the oil in a wok or heavy skillet over the highest heat.
Stir-fry the red bell peppers for 2 minutes.
Remove and set aside.
Remove the meat from the marinade, saving the marinade.
Add the remaining 1-1/2 teaspoons oil and the meat to the pan and stir-fry until the strips are just cooked through and no longer pink inside, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the reserved marinade, the fish sauce, green onions or scallions, pineapple, and the peppers and cook, stirring often, until most of the liquid has evaporated and the sauce coats the pork, 1 to 2 minutes.
Spoon the meat and sauce into a bowl, sprinkle with the chopped mint, and serve.
pred:
To cook a delightful Vietnamese Tamarind Pork Stir-Fry dish, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the tamarind paste, sugar, and fish sauce to create a marinade.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the peanut oil over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and shallot, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the marinated pork to the skillet, and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the mashed anchovy paste and cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Pour the fish sauce mixture over the pork, and stir to combine.
6. Add the red bell pepper, green onions, and pineapple to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
7. Stir in the fresh mint for garnish, and cook for an additional 1 minute.
8. Serve the Tamarind Pork Stir-Fry over rice, and enjoy!

This dish is a delicious fusion of flavors, with the sweetness of the tamarind paste, the tanginess of the fish sauce, and the savory taste of the pork. The combination of ingredients creates a delightful and satisfying meal.

gt:
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Meanwhile, toss the shrimp with the cornstarch and shake off the excess.
When the oil is hot, add the shrimp and fry lightly for about 2 minutes on each side until the shrimp are just done.
Remove using a slotted spoon and let drain on a paper towel.
Add the vegetables to the hot pan and cook for about 8 minutes until tender.
While the vegetables are cooking whisk together the stock, garlic, soy sauce, fish sauce, Sriracha, toasted sesame oil, sesame seeds, honey and horseradish.
When the vegetables are tender, add the sauce and the shrimp to it.
Turn down the heat to medium low and simmer for about 6 minutes or so until the sauce thickens.
While the sauce is cooking, boil the rice noodles until just done, about 6-8 minutes or so.
Rinse immediately with cold water and toss with the sauce.
Serve hot!
pred:
1. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and bell pepper, and cook until they are tender and slightly browned.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for a few seconds, then add the sliced zucchini and cornstarch. Stir to combine and cook until the zucchini is tender and the cornstarch has cooked out, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the vegetable or chicken stock, soy sauce, fish sauce, and Sriracha to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet, and cook until they are pink and fully cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the rice noodles to the skillet, and stir to combine with the sauce. Cook for a few minutes, until the noodles are heated through and the sauce has coated them evenly.
6. Serve the Sweet Garlic Chili Shrimp and Rice Noodles over a bed of cooked rice, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Whisk eggs and add in salt and pepper to taste; set aside.
Heat olive oil on medium heat in an oven proof pan.
Add in onion and cook for 5 minutes.
Add in asparagus and cook for additional 5 minutes.
Add spinach and saute until wilted.
Add eggs and stir around until they pull away from the sides of the pan.
Place pan in oven to broil on low until the eggs are set.
Plate immediately and add additional grated parmesan if desired.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the chopped asparagus, grated parmesan cheese, and minced onion.
4. Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
5. Add the spinach to the pan and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
6. Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the pan, stirring gently to combine. Cook until the edges start to set, about 3 minutes.
7. Transfer the frittata to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly crispy.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Get the ingredients together.
Wash the fresh ingredients and peel the piece of ginger
Finely slice the cabbage and onion and put in a large bowl
Peel and grate the apple and ginger and add to the bowl.
Slice the gherkins and add too
Put the soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, olive oil and sugar in a glass.
Squeeze lime juice in to the glass too.
Mix well
Add the tuna, cut up into little chunks
Add the sauce
And the seeds
And mix well.
Try for salt and pepper (I didn't use any salt, but did add some freshly ground black pepper
Served with a baked sweet potato (baked in a hot oven for an hour), cut in two, drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with salt and black peppers.
Baked potatoes would also work fine.
Enjoy!
!
pred:
To prepare Sweet and sour red cabbage slaw, follow these steps:

1. Wash the red cabbage thoroughly and cut it into small pieces.
2. Peel the apple and cut it into small pieces as well.
3. Peel the ginger and slice it thinly.
4. Drain the tuna and pickled gherkins, reserving the brine for later use.
5. Juice the lime and set aside.
6. In a large bowl, combine the red cabbage, apple, ginger, and pickled gherkins.
7. In a small bowl, mix the lime juice, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, soft brown sugar, and olive oil.
8. Pour the sauce mixture over the cabbage mixture and toss to coat evenly.
9. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
10. Serve the Sweet and sour red cabbage slaw as a side dish or a salad, garnished with additional pickled gherkins if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Sweet and sour red cabbage slaw!

gt:
Mix crumbs, marshmallows and walnuts in large bowl; set aside.
Combine chocolate, evaporated milk, corn syrup and salt in large saucepan.
Cook on low heat until chocolate is completely melted, stirring frequently.
Increase heat to medium.
Bring to full rolling boil, stirring constantly.
Boil 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add margarine and vanilla; stir until margarine is completely melted.
Add to crumb mixture; mix well.
Spread into greased 9-inch square pan.
Refrigerate 3 hours or until set.
Cut into 24 bars.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed graham crackers, chopped walnuts, and melted margarine or butter. Mix well.
3. Add the broken chocolate, evaporated milk, light corn syrup, and salt. Mix until well combined.
4. Press the mixture evenly into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly gooey.
6. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into bars and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
You are a helpful language and vision assistant. You are able to understand the visual content that the user provides, and assist the user with a variety of tasks using natural language.

Provide a cooking guide for preparing a delicious chicken stir-fry and list the required ingredients as follows: 1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast,1/2 cup vegetable oil,1/4 cup soy sauce,1/4 cup water,1/4 cup brown sugar,1/4 cup cornstarch,1/4 cup chicken broth,1/4 cup minced garlic,1/4 cup minced ginger,1/4 cup minced onion,1/4 cup red bell pepper,1/4 cup green bell pepper,1/4 cup carrots,1/4 cup broccoli,1/4 cup snow peas,1/4 cup red cabbage,1/4 cup green cabbage,1/4 cup mushrooms,1/4 cup red onion,1/4 cup green onion,1/4 cup cashews,1/4 cup almonds,1/4 cup pine nuts,1/4 cup sesame seeds,1/4 cup cilantro,1/4 cup green onions,1/4 cup soy sauce,1/4 cup water,1/4 cup brown sugar,1/4 cup cornstarch,1/4 cup chicken broth,1/4 cup minced gar

gt:
In Blender or Food Processor combine Habaneros, Bell Pepper, Pineapple and Vinegar, chop fine.
Bring to a boil on Medium/High heat, boil for 10 minutes, stirring constanly.
Add Fruit Pectin, stir until dissolved.
Add Sugar, stir until dissolved.
Return to a boil and hard boil for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, mixture will thicken as it boils.
Remove from Heat and Skim Foam.
Ladle into sterilized 4oz Jars leaving 1/8"Headspace.
Seal and process in boiling water bath for 5 minutes.
I typically yield 12-14 of the 4 oz jars.
May take 1 to 2 days for the jelly to set.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the habanero peppers, orange bell pepper, and pineapple. Cook over medium heat until the vegetables are tender and the pineapple is slightly softened.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, liquid fruit pectin, and salt.
4. Pour the mixture over the vegetables and pineapple in the saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens. This may take around 10-15 minutes.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully pour the mixture into a clean, sterilized jar. Make sure to leave enough room at the top for the mixture to expand as it cools.
7. Seal the jar and place it in the preheated oven. Cook for 10 minutes, then remove the jar from the oven and let it cool completely.
8. Store the Pineapple Habanero Jelly in the refrigerator.

[/INST]

gt:
Combine broccoli slaw, grapes, nuts and 1/3 cup pineapple in large bowl.
Whisk remaining ingredients until blended.
Add to broccoli mixture; toss to evenly coat.
Top with remaining pineapple.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli slaw, red grapes, almonds, and pineapple tidbits.
3. In a small bowl, mix the Creamy Poppyseed Dressing, fresh lemon juice, and Dijon mustard.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the broccoli mixture and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the dressing is slightly crispy.
7. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Broccoli Slaw with Poppyseed Dressing and Fruit as a side dish or a salad.

gt:
First it is recommended that you soak the rice in water for at least 3 hours before cooking so that it can soften up.
After it has been soaking for a bit remove the water and begin to cook it.
In a heavy saucepan over med heat, bring the rice and water to a boil.
Lower the heat to simmer (LOW), add the cloves and cinnamon stick.
Stir.
Let this cook (uncovered) until the water has evaporated ( 8 - 15 minutes ).
Add the remaining ingredients (except the pinch of cinnamon), stir gently once, and again let simmer (uncovered) until all liquid has evaporated.
Transfer into a casserole or serving dish, garnish with the pinch of cinnamon (sprinkle on top) and refrigerate.
Keep refrigerated.
May be served at room temperature.
pred:
1. Begin by washing and peeling the coconut, and grating it.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the rice, water, and coconut milk. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for about 5 minutes.
4. In a separate saucepan, heat the evaporated milk, condensed milk, and coconut milk over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
5. Add the vanilla extract, nutmeg, ginger, salt, and cinnamon to the coconut milk mixture. Stir well.
6. Carefully pour the coconut milk mixture into the rice mixture, stirring gently to combine.
7. Add the raisins and cloves to the mixture, stirring to combine.
8. Cover the saucepan and let the dish sit for about 10-15 minutes, or until the raisins are plump and the dish is heated through.
9. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for about 5 more minutes.
10. Serve the Arroz Con Dulce warm, garnished with a sprinkle of cinnamon and a drizzle of coconut milk, if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Bring lightly salted water to a boil.
Add in pasta, cooking 5-6 minutes (until done).
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
Drain pasta.
In saucepan, saute onion in sun-dried tomato oil until fragrant.
Add in garlic, salt (a pinch), and tomato paste.
Cook over medium-high heat.
When onions are tender, add wine to cover.
Simmer until wine has mostly cooked away.
Add in tomatoes, and cook until warmed through.
Toss pasta with sauce, adding in reserved pasta water as needed.
Top with goat cheese and parsley (as desired).
pred:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the angel hair pasta according to the package instructions, usually around 8-10 minutes.

2. In a small bowl, mix the sun-dried tomato oil, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt.

3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.

4. Add the tomato paste and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.

5. Add the white wine to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook until the liquid has almost completely evaporated.

6. Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 1-2 minutes, until they are heated through.

7. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, stirring to combine.

8. Add the crumbled goat cheese and chopped parsley. Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is well-coated.

9. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

10. Serve the Angel Hair Pasta With Sun-Dried Tomatoes & Goat Cheese immediately, and enjoy!

gt:
Crumble chorizo into large skillet; cook on medium heat 5 min.
or until done, stirring occasionally.
Remove from skillet; drain.
Whisk cream cheese spread and water until blended.
Cook shrimp, onions and garlic in same skillet on medium-high heat 2 min., stirring frequently.
Add chorizo and rice; cook and stir 1 min.
or until shrimp are done.
Add cream cheese mixture; cook and stir 1 min.
Stuff chiles with shrimp mixture; place, filled sides up, in single layer in microwaveable dish.
Top with cheese; microwave on HIGH 3 min.
or until melted.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the Mexican chorizo over medium heat until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chorizo, PHILADELPHIA Spicy Jalapeno Cream Cheese Spread, shrimp, water, onion, garlic, and cooked long-grain white rice. Mix well.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
5. Using a melon baller or a small spoon, scoop out the center of each peeled and deveined chile. Discard the seeds and membranes.
6. Place the chiles on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Fill each chile with the shrimp and rice mixture, mounding it slightly.
8. Bake the chiles in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Creamy Shrimp & Chorizo Chiles Rellenos immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Chop veggies and combine in a large bowl with the cheese and olives.
Combine the dressing ingredients in a small mixing bowl to your taste.
The olive brine and cheese brine are used to balance out the vinegar taste.
Please feel free to experiment; I had to try a lot to get to my liking.
It's very important to taste the dressing while you're making it.
When you're happy with the dressing pour it over the veggies, olives, and cheese in the large bowl.
Coat veggies, olives, and cheese well with the dressing.
And chill for at least 6 hours.
I take this to alot of parties and it's always a hit.
pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Wash and peel the cucumber, tomatoes, and green pepper. Cut the cucumber into thin slices, the tomatoes into halves, and the green pepper into strips.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cucumber, tomatoes, green pepper, and onion.
3. Add the kalamata olives, reserve brine for dressing, and crumbled feta cheese.
4. In a small bowl, mix the oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano.
5. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
6. Serve the salad immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Combine all ingredients in a non-metallic bowl.
chill for a minimum of 30 minutes.
pred:
1. Wash the cucumber thoroughly and peel it. Cut the cucumber into thin slices.
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced cucumber, fresh parsley, and salt.
3. Allow the mixture to sit for about 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. After the mixture has rested, drain off any excess liquid.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the lemon juice, sugar or sugar substitute, and pepper to taste.
6. Pour the lemon juice mixture over the cucumber mixture and stir gently to combine.
7. Allow the salad to sit for at least 30 minutes before serving.

This German Cucumber Salad is a refreshing and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed at various occasions. The combination of cucumber, parsley, and lemon juice creates a tangy and slightly sweet flavor profile that is perfect for a summer picnic or a light lunch.

gt:
Cook noodles as directed on package, omitting salt.
Meanwhile, heat 1 Tbsp.
oil in large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add meat; cook and stir 2 to 3 min.
or until lightly browned.
Remove from skillet; cover to keep warm.
Add remaining oil and onions to skillet; cook and stir on medium heat 3 min.
Add mushrooms; cook 5 min., stirring occasionally.
Stir in broth.
Bring to boil.
Add cream cheese spread and mustard; simmer on medium-low heat 1 to 2 min., stirring constantly.
Return meat to skillet; cook and stir 3 to 5 min.
or until heated through.
Serve over noodles; sprinkle with parsley.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 Tbsp. of the oil over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the remaining 1 Tbsp. of oil. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
4. Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the beef back to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. In a small bowl, mix the beef broth, PHILADELPHIA Chive & Onion Cream Cheese Spread, and Dijon Mustard. Pour the mixture over the beef and mushrooms in the skillet.
7. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the sauce thickens slightly.
8. Meanwhile, cook the wide egg noodles according to the package instructions until they are tender but still slightly firm.
9. Serve the beef and mushroom mixture over the cooked noodles.
10. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and enjoy your delicious Beef Stroganoff with Mushrooms.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Butter the bottom and sides of 9-inch spring form pan and line bottom with parchment paper.
Finely chop the ginger into a paste, set aside.
In large bowl mix molasses, sugar and oil.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cinnamon, cloves and black pepper.
In small saucepan, bring the water to a boil, then stir in baking soda.
Whisk the hot water into the molasses mixture and then add ginger.
Gradually add the flour mixture into the bowl, whisking to combine.
Add eggs and whisk thoroughly.
Pour batter into prepared pan and bake until the top of top of the cake springs back when pressed lightly, or a tooth pick inserted at center comes out clean.
*Recipe adapted from David Lebovitz?s Ginger Cake, Ready for Dessert.
pred:
[INST]To create a mouthwatering Fresh Ginger Cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated ginger, molasses, cane sugar, and olive oil. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the flour, cinnamon, cloves, black pepper, and water to the bowl. Whisk until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
4. Add the baking soda and eggs to the batter, and whisk until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, you can serve it to your heart's content.

Enjoy your delicious Fresh Ginger Cake!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

gt:
Turn the chops on both sides in the grated Parmesan, pressing the chop firmly against the crumbs, using the palm of your hands to make the cheese adhere to the meat.
Tap the chops gently against the plate to shake off excess cheese.
Dip them into the beaten egg, letting the excess flow back into the dish.
Turn the chops in the bread crumbs, coating both sides, and tap them again to shake off excess.
Pour enough oil in a skillet to come 1/4 inch up the sides, and turn on the heat to medium.
When the oil is very hot, slip as many chops into the pan as will fit without crowding.
When one side forms a nice golden crust, sprinkle it with salt and pepper, turn the chop and sprinkle salt and pepper on the other side.
As soon as the second side has formed a crust, transfer to a warm platter, using a slotted spoon or spatula.
Repeat the procedure, slipping more chops into the pan as soon as there is room for them.
When all the chops are done, serve promptly.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the lamb chops with salt and pepper.
3. In a small bowl, mix the eggs and bread crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the Parmesan cheese and a pinch of salt.
5. Dip each lamb chop into the egg mixture, then coat it with the Parmesan-bread crumb mixture.
6. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
7. Add the lamb chops to the skillet and cook until they are golden brown on both sides, about 4-5 minutes per side.
8. Transfer the lamb chops to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked through.
9. Serve the lamb chops immediately.

*To flatten the lamb chops, place them between two sheets of plastic wrap or wax paper and use a rolling pin or the bottom of a heavy skillet to gently press the chops into a flat, even shape.

gt:
Prepare Dinner in large saucepan as directed on package.
Meanwhile, heat dressing in large skillet on medium heat.
Add zucchini; cook 5 min.
or until crisp-tender, stirring occasionally.
Add zucchini and tomatoes to Dinner; mix well.
Top with cheddar.
pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the vegetables by chopping the zucchini and tomato.
3. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and set it aside.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, zucchini, and tomato.
5. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Lite Zesty Italian Dressing and the KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese.
6. Pour the dressing mixture over the pasta mixture and toss to combine.
7. Serve the Double-Cheese and Veggie Macaroni immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Brown hamburger with onion, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Mix everything together and heat well.
Top each bowl with a sprinkling of shredded Monterey Jack cheese
pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients for the recipe. In this case, you will need 1 can of Red kidney beans, drained and rinsed, 1 cup of cooked macaroni, 1 1/2 pounds of ground beef, 1/2 cup of chopped onion, 1 can of Tomato sauce, 2 soup cans of water, 1 can of sliced mushrooms (4oz), 1/2 cup of corn, 1 can of sliced black olives, 1 tsp of Garlic salt, 1 tbsp of McCormick Montreal steak seasoning, 1 chili powder, 1/2 cup of ketchup, salt, pepper, and sugar.

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain the excess fat, and set aside.

4. In a large pot, combine the cooked macaroni, chopped onion, and the drained and rinsed kidney beans. Cook over medium heat until the macaroni is tender, stirring occasionally.

5. Add the ground beef to the pot, and stir to combine.

6. Pour in the canned tomato sauce, and stir to combine.

7. Add the water, sliced mushrooms, corn, black olives, garlic salt, McCormick Montreal steak seasoning, chili powder, and ketchup. Stir to combine.

8. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the chili has thickened and the flavors have melded together.

9. Season the chili with salt and pepper to taste.

10. Serve the Irvixen's Toddler Style Chili hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious homemade chili!

gt:
Mix together all dry ingredients.
Add in 3/4 cup of water and stir until dough comes together and resembles bread dough adding more water if needed.
Careful not to overwork dough, fold in onion and okra.
Then separate dough into 4-6 equal amounts.
Form each portion into a ball with floured hands.
Then using a rolling pin roll each out to 1/4 inch thickness.
Poke a small hole in the center of each round.
(This will help the bread to stay flat while frying.)
Heat the oil in a skillet to 350F.
One at a time place the dough flat into the oil and fry on both sides until golden.
Remove and place on a towel to cool and remove excess oil.
pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn meal, a.p. flour, baking powder, and salt.
2. Gradually add the water, stirring until the mixture is smooth and free of lumps.
3. Add the minced onion, and stir to combine.
4. Cover the bowl and let the mixture rest for about 15-20 minutes.
5. Heat oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
6. Carefully pour the batter into the hot oil, creating small pancakes.
7. Cook the pancakes until they are golden brown on both sides, flipping them carefully to ensure they cook evenly.
8. Serve the Okra Fry Bread immediately, garnished with additional minced onion or any desired toppings.

[/SYS]

gt:
Brush the bread with the melted butter.
Lay bread in the bottom of the dish.
Sprinkle with some of the sultanas.
Add more bread and keep repeating.
Mix the eggs, sugar, salt, milk and heavy cream.
Strain so smooth.
Pour over the bread.
Allow to stand for 15 minutes.
Place in an oven set at 360 degrees Fahrenheit for about 40 to 50 minutes or until well risen and the custard is set.
Serve with ice cream .Devour!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the bread into small cubes and place them in a large mixing bowl.
3. Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat.
4. Add the vanilla extract and stir to combine.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are light and fluffy.
6. Gradually pour the melted butter mixture into the eggs, stirring constantly to prevent the eggs from curdling.
7. Add the sugar and salt to the egg mixture, and stir until well combined.
8. Gradually pour the milk and heavy cream into the egg mixture, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
9. Fold the bread cubes into the egg mixture, making sure they are evenly distributed.
10. Add the sultanas or raisins, if using, and stir to combine.
11. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
12. Bake the pudding for 45-50 minutes, or until it is set and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
13. Allow the pudding to cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]
