gt:
Put oil in pan and add bengal gram to it.
Add two medium size tomatoes in pan.
Add 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric and 1 teaspoon red chili powder.
Cook this for 5-10 minutes.
Now add the chopped spring onions to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes on high heat
pred:
To cook a delightful Pyaz ki patti aur chana dal sabzi dish, follow these steps:

1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
2. Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
3. Add the chopped onions and sauté until they become translucent.
4. Add the bengal gram and cook until they are slightly browned.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft and mushy.
6. Add the red chili powder, turmeric, and salt. Mix well.
7. Add 2 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil.
8. Add the chopped spring onions and cook for a few minutes until they are slightly wilted.
9. Serve the Pyaz ki patti aur chana dal sabzi hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

This dish is a delicious and nutritious meal, perfect for a satisfying lunch or dinner. The combination of bengal gram, spring onions, and tomatoes creates a flavorful and aromatic dish that is both visually appealing and delicious.

gt:
PreHeat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Combine butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs in one at a time, mixing well in between.
Beat in vanilla and lemon zest.
Add in red food coloring.
As much as desired.
Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt and then add to the batter.
Now in a small bowl combine lemon juice and Maraschino Juice.
Add slowly to batter.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until toothpick come out clean.
note: they will look pink and spongy on top.
this will make 20 big cupcakes or 1 9 inch pan.
Topping: Combine Whipped Topping and Powder Sugar in a mixing bowl.
Add in vanilla, cream of tartar and lemon juice.
Combine really well.
Once combined put mixer on high and whip.
Pipe on cupcakes.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract and lemon zest.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and maraschino cherry juice. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the lemon juice, mixing just until combined.
4. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared muffin cups.
5. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
6. To make the frosting, beat the whipped topping, lemon extract, and vanilla extract in a large bowl until smooth and creamy. Gradually add the powdered sugar, cream of tartar, and lemon juice, beating until the desired consistency is reached.
7. Once the cupcakes are completely cooled, use a spoon or an icing bag to frost them with the lemon frosting.
8. Decorate the cupcakes with a maraschino cherry on top, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pink Lemonade Cupcakes!

gt:
Cook tortellini according to package directions.
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Stir in onion; cook until soft and translucent.
Mix in cream cheese, parmesan, milk, mushrooms, and spinach.
Gently mix in tortellini and cherry tomatoes with skillet contents; warm through, and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the cream cheese to the skillet and stir until melted and smooth.
4. Add the Parmesan cheese, milk, and cooked spinach to the skillet. Stir until the spinach is heated through and the sauce is smooth.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the tortellini, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes.
6. Pour the cream cheese sauce over the tortellini mixture, and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the tortellini are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly browned.
8. Serve the Creamy Spinach Tortellini immediately.

gt:
Combine lime juice, fish sauce, brown sugar, minced chili and either store in the fridge until using or immediately add to salad of choice.
Top with chopped peanuts.
pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients: 14 cup lime juice, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 2 teaspoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon red chili pepper, minced, and 3 ounces peanuts, chopped.

2. In a large bowl, combine the lime juice, fish sauce, brown sugar, and red chili pepper. Mix well to ensure that all ingredients are evenly distributed.

3. Add the minced peanuts to the bowl and mix them in with the other ingredients.

4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the mixture for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

5. After 30 minutes, taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning if needed.

6. To serve, pour the dressing over a salad of your choice. You can also use the dressing as a dip for vegetables or as a marinade for meat or fish.

Enjoy your Thai Dressing for Salad!

gt:
Microwave cream cheese spread, milk, lemon zest, juice, pepper and garlic powder in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 20 sec.
; stir.
Top muffin halves with bacon, tomatoes, spinach and eggs.
Serve topped with cream cheese sauce.
pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix together 1/2 cup (1/2 of 8-oz. tub) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese Spread, 1 Tbsp. milk, 1/2 tsp. zest and 1 Tbsp. juice from 1 lemon. Set aside.

2. In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 tsp. black pepper and 1/4 tsp. garlic powder over low heat until fragrant.

3. Toast the English muffins, split in half, and set aside.

4. Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy. Break it into halves and set aside.

5. Cut the tomato into 4 slices.

6. In a small bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt and pepper to taste.

7. In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the spinach and cook until wilted.

8. In a separate small skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the eggs and cook until set, then flip and cook the other side.

9. Assemble the Florentine Eggs Benedict by placing the toasted English muffin halves on a plate. Spread the cream cheese mixture on top of the muffin halves.

10. Add the cooked spinach and tomato slices on top of the cream cheese mixture.

11. Place the poached eggs on top of the spinach and tomato slices.

12. Sprinkle the cooked bacon on top of the eggs.

13. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Florentine Eggs Benedict!

[/INST]

gt:
Rinse rice with cold water to remove impurities.
Put the water, chicken broth, coconut milk, lemongrass, galangal or ginger, turmeric, and salt in a large heavy pot or rice cooker.
If rice cooker, add rice and cook.
If pot, bring to boil,over high heat, add rice, return to boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook about 15-18 minutes until rice is tender.
Let stand, covered for about 5 minutes.
Gently fluff the rice with a fork.
Remove the lemongrass and galangal or ginger.
They should have floated to the top.
Then stir the rice to evenly distribute the flavors.
Serve in a large serving bowl.
If you like, form into the shape of a cone to emulate the traditional Balinese serving style!
pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the uncooked rice and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.

2. Add the chicken broth, coconut milk, and lemon grass to the rice mixture. Stir to combine.

3. In a small bowl, mix the turmeric, salt, and a pinch of black pepper. Add the mixture to the rice and stir to combine.

4. Simmer the rice mixture for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the rice is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.

5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the rice mixture rest for a few minutes.

6. Serve the cooked Balinese Special Rice - Nasi Kuning Recipe hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated coconut and a drizzle of coconut milk if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Melt butter in a soup pot until tender.
Add minced garlic, cook for 30 seconds on medium heat.
Stir in remaining ingredients, *except crab* until heated thoroughly.
(Add optional ingredients if using).
Stir carefully, add crab meat, making sure not to break up crab chunks.
Serve in warmed bowls, (warm bowls under warm water for 1 minute) adding croutons to float on top.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is softened.
3. Add the condensed tomato soup, water, and crabmeat. Stir to combine.
4. Add the dried parsley, ground pepper, and Old Bay Seasoning. Stir to combine.
5. Add the frozen mixed vegetables and asparagus. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of Old Bay Seasoning if desired.

This simple and easy recipe for Chesapeake Bay Rosy Crab Soup from the Farm will provide a delicious and comforting meal for you and your loved ones. The combination of the crabmeat, vegetables, and Old Bay Seasoning creates a flavorful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed year-round.

gt:
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F
Chop all of the vegetables into 1 chunks.
Drizzle olive oil in the bottom of a roasting pan (use one with a lidyoull need it in a bit) and place the pork loin in the roaster.
Cover the pork with a drizzle of olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic, and dried spices, and massage everything into the meat.
Add the vegetables to the pan.
Cover the roaster and put it in the oven.
Roast for an hour, or until the pork is done.
Remove the roaster from the oven, slice the pork, and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the pork loin with salt and pepper, adjusting to your taste.
3. In a large mixing bowl, toss the pork loin with the minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, and olive oil.
4. Place the pork loin in a roasting pan and drizzle the remaining olive oil over the top.
5. Add the sweet onion, sweet potatoes, carrots, bell peppers, fennel bulb, and apples to the pan.
6. Roast the pork loin in the preheated oven for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
7. Remove the pork loin from the oven and let it rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing it into portions.
8. While the pork is resting, toss the vegetables in the pan with a drizzle of olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and roast for an additional 30-45 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
9. Serve the roasted pork and vegetables together, garnished with fresh herbs and a drizzle of olive oil.

[/INST]

gt:
Combine flour, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl and mix well.
In another bowl, whisk egg and milk.
Make a well in the center of the flour, pour in the egg mixture.
Beat with a wooden spoon until elastic feeling
Bring some water to a boil, and push batter through a spaetzle maker.
You can also just cut the batter into small sized pieces and toss into the boiling water (but it takes a while to cut all those pieces).
Boil 6-8 minutes, until they start floating and aren't real doughy.
Remove and drain.
Before serving, melt butter and toss spaetzle over medium heat for 5 minutes.
pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, nutmeg, and salt.
2. Make a well in the center of the flour mixture, and pour in the egg and milk.
3. Using a fork or a dough whisk, mix the ingredients until a smooth dough forms.
4. Gradually add the melted butter to the dough, mixing until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface, and knead it until it becomes smooth and elastic.
6. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
7. After the dough has rested, divide it into 8-10 equal portions.
8. Roll each portion of dough into a smooth ball, and then roll it out on a floured surface until it reaches the desired thickness.
9. Cut the rolled-out dough into the desired shapes using a Spaetzle maker or a sharp knife.
10. In a large pot, bring the water to a boil, and then carefully add the Spaetzle to the boiling water. Cook the Spaetzle until they float to the surface, then remove them with a slotted spoon and drain.
11. Serve the Spaetzle immediately, or let them cool and then store them in the refrigerator for later use.

By following these key steps, you can successfully prepare a delicious and perfectly cooked Spaetzle.

gt:
Put in yogurt, honey, 1 whole banana, and milk into the blender.
Blend in blender for a minute.
Put frozen strawberries and peaches inches.
Blend well until there are no chunks
Last enjoy!
pred:
[INST]
1. In a blender, combine 1 cup of milk, 1 large banana, and 1 cup of frozen strawberries.
2. Add 1 cup of frozen peaches and 1 tablespoon of honey to the blender.
3. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your delicious Healthy Frozen Fruit Smoothie.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees.
Lightly grease cookie sheet.
Mix tuna, olives, celery, green pepper, onion and 1/4 cup of the soup.
Mix baking mix and 1/2 cup cold water until soft dough forms: beat vigorously 20 strokes.
Gently smooth dough into ball on floured cloth-covered board.
Knead 5 times.
Roll dough into rectangle, 14 x 11"; place on cookie sheet.
Spoon tuna mixture lengthwise down center of rectangle; sprinkle with 1 cup of the cheese.
Make cuts, 2 1/2" long, at 1" intervals on 14" sides of rectangle.
Fold strips over filling.
Mix egg and 1 tbsp water; brush over dough.
Bake until light brown- 15 to 20 minutes.
Mix remaining soup, remaining 1/2 cup cheese and the milk over medium heat, stirring occasionally until hot.
Serve over slices of twist.
pred:
[INST]1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the drained tuna, sliced olives, chopped celery, green pepper, and onion.
3. Add the condensed cream of mushroom soup, Bisquick baking mix, cold water, and shredded cheddar cheese. Mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and water, then add the mixture to the tuna mixture.
5. Gradually add the milk, mixing until the batter is smooth and well-combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the dish comes out clean.
8. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the butternut pumpkin into small, evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter, and chili sauce.
4. Add the olive oil and mix well.
5. Place the pumpkin pieces in a baking dish and pour the mixture over them.
6. Roast the pumpkin pieces in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until they are tender and the chili sauce has melted and thickened.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let the pumpkin cool for a few minutes.
8. Using a fork, mash the pumpkin pieces to create a smooth dip.
9. Serve the Roast Pumpkin Dip warm, as a dip for vegetables, crackers, or chips.

[/INST]

gt:
Add ingredients as listed or by Manufacturers instructions.
Set Bread machine at basic.
pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the water or milk, margarine or butter, sugar, and salt.
2. Add the grated cheddar cheese and yeast to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the bread flour, mixing until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
6. Preheat your bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions.
7. Punch down the dough, and transfer it to the bread machine's dough pan.
8. Set the machine to the "dough" or "manual" setting, and press the start button.
9. Allow the dough to rise until it has reached the desired level of doneness, usually around 1-2 hours.
10. Once the dough has finished rising, remove it from the bread machine and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
11. Shape the dough into a loaf, and place it in a lightly greased loaf pan.
12. Allow the loaf to rise for another 30-60 minutes, or until it has reached the desired level of doneness.
13. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
14. Bake the loaf in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
15. Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for 10-15 minutes.
16. Slice the loaf and serve.

[/SYS]

By following these steps, you will have successfully prepared and cooked Cheddar Cheese Bread using a bread machine.

gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 350.2.
Weigh or lightly spoon flours into dry measuring cups; level with a knife.
Combine flours, xanthan gum, and next 3 ingredients; stir with a whisk.3.
Place granulated sugar and butter in a bowl; beat with a mixer at medium speed until blended.
Beat in egg yolks.
Beat in buttermilk, lemon rind, lemon juice, and canola oil until well blended.
Gradually add flour mixture, beating at low speed until smooth.4.
Place egg whites in a small bowl; beat with a whisk until foamy.
Add poppy seeds and egg whites to batter; beat at low speed just until blended.5.
Pour batter into a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan coated with cooking spray, and sprinkle with turbinado sugar.
Bake at 350 for 50 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 15 minutes in pan on a wire rack; remove from pan.
Cool completely on wire rack.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet white sorghum flour, brown rice flour, tapioca flour, xanthan gum, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the granulated sugar, softened butter, egg yolks, buttermilk, lemon rind, lemon juice, and oil.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until a smooth batter forms.
5. Fold in the egg whites and poppy seeds.
6. Grease a loaf pan with cooking spray or butter, and pour the batter into the prepared pan.
7. Bake the bread for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
8. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

[/INST]

This Lemon-Poppy Seed Bread recipe is a delicious and nutritious option for those who prefer a gluten-free and dairy-free alternative. The combination of sweet white sorghum flour, brown rice flour, and tapioca flour provides a good source of fiber, while the lemon rind and juice add a refreshing citrus flavor. The egg whites and poppy seeds contribute to the bread's moist texture and crunchy crust, respectively. The use of buttermilk and canola oil also adds a touch of creaminess and healthy fats to the recipe. Overall, this Lemon-Poppy Seed Bread is a delightful and satisfying treat for those who prefer a gluten-free and dairy-free alternative.

gt:
Combine oats, yogurt, orange juice, and brown sugar in a medium bowl.
Add apple, banana, and blueberries, stirring gently to combine.
pred:
To make a delicious Swiss Fruit and Yogurt Muesli dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup quick-cooking oats, 1 cup plain low-fat yogurt, and 13 cup orange juice.
2. Stir until well combined and allow the mixture to sit for about 5 minutes.
3. Add 2 tablespoons packed brown sugar and stir again.
4. Add 1 cup shredded Red Delicious apple, 12 cup sliced banana, and 14 cup blueberries to the bowl.
5. Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
7. Serve the Swiss Fruit and Yogurt Muesli dish cold or at room temperature.

This delicious Swiss Fruit and Yogurt Muesli dish is a nutritious and refreshing breakfast option, packed with essential nutrients and natural sweetness from the fruits and yogurt. The combination of oats, yogurt, and fruits provides a balance of carbohydrates, protein, and vitamins, making it a healthy and satisfying choice for a morning meal.

gt:
Remove casings from sausage.
Place in stockpot with olive oil and cook over medium heat until lightly browned, breaking sausage apart as it cooks.
Add carrots, onion, celery, garlic and Italian seasoning to pot, cooking 5-7 minutes or until vegetables start to brown.
Stir tomatoes, tomato paste, arugala, broth and beans into sausage/veggie mixture.
Simmer on medium-low heat 15 to 20 minutes or under vegetables are tender.
Serve with grated fresh parmesan cheese and warm bread.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sausage and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the chopped carrots, onion, and celery to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
5. Pour in the tomato paste and stir to combine.
6. Add the drained and rinsed arugula to the pot, stirring to combine.
7. Add the dried Italian seasoning, canned diced tomatoes with juice, and prepared chicken broth. Stir to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
9. Add the cannellini beans to the pot and stir to combine.
10. Cover the pot with a lid and continue to cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the beans are tender and the stew has thickened.
11. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the Tuscan White Bean & Sausage Stew hot, over a bed of cooked pasta or with crusty bread on the side.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Pour vinegar, sugar and wine into a small sauce pan.
Turn heat to medium low and leave it alone.
After it begins to simmer, watch it every once in a while.
When you tip the pan, it should begin to coat the bottom, and it will reduce by almost half, giving you a little over 1/3 cup when its finished.
Pour into a glass measuring cup and allow to cool.
Add the oil, mustard, salt and pepper and whisk vigorously.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for a week.
pred:
To make Balsamic Vinaigrette, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the 23 cups of Balsamic Vinegar, 2 tablespoons of sugar, and 2 tablespoons of wine (white or red).
2. Slowly drizzle in 13 cups of extra virgin olive oil, whisking continuously to emulsify the mixture.
3. Add 1 tablespoon of Dijon mustard, and whisk until fully incorporated.
4. Season the vinaigrette with salt and pepper, adjusting the seasoning to taste.
5. Transfer the vinaigrette to a clean, airtight container and store in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

This Balsamic Vinaigrette recipe is a versatile and flavorful dressing that can be used as a base for various salads or as a marinade for grilled meats or vegetables. The combination of the tangy balsamic vinegar, sweetness of the sugar, and the richness of the olive oil creates a well-balanced and delicious dressing that can be customized with additional herbs, spices, or flavorings to suit individual preferences.

gt:
Mix the cake flour, cornstarch, and matcha well.
Add the butter and milk to a bowl and melt the butter by suspending over a pan of boiling water.
In another bowl, add the egg whites and whip with a hand mixer.
Add the sugar in 3 goes to create a stiff meringue.
Add the egg yolks to the meringue 1 at a time.
After each addition whip the meringue thoroughly until it returns to it's previous stiffness.
Sift in the powder ingredients from Step 1 and fold in with a rubber spatula.
Add a little of the mixture to the butter and milk mixture and mix.
Add this butter, milk and batter mixture back into the main bowl with the spatula and mix until the batter starts to become glossy.
Pour the mixture into a baking tray lined with parchment paper and even out.
Once flat, bake in an oven preheated to 180C for 14 minutes.
Once baked, turn the sponge out onto a cooling rack and leave to cool with the parchment paper still attached.
In the meantime, make the adzuki cream.
Whip the cream until stiff and add the adzuki beans, folding them in with a plastic spatula.
Peel the baking paper off the sponge and cut the far edge of the sponge diagonally so that it seals up neater when rolled.
Spread the adzuki cream evenly, roll the sponge away from you, wrap with cling film and chill in the refrigerator to finish.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the eggs until they are well-beaten.
3. Gradually add the cake flour, cornstarch, matcha, sugar, and butter, whisking until the mixture is smooth and free of lumps.
4. Add the milk and heavy cream, and mix until the batter is smooth and well-combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for about 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. To make the adzuki cream, bring the anko to a boil in a saucepan, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 5-10 minutes, or until the anko has thickened.
9. Allow the adzuki cream to cool slightly before spreading it evenly over the cooled cake.
10. Serve the Roll Cake Matcha Green Tea with Adzuki Cream immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat oil over medium heat in 12-inch skillet.
Add leeks and garlic, and sprinkle with salt, if desired.
Saute 1 minute.
Add cabbage, and cook 15 minutes, or until cabbage wilts and begins to brown, stirring frequently.
Add ale, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer 10 minutes, or until most of ale has evaporated.
Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice and dill.
Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]To make the Ale-Braised Cabbage with Leeks, start by heating the olive oil in a large skillet or saucepan over medium heat. Add the sliced leeks and cook until they are softened and slightly browned, about 5-7 minutes. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.

Next, add the cored and shredded red cabbage to the skillet, along with the sliced white portions of leeks. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cabbage is tender and slightly caramelized.

Pour in the pale or white ale, and stir to combine. Add the lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook for another 5-7 minutes, or until the cabbage is tender and the liquid has almost completely evaporated.

Finally, add the chopped fresh dill to the skillet, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the dill is fragrant and slightly wilted.

Serve the Ale-Braised Cabbage with Leeks over rice or noodles, and enjoy a delicious and flavorful meal!

[/SYS]

[/INST]

gt:
In a medium bowl, mix the lobster with the mayonnaise, creme fraiche, shallot, pickle, celery, tarragon and lemon zest.
Season with salt and white pepper and refrigerate until ready to use.
Lightly butter the cut side of each roll.
Heat a large skillet over moderate heat.
Toast the rolls in the skillet, cut side down, until lightly golden, about 1 minute.
Transfer the rolls to a work surface.
Spoon about 3 tablespoons of the lobster salad on the bottom half of each roll.
Close the sliders and serve.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the cooked lobster meat, mayonnaise, creme fraiche, shallot, dill pickle, celery, tarragon, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.
3. Fold in the melted butter, and mix until well combined.
4. Place the mixture in a pastry bag or a plastic bag with a small hole cut in the corner.
5. Scoop the mixture onto the split rolls, dividing it evenly among the eight sliders.
6. Place the sliders on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the filling is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir 2 chopped carrots, onion, and celery until onion is golden, 7 to 10 minutes.
Pour in wine and bring to a simmer.
Add turkey carcass, chicken stock, water, bay leaf, and bouquet garni; bring mixture to a boil.
Reduce heat to a simmer and cook, partially covered, for about 1 hour.
Skim any fat that comes to the surface and discard.
Remove turkey carcass and strain soup into a large saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in leftover turkey and diced carrot; simmer until warmed through, about 5 minutes.
Serve garnished with fresh tarragon.
pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and carrots to the pot and cook until they are tender, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the chopped celery, and cook for a few more minutes.
4. Pour in the dry white wine and stir to deglaze the pot.
5. Add the turkey carcass, chicken stock, water, bay leaf, and bouquet garni to the pot.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 2 hours.
7. Remove the turkey carcass from the pot and let it cool. Once cooled, shred the meat into bite-sized pieces.
8. Add the shredded turkey to the pot, along with the diced carrot.
9. Stir in the chopped tarragon.
10. Simmer the soup for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the carrots are tender.
11. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the Reinvented Turkey Leftovers Soup hot.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat oil, lemon juice and onion in a large skillet over medium heat.
When onion is tender, add chicken, mushrooms and tomatoes.
Cook over medium high heat for 5 to 7 minutes each side, stirring occasionally, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, fresh lemon juice, and minced garlic until well combined.
3. Season the chicken breast halves with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices of your choice.
4. Add the chicken to the bowl with the olive oil mixture, tossing to coat evenly.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the sliced mushrooms, diced tomatoes, and any additional seasoning you prefer.
6. Place the chicken and mushroom mixture into a baking dish, ensuring that the chicken is evenly distributed.
7. Bake the chicken for 25-30 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
8. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
9. Serve the T's Easy Chicken over a bed of cooked rice or noodles, and enjoy!

gt:
Cream butter and peanut butter.
Beat in sugars and mix until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, then orange juice and vanilla.
Sift dry ingredients together, and fold into the creamed mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Refrigerate cookie dough for at least one hour.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees and grease a baking sheet.
Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the baking sheet.
Bake for about 14 minutes, or until the cookies are starting to brown.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and peanut butter until smooth.
3. Add the sugar, dark brown sugar, eggs, orange juice or water, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour mixture to the wet ingredients, stirring until a dough forms.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly soft.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious A+ Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies!

gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Place carrots into a baking dish and spray them lightly with olive oil spray.
Toss to coat.
In a small jar, combine orange juice, honey, paprika, salt and pepper.
Screw lid on tightly and shake vigorously to mix.
Pour mixture over carrots and place dish in the preheated oven.
Bake on middle rack for 20-30 minutes (depending on the thickness of your carrots) until a fork can pierce them (check frequently to make sure that they do not become overdone).
Remove from oven and garnish with chopped chives.
Nutrition per 1/4 recipe: 99 calories, 0.5 g fat, 1.5 g protein, 19 g carbohydrates, 5 g fiber
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the honey, paprika, sea salt, and fresh ground black pepper.
3. Cut the carrots into uniform pieces, about 1/2 inch thick.
4. In a large bowl, toss the carrots with the honey mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
5. Spray the carrots with olive oil spray, then transfer them to a baking sheet.
6. Roast the carrots in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the carrots from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, mix the fresh chives and a pinch of salt.
9. Spread the chives mixture over the carrots, then transfer the carrots back to the baking sheet.
10. Return the carrots to the oven and roast for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the chives are slightly crispy.

Enjoy your Candied Carrots!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix chicken, red bell pepper, red onion, sour cream, cream cheese, taco seasoning, and salt together in a large bowl.
Combine black beans, hot water, and cumin in a separate bowl; roughly mash with a fork until evenly mixed.
Layer 3 tortillas into the bottom of a 9x9-inch baking dish.
Top tortillas with 1/2 the salsa, 1/2 the black bean mixture, and 1/2 the chicken mixture.
Repeat layering with remaining ingredients, ending with chicken mixture.
Sprinkle casserole with mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden, 30 to 35 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded cooked chicken, red bell pepper, red onion, sour cream, jalapeno-flavored cream cheese, taco seasoning mix, salt, and hot water. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Drain the black beans and rinse them well. Add the black beans to the mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Sprinkle the ground cumin over the top of the mixture.
6. Roll out the flour tortillas and cut them into strips.
7. Arrange the tortilla strips over the top of the mixture, creating a layer.
8. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese over the tortilla strips.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Spicy Chicken and Black Bean Bake immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
In a large pan toast pine nuts, remove from pan set aside.
Add olive oil to pan, when hot add the onions and saute 3 minutes.
Add garlic, asparagus, mushrooms, lime juice, diced tomatoes, and dried herbs.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Stir in evaporated milk, arugula, basil.
Toss in hot angel hair and grated cheese.
Add some Pasta water if needed.
Plate in a large serving bowl and top with pine nuts.
Garnish with additional extra virgin olive oil drizzled over pasta and grated cheese.
Heartly enjoy!
pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package directions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onions and cook until they are softened and translucent.
3. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine.
4. Add the pine nuts, minced garlic, and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
5. Add the asparagus pieces, cooked mushrooms, and lime juice. Cook until the vegetables are tender and the pasta is heated through.
6. Season the dish with the dried Italian herb seasoning and evaporated milk.
7. Add the baby arugula or spinach and cook until it is wilted.
8. Serve the pasta immediately, garnished with fresh basil leaves and grated parmesan-romano cheese mix.

[/INST]

gt:
Peel potatoes and boil until soft.
Fry Bacon pieces until golden.
Drain potatoes and put back in saucepan, mash add butter and cream until creamy and smooth but still firm.
Add bacon, chicken and cheese to mashed potato mixture and mix well.
Cool a little.
Combine egg and milk until fluffy.
Take small handful of potato mix and roll into a ball.
Dip into egg and roll in breadcrumbs.
Refrigerate for 20 mins until firm.
Heat oil for frying.
Can be deep fried or shallow fried and cook until golden brown.
Drain well.
pred:
To prepare a delicious Chicken, Cheese & Bacon Potato Balls dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, mix the cooked chicken, cheese, bacon, egg, and butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Add the breadcrumbs to the mixture and mix well.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the cream and milk.
6. Roll the chicken and cheese mixture into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
7. Dip each ball into the cream and milk mixture, then coat it with breadcrumbs.
8. Place the breaded balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the potato balls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through.
10. Serve the Chicken, Cheese & Bacon Potato Balls hot, as a delicious and satisfying appetizer or main course.

gt:
Stir buckwheat groats, peanut butter, sugar, and sea salt together in a bowl to coat the groats completely.
Set a food dehydrator to 118 degrees F (244 degrees C).
Spread coated groats onto a sheet and dry in the dehydrator, occasionally breaking larger clumps into smaller bits, until dried, 12 to 24 hours.
pred:
[/SYS]

To make delicious Peanut Butter Buckwheat Cereal, follow these steps:

1. In a medium saucepan, combine the buckwheat groats, peanut butter, sugar, and sea salt.
2. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the buckwheat groats are tender and the peanut butter is melted.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the milk, if desired.
4. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This simple recipe can be easily customized by adding your favorite ingredients, such as chopped nuts, dried fruits, or honey. Enjoy your homemade Peanut Butter Buckwheat Cereal!

gt:
Mix first 3 ingredients until blended.
Combine remaining ingredients in large bowl.
Add mayo mixture; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli florets, cooked bacon, and pineapple.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar until smooth.
3. Pour the dressing over the broccoli mixture and toss to coat evenly.
4. Serve immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/SYS]

gt:
In a shaker filled with ice, combine vodka and juice.
Strain into martini glass and garnish with lemon twist.
pred:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add 1 ounce of pomegranate juice, 3 ounces of vodka, and a twist of lemon.
3. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
4. Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish the drink with the lemon twist.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and visually appealing Vampire Kiss Martini.

gt:
Mix chicken, cornstarch, soy sauce, sherry, sugar and ginger together in a small bowl.
In large skillet or wok, heat oil and keep at medium heat.
Add chicken mixture and cook, stirring often, for 10-15 minutes until chicken is done.
Add frozen vegetables and stir until vegetables are cooked through but still crisp.
Serve over rice.
pred:
[INST]
1. In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with a little water to create a slurry. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the diced chicken and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the slurry of cornstarch and cook until it thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
6. Add the cooking sherry and stir to combine.
7. Add the sugar, ground ginger, and soy sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.
8. Add the frozen oriental-style vegetables to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
9. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine.
10. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
11. Serve the Chicken Stir Fry Oriental over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

gt:
Flatten the breasts gently with a meat mallet.
Dredge lightly in the flour, and cut into strips.
Heat a good layer of oil in a pan.
Fry the strips, stirring, until done.
Use quite a high heat: they will cook quickly.
Drain on kitchen paper, and keep warm.
Fry the sweet pepper strips in the same pan, stirring.
You might have to add more oil.
Fry briefly, so that they are still crisp.
Then add the ginger, garlic and spring onion, and stir through for a minute or so.
Remove from heat, and stir in the Thai sweet chilli sauce.
Put the chicken strips in a serving bowl, and spoon over the peppers and sauce.
Nice-looking if served on top of a mound of jasmine rice, or -- healthier -- brown basmati.
Nice sides are al dente thin baby green beans and a crisp salad.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken breasts with the flour, salt, and coarse black pepper.
3. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
4. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until it is browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the red and yellow bell peppers, ginger, and garlic. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 3-4 minutes.
7. Add the thai sweet chili sauce to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Return the chicken to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and coated the chicken.
9. Serve the chicken and sauce over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat, and cook the onion and garlic until tender.
Mix in potato, broccoli, corn, spinach, mushrooms, carrots, and cabbage.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer 20 minutes, until potato is tender.
Stir egg noodles and white beans into the pot, and continue cooking 7 minutes, or until noodles are tender and beans are heated through.
pred:
[/SYS]

1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the chopped potato, broccoli, corn, spinach, mushrooms, carrots, and cabbage to the pot.
4. Pour the chicken broth over the vegetables, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the egg noodles to the pot, and stir to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the noodles are cooked through.
7. Add the canned white beans to the pot, and stir to combine.
8. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Spring Vegetable Soup hot.

gt:
Heat oil in skillet and cook onion and garlic until soft and fragrant, 6 minutes.
Preheat broiler.
Place scraped squash in bowl, add onions and garlic, basil, salt and pepper and toss well.
Place mixture in buttered 1 quart baking dish.
Sprinkle with cheese and broil for 2-3 minutes until JUST starting to brown.
Serve immediately.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and minced garlic, sautéing until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the spaghetti squash to the skillet, stirring to combine with the onion and garlic mixture. Cook for 5-7 minutes, or until the squash is tender and slightly caramelized.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the fresh basil, salt, and pepper.
5. Transfer the spaghetti squash mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Sprinkle the top of the squash mixture with the grated parmesan cheese.
7. Pour the remaining olive oil over the top of the squash mixture.
8. Sprinkle the minced fresh basil over the top of the olive oil.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Realtor's Spaghetti Squash Au Gratin hot, garnished with additional fresh basil leaves if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Put all ingredients into a microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave on high for 30 seconds, stir to combine.
Continue repeating heating in microwave, using 30 seconds at a time, until completely mixed into smooth consistency.
Cool to room temperature, use as cake/dessert frosting or filling.
pred:
1. First, melt the chocolate in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
2. Once melted, remove the bowl from the heat and stir in the cinnamon baking chips.
3. Gradually add the heavy whipping cream, stirring continuously to prevent lumps from forming.
4. Once the ganache has reached the desired consistency, pour it into a serving dish or a pastry bag.

6. Once the ganache has chilled, use a spatula or a knife to spread it evenly over the desired dessert, such as cake, cookies, or ice cream.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place ground beef in a large, deep skillet.
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown.
Drain fat.
Stir in cabbage and onion soup mix; cook 5 minutes longer, or until lightly browned.
Set aside.
Roll one loaf of bread dough into a 16x8 inch rectangle, then cut into eight 4 inch squares.
Spoon cabbage mixture into center of each square, top with 1 small slice cheese and bring up diagonal points, pinching edges closed.
Place krautburgers on a cookie sheet coated with cooking spray, and let rise for about 10 minutes.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until brown.
Brush tops of warm rolls with margarine.
Repeat process with second loaf of bread and remaining cabbage mixture and cheese.
pred:
To cook a delightful Krautburger dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened.
4. In a small bowl, mix the dry onion soup mix with 1/4 cup of water. Add the mixture to the skillet and stir to combine.
5. Add the shredded cabbage and cook until it is tender.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the sliced Cheddar cheese with a pinch of black pepper.
7. Spread the cooked beef and cabbage mixture evenly over the top of the loaves of frozen bread dough.
8. Sprinkle the cheese mixture evenly over the top of the beef and cabbage.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.

This delicious Krautburger dish combines the flavors of ground beef, cabbage, and Cheddar cheese, creating a satisfying and hearty meal. The use of frozen bread dough as the base adds a unique texture and a convenient way to make the dish without having to prepare the bread from scratch.

gt:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. If using a pizza stone, make sure it is heating in the oven.
Add all dough ingredients into a stand mixer.
Beat on medium speed for about 1 minute.
Once a small dough ball forms and is no longer sticking to the bowl, move to a floured surface.
I added a bit of corn meal, too, to keep it from sticking.
Knead for about 4 minutes until its smooth and elastic.
Roll dough out onto a greased pizza pan or pizza stone.
Spread sauce over dough.
Top with 1 cup of mozzarella, layer with pepperoni and top with additional 1 cup of cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until crust is golden brown.
pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, yeast, sugar, and salt.
2. Gradually add the warm water, oil, and garlic, stirring until the dough comes together.
3. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
6. Punch down the dough, and then divide it into 8 equal pieces.
7. On a lightly floured surface, roll out each piece of dough into a circle, about 1/4 inch thick.
8. Place the rolled-out dough on a lightly floured baking sheet.
9. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
10. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.
11. Add the pepperoni slices on top of the cheese.
12. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
13. Remove the pizza from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and then slice it into 8 equal pieces.

Enjoy your delicious Homemade Pepperoni Pizza!

gt:
Cut the tofu into 1/4-inch matchsticks and place them on paper towels.
Place another paper towel on top and prepare the remaining ingredients.
In a small bowl or measuring cup combine the soy sauce, rice wine or sherry, and the sesame oil.
Combine the salt, pepper and sugar in another small bowl.
Have all the ingredients within arms reach of your pan.
Heat a 14-inch flat-bottomed wok or 12-inch steel skillet over high heat until a drop of water evaporates within a second or two when added to the pan.
Swirl in 1 tablespoon of the oil by adding it to the sides of the pan and swirling the pan, then add the tofu.
Reduce the heat to medium and stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes, until it begins to brown.
Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for no more than 10 seconds.
Swirl in the remaining oil and add the carrots, red pepper, mushrooms, and spring onion or red onion.
Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for 1 minute, or until the vegetables begin to soften.
Add the salt, pepper and sugar, toss together and add the soy sauce mixture.
Stir-fry for 1 to 2 minutes, until the vegetables are crisp-tender, stir in the cilantro and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice wine or dry sherry, dark Asian sesame oil, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside.
3. In a large skillet or wok, heat the peanut or canola oil over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and ginger, and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced tofu and cook until it is golden brown and slightly crispy on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the sliced carrot and red bell pepper to the skillet, and cook until they are tender but still crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender, about 3-5 minutes.
7. Add the sliced mushrooms and scallions or minced red onion to the skillet, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 3-5 minutes.
8. Add the sauce to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
9. Serve the Stir-fried Tofu With Carrots and Red Peppers over a bed of rice or noodles, garnished with cilantro if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat the oven to 350.
Beat the butter until soft.
Add the sugar and beat until fluffy.
Add the eggs& vanilla and beat it all well.
In another bowl mix the flour, cinnamon, baking soda and salt.
Using a mixer on low add the flour mixture to the butter mixture.
Beat until blended.
Use a spoon to add the rest of the ingredients.
Drop onto an ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes or until they are brown.
pred:
To create Martian Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Stir in the oatmeal, chopped nuts, and shredded zucchini.
7. Fold in the chocolate and butterscotch chips.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cookies are set.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your homemade Martian Cookies!

gt:
Place all the broth, vegetables and garlic in a medium pan.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and reduce heat to a low simmer, cooking for about 25 minutes.
Puree the soup in batches in a blender.
Return soup to pot to reheat on medium heat.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with a drizzle of cream on top if desired.
pred:
To make Garlic Soup, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups vegetable or chicken broth, 1 cup minced garlic, and 1 cup chopped peeled yukon gold potato. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.

2. While the potatoes are cooking, chop 1 cup of chopped peeled carrots and set aside.

3. Add the chopped carrots to the pot, along with 1 cup of vegetable or chicken broth. Continue to cook for another 10-15 minutes or until the carrots are tender.

4. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste. If desired, add a dollop of cream for a richer, creamier texture.

5. Serve the Garlic Soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley or chopped green onions, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Garlic Soup!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F. In a medium saute pan over medium heat, brown the ground beef.
Once its browned, remove excess fat with a spoon.
Add the taco seasoning and water and stir to combine.
Heat until it starts to thicken.
Remove from heat.
In a 9x13 lightly greased casserole dish press crescent rolls in the bottom.
Spread meat evenly over the dough.
If choosing to use sour cream then spread that over the beef.
Sprinkle the shredded cheese over the top.
Finish with crushed up Frito chips (I crush them in a zip-lock bag with a rolling pin).
Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until crescent rolls are golden brown.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the taco seasoning to the ground beef, stirring to combine.
4. Add the water to the skillet, stirring to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the liquid has been absorbed by the ground beef.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the crescent roll dough by allowing it to thaw, if frozen.
7. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough into a large circle, or a shape of your choice.
8. Spread the cooked ground beef mixture evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
9. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese over the beef mixture.
10. Roll up the dough, starting from the wide end, and place it seam-side down in a greased 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
11. Bake the taco pie in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
12. If desired, top the taco pie with crushed Frito Chips before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Taco Pie!

gt:
Pour syrup from the can into a bowl.
Cut the pineapple into bite-size pieces, and place them in the pudding molds.
Put the gelatin in water hotter than 80C/175F, following the instructions on the package.
Dissolve it completely, and let it cool.
Pour the dissolved gelatin from Step 3 into the syrup from Step 2, and mix well.
Distribute the liquid mixture equally between the molds with the pineapple.
Refrigerator for at least 1 hour, and serve!
pred:
1. Begin by washing the canned pineapple and removing the top and bottom.
2. Drain the pineapple and chop it into small pieces.
3. In a saucepan, combine the chopped pineapple, 5 grams of gelatin, and 50 ml of hot water.
4. Stir the mixture until the gelatin has fully dissolved.
5. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully pour the mixture into a clean bowl, ensuring that no lumps of gelatin remain.
7. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or until it has set.
8. Once the mixture has set, carefully pour it into a jelly mold or a similar container.
9. Refrigerate the jelly for at least 2 hours or until it has set completely.
10. Once the jelly has set, carefully remove it from the mold and cut it into desired shapes or sizes.
11. Serve the Wobbly Jelly with Canned Pineapple as a delicious and refreshing dessert or snack.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees.
Combine butter, brown sugar, and light corn syrup in a 2-quart sauce pan.
Cook on medium heat until mixture has melted.
Once mixture has melted, add the baking soda.
(NOTE: This will cause the mixture to foam.)
Pour the puffcorn into a large roaster pan.
Pour the caramel mixture over the puffcorn and stir until mixed.
Place in oven for 45 minutes, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes.
Remove from oven, pour onto waxed paper and break apart.
Let cool and then break into individual bites.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 250°F (120°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the Puffcorn, butter, brown sugar, and baking soda. Mix well.
3. In a separate large bowl, heat the light corn syrup and water in the oven until the corn syrup is melted and the mixture reaches 300°F (150°C).
4. Carefully pour the melted corn syrup mixture into the Puffcorn mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the mixture for 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the Puffcorn is golden brown and the mixture is dry.
7. Remove the mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Once the mixture has cooled slightly, carefully pour it onto a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Allow the mixture to cool completely.
10. Break the mixture into bite-sized pieces and enjoy your delicious Puffcorn Caramel Corn!

[/INST]

gt:
Mix all ingredients together and pour in a greased and floured bundt pan.
It will not be a thick batter.
Bake for about 50 minutes to 1 hour at 350 degrees.
You can sprinkle it with powdered sugar if you want to be fancy.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt.
3. Add the buttermilk, vegetable oil, hot tap water, and cocoa to the dry ingredients, stirring until well combined.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in the vanilla extract.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking pan.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Combine the vodka, tomato juice, beef bouillon, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco Sauce, pepper, lemon juice, and celery salt in a Boston shaker over ice, and roll gently to blend.
Strain over ice into a highball glass.
Garnish with a wedge each of lemon and lime.

pred:

3. Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish with a wedge of lemon and a lime wedge, and serve immediately.

This delicious Bloody Bull Recipe dish is a refreshing and flavorful cocktail that combines the bold taste of vodka with the tangy and spicy notes of the tomato juice, beef bouillon, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, and Tabasco Sauce. The addition of lemon juice and celery salt or seeds adds a touch of freshness and depth to the cocktail, while the crushed celery seeds or seeds provide a subtle crunch and aroma. The combination of these ingredients results in a well-balanced and satisfying cocktail that is perfect for a casual gathering or a sophisticated event.

gt:
Bring water to a boil.
Place bee balm in a cup (or a tea ball and then in a cup).
Pour boiling water over bee balm.
Add sweetener, if using, to taste.
Let steep for 10 minutes.
Enjoy!
pred:
To make Bee Balm Tea, follow these steps:

1. Gather the ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon of fresh bee balm edible flowers
- 1 cup of water
- Honey or sugar, to taste (optional)

2. Prepare the tea:
- Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan or kettle.
- If using honey, add it to the water and stir to dissolve.
- If using sugar, add it to the water and stir to dissolve.

3. Add the bee balm:
- Remove the bee balm from the stems and add it to the boiling water.
- Allow the bee balm to steep for a few minutes, until the desired flavor is achieved.

4. Strain the tea:
- Use a fine-mesh strainer or cheesecloth to strain the tea, separating the bee balm from the liquid.
- Discard the bee balm stems and flowers.

5. Serve the tea:
- Pour the tea into a cup and enjoy.

Bee balm tea is a delicious and refreshing beverage that can be enjoyed hot or cold. The natural flavors of the bee balm complement the sweetness of honey or sugar, creating a delightful and soothing drink.

gt:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; pour in vodka, tequila, rum, gin, Cointreau, and sweet and sour mix.
Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker is frosty.
Place a few cubes of ice into a highball glass, and strain in the iced tea.

pred:

3. Pour the shaken mixture into the tall glass with the cola mixture.

4. Stir the mixture gently to combine the ingredients.

5. Serve the delicious Mrs. Baxton's Long Island Iced Tea immediately.

Enjoy your refreshing and flavorful cocktail!

1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).

gt:
Mix dressing and soy sauce until blended.
Heat oil in large nonstick skillet or wok on medium-high heat.

or until no longer pink.

pred:
To make a delicious Chicken Fried Rice with Cilantro dish, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, mix the 1/3 cup of Kraft Asian Sesame Dressing, 1 Tbsp. reduced-sodium soy sauce, and 2 tsp. oil. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the minced gingerroot and garlic, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the lean ground chicken to the skillet, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Cook until the chicken is browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the beaten eggs to the skillet, stirring gently to scramble them with the chicken. Cook until the eggs are cooked through and the chicken is fully cooked.
5. Add the cooked long-grain white rice to the skillet, stirring to combine with the chicken and eggs. Cook for a few minutes, until the rice is heated through.
6. Stir in the 2-2/3 cups of cooked long-grain white rice, cooled.
7. Add the chopped green onions and minced cilantro to the skillet, stirring to combine.
8. Pour the prepared dressing mixture over the rice and chicken mixture, stirring to coat everything evenly. Cook for a few minutes, until the dressing is absorbed and the rice is heated through.
9. Serve the Chicken Fried Rice with Cilantro dish immediately, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

This delicious Chicken Fried Rice with Cilantro dish is a flavorful and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by everyone.

gt:

4. Bake the rolls:

5. Serve and enjoy:

- Cut the rolls into slices and serve them warm.

gt:

To make the Easy Upside-Down Black Forest Pie, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the frozen cherry pie on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
3. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely.
4. While the pie is cooling, prepare the chocolate fudge topping by melting the chocolate chips in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water.
5. Once the chocolate is melted, stir in the powdered sugar and vanilla extract until smooth.
6. Spread the melted chocolate mixture evenly over the cooled pie crust.
7. Place the pie back in the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the chocolate is set and the edges are slightly crispy.
8. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely.
9. In a small bowl, mix the sliced almonds with a pinch of salt.
10. Spread the Cool Whip or reddi whipped cream evenly over the chocolate topping.
11. Sprinkle the almond mixture over the whipped cream.
12. Place the pie in the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

gt:
strawberry jello make 1cup hot boiling water, 1cup ice cold water.make this the night before making cake.put in refrigerator over night.
preheat oven and bake on 375
sift together flour, baking powder, and salt
cream shortening.add sugar gradually and cream together umtil light and fluffy.add eggs, one at a time, and beat well after each addition.add sifted dry ingredients alternately with milk a small amount at a time.
beating after each addition untill smooth.
add vanilla.
pour into greased pans, any size u need, this will be 2 -8"pans.bake for 25 to 30 minutes.
when cake is done baking, set cakes on wire rack to cool completely.
clean strawberrys and slice, drain crushed pineapples in colander,slice bananas and crush peacans.
place place one piece of cake on bottom, place strawberrys slices on top of cake, place half of jello on top of strawberrys, whip cream 1cup, add another cake ontop of whip cream.
now add pineapples, jello, whip cream, cake, bananas slices , whip cream, peacans,maraschino cherries.
i made 3- 6"inch cakes to do this cake.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sifted cake flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the shortening and sugar to the bowl, and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together.
5. Add the vanilla extract to the egg mixture.
6. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until the batter is smooth.
7. Fold in the chopped peanuts and sliced bananas.
8. Spread the batter evenly into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
9. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed pineapple, drained juice, and cool whip.
12. Fold in the chopped strawberries and maraschino cherries.
13. Spread the fruit mixture evenly over the cooled cake.
14. Chill the cake and fruit mixture in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight.
15. Garnish the cake with additional chopped peanuts and maraschino cherries, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Fruity Crystal Cake!

gt:

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and refreshing Fresh Fig and Date Shake, which is both nutritious and visually appealing.

gt:
Preheat the oven to gas 7 / 220C / 450F and line a baking tray with foil
Pour the sunflower oil in the tray and toss the potato chunks in it
Roast for 40 minutes until golden and crispy
15 minutes after the potatoes go in the oven, put the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat and cook off the onion until soft and translucent
Add the garlic, chilli flakes and paprika and stir in for 1 minute on a low heat
Pour in the can of chopped tomatoes and the sugar and bring to a simmer, uncovered
Stir often for the next 10 - 15 minutes until a thick sauce forms, then add the vinegar
Pour the sauce onto a serving plate, lay the potatoes on top, season with salrt & pepper and garnish with fresh parsley
A great side dish that can be served alongside a bowl of olives, cheese stuffed sweet peppers, serrano ham croquettes or maybe my Spanish Chicken dish!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a large bowl, toss the diced potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread the potatoes evenly on a baking sheet.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the sunflower oil, garlic, chili flakes, smoked paprika, sugar, and balsamic vinegar.
4. Pour the oil mixture over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly.
5. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
6. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked potatoes, canned tomatoes, and chopped onion. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Vickys Spanish-Style Potatoes hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

This cooking tutorial demonstrates how to prepare a delicious and healthy gluten-free, dairy-free, egg-free, and soy-free version of Vickys Spanish-Style Potatoes. The recipe uses waxy potatoes, sunflower and olive oil, garlic, onion, chili flakes, smoked paprika, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper to create a flavorful and satisfying dish. The cooking process involves roasting the potatoes in the oven, which adds a crispy texture and enhances the natural flavors of the ingredients. The final result is a nutritious and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by people with dietary restrictions or preferences.

gt:
To make Cupcakes: Preheat oven to 350F.
Line 12-cup muffin pan with paper liners.
Whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in large bowl, and set aside.
Wrap squash tightly in kitchen towel, and wring out excess moisture.
Set aside.
(You should now have 3/4 cup squash.)
Cream butter with electric mixer until smooth and light.
Add sugar and vanilla, and beat on medium-high speed 1 minute.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
With mixer on medium-low speed, alternate adding flour mixture and yogurt in three additions.
Stir in squash and lemon and orange zests.
Divide batter among prepared muffin cups, and bake 27 to 30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of cupcakes comes out clean.
Cool.
To make Glaze: whisk together all ingredients in small bowl.
Spread Glaze on tops of Cupcakes, letting it drip over sides.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the grated squash, vanilla extract, and eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the Greek yogurt to the batter, alternating with the lemon and orange zest, and mix until just combined.
5. Gradually add the confectioners sugar, lemon juice, and orange juice to the batter, mixing until smooth and well-combined.
6. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared muffin cups.
7. Bake the cupcakes for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once cooled, frost the cupcakes with the desired amount of confectioners sugar frosting, and decorate with orange and lemon zest for a pop of citrus flavor.

Enjoy your delicious Summer Squash Citrus Yogurt Cupcakes!

gt:
1) In a large mixing bowl, blend all dry ingredients.
2) In a medium mixing bowl, whisk all wet ingredients together.
3) Make a well in the dry ingredients and add all wet ingredients at once.
Mix just until dry ingredients are incorporated.
Over mixing will give you a tough result.
4) Pour about 1/3 cup batter onto a hot, lightly oiled griddle.
Carefully flip when you start to see bubbles.
You can check to see if the pancake has browned with a spatula before flipping.
Makes about 15 six-inch pancakes.
For thinner pancakes, simply add more milk for desired consistency.
pred:
To cook a delightful Vanilla Yogurt Whole Grain Pancakes dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 2-1/2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1-1/2 cups of whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup of sugar, 3 tablespoons of wheat germ, 2 teaspoons of baking powder, 1 teaspoon of soda, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt.

2. In a separate bowl, whisk together 3 cups of milk, 6 ounces of weighted container of Vanilla Yogurt, and 1/4 cup of canola or vegetable oil.

3. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.

4. Add the two whole large eggs, beaten, and the vanilla extract to the batter.

5. Preheat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.

6. Pour the batter onto the pan or griddle, using a ladle or spoon, to create evenly sized pancakes. Cook the pancakes until they are golden brown on both sides and the edges are slightly crispy.

7. Serve the Vanilla Yogurt Whole Grain Pancakes warm, with your favorite toppings or syrup.

gt:
In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt and pepper.
Set aside.
Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until golden and crispy.
When its done, remove it from the skillet onto a paper towel.
Drain off all of the bacon fat, leaving just a smidgen in the pan to elevate the flavor of the eggs.
Turn the heat way down and let the pan cool off a bit.
So just give it a few minutes to cool before pouring in the egg mixture and youll be good to go.
Stir the eggs around until theyre cooked through.
Then remove the pan from the heat.
Butter one side of each slice of bread and preheat your panini press according to manufacturers instructions.
Lay 4 slices of bread butter-side-down onto the press.
Top with scrambled eggs, bacon and cheese.
Place second slice of bread, butter-side-up on top of the cheese and close the press.
Cook until dark golden.
Cut and serve!
pred:

2. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
3. In another small bowl, mix the grated cheese.
4. Cut the bacon into small, evenly sized pieces.
5. Spread a thin layer of butter on one side of each slice of whole wheat bread.
6. Place the bread slices, buttered side down, on a plate or a tray.
7. Dip each slice of bacon into the egg mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
8. Place a piece of bacon on top of each bread slice, buttered side up.

10. Place the bread slices, with the bacon and cheese, into the panini maker or skillet.
11. Cook the panini maker or skillet on medium heat until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Carefully remove the panini from the panini maker or skillet and let it rest for a moment before cutting it into slices.

Enjoy your delicious Bacon and Eggs Breakfast Panini!

gt:

semisweet chocolate pieces over low heat until melted.

Stir in chopped cookies.
Use a small scoop to drop mounds of mixture on the prepared trays.
Cover and freeze for 15 minutes or until firm.
In a small heavy saucepan (or double boiler), combine the 2 1/4 cups milk chocolate pieces; heat and stir over low heat until melted and smooth.
Remove from heat.
Line another tray or baking sheet with waxed paper.
Using a fork, dip balls into chocolate mixture, allowing excess chocolate to drop back into the saucepan.
Place dipped balls into tray.
(Sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles).
Chill for about 30 minutes.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, melt the 12 oz of semisweet chocolate pieces in the microwave or on the stovetop.
2. Once melted, stir in the 8 oz of finely chopped chocolate sandwich cookies with white filling.
3. Mix well until the cookies are evenly coated with the chocolate.
4. Add the 2 1/4 cup of Milk chocolate or semisweet chocolate pieces to the bowl and stir until smooth.
5. Add the 8 oz of cream cheese, softened, and stir until well combined.
6. If desired, sprinkle the top with chocolate sprinkles for extra decoration.
7. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. After the chocolate has set, scoop the mixture into small balls and roll them in your hands to form a smooth truffle shape.
9. Store the truffles in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

Please provide the step-by-step instructions for cooking a delicious Cookie Truffles from scratch using the following ingredients: 12 oz pkg. semisweet chocolate pieces,8 oz pkg. (gluten free) chocolate sandwich cookies with white filling (about 20 cookies), finely chopped,2 1/4 cup Milk chocolate or semisweet chocolate pieces,8 oz pkg. cream cheese, cut up and softened,1 (Optional - chocolate sprinkles).

gt:
Sprinkle chicken evenly with salt and pepper.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in Dutch oven over medium-high heat; add chicken, and cook 5 minutes or until lightly browned.
Removed chicken with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add onion, garlic, tomatoes, mushrooms, artichoke hearts and rosemary to Dutch oven; saute 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Drain and remove from Dutch oven.
Add remaining 1 tablespoon butter, wine and cream cheese to Dutch oven.
Reduce heat to low, stir until cream cheese is completely melted, then gradually whisk in nonfat milk.
Add chicken, vegetables, cooked fettuccine and Parmesan cheese, tossing gently.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter and cook the onion and garlic until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the mushrooms to the pan and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the artichoke quarters, rosemary, and wine to the pan. Cook until the liquid has reduced by half, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the cream cheese to the pan and stir until melted and smooth.
7. Add the cooked chicken back to the pan, along with the cooked pasta. Stir to combine all the ingredients.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the mixture to a large baking dish and top with the grated parmesan cheese.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
11. Serve the Chicken-Artichoke Pasta With Rosemary hot.

[/INST]

gt:
Mix brown sugar, butter and cracker crumbs and press into a square pan.
Sprinkle the coconut evenly on top.
Sprinkle the chocolate chips even on top of the coconut.
Pour the Eagle Brand evenly over top to completely cover.
Sprinkle with the slivered almonds.
Bake at 400 degrees F. for 15-20 minutes.
pred:
To cook a delightful Hello Dollies dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cups of butter and the 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs.
3. Add the 1 tablespoon of brown sugar and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the 1 cup of shredded coconut, 1 cup of chocolate chips, and 1 cup of slivered almonds.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the 1 (8 ounce) can of condensed milk with 1 cup of water.
6. Pour the liquid mixture into the bowl with the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
7. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden brown.
9. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
10. Using a spatula or your hands, carefully transfer the mixture to a serving dish.
