gt:
Preheat the oven to 375F.
In a small bowl, mix together the butter and the lemon zest and juice until well combined.
Put the hens, breast side up, on a work surface.
Spread the butter under the skin and on top of the breasts and thighs.
Lay the lemon slices on top and inside the birds.
Pour the salt into a large bowl.
Slowly add enough water to the salt to create the consistency of wet sand.
Spread a thin layer of the wet salt on the bottom of an ovenproof dish or cast-iron pan large enough to hold the birds.
Place the hens on top, then cover completely with the remaining salt mixture.
Pat the salt securely around the birds to make sure there are no holes that will allow steam to escape.
Roast the hens for 1 hour.
The salt will harden and turn golden brown.
Remove from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes.
Using the back of a large knife, crack open the crust.
Remove the hens and place them on a wooden board.
Cut in half lengthwise and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the lemon zest and juice, then set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the coarse sea salt, cornmeal, and black pepper.
4. Season the Cornish hens with salt and pepper, then coat them evenly in the cornmeal mixture.
5. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced lemon and cook until it is softened and fragrant.
6. Remove the lemon from the skillet and set aside.
7. Add the hens to the skillet and cook until they are golden brown on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
8. Remove the hens from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
9. Brush the hens with the lemon butter mixture, then sprinkle them with the reserved lemon zest and juice.
10. Bake the hens in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
11. Remove the hens from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your Salt-Crusted Cornish Hens With Lemon Butter!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Coat muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray.
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add the egg yolks, one at a time.
Beat well after each.
In a separate bowl, stir together the dry ingredients.
With the mixer on low speed, add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture, alternating two times with the yogurt, vanilla, milk, and orange juice.
Beat just until smooth.
In another bowl, beat the egg whites until soft peaks form.
Fold into batter.
Fold in the strawberries and almonds.
Spoon the batter into the prepared pan, 3/4-full.
Bake at 350F for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing to cool completely.
pred:
To make delicious Strawberry Almond Muffins, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk and orange juice, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the chopped strawberries and slivered almonds.
7. Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups in a muffin tin.
8. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Strawberry Almond Muffins!

gt:
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter.
Saute onions 10 minutes, or until tender.
In a medium bowl, combine remaining ingredients and mix well.
Stir in sauteed onions.
Spoon into a greased 2 quart baking dish.
Bake at 375% for 25 minutes.
Let stand for 10 minutes.
Serve with crackers or chips of choice.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the butter, minced garlic, and shredded Swiss cheese.
3. Add the drained water chestnuts and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, hot sauce, and minced onion.
5. Pour the mayonnaise mixture over the cheese and water chestnut mixture, and mix well.
6. Add the chopped vidalia onions to the mixture and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the Baked Vidalia Dip warm, and enjoy!

gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F.
Heat oil in nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.
Add vegetables and garlic; cook and stir 5 min.
Stir in pasta sauce and water; cover.
Simmer on medium heat 5 min.
or until heated through, stirring occasionally.
Spray 8-inch square baking dish with cooking spray.
Break noodles to fit dish.
Spread 1/4 cup sauce onto bottom of prepared dish; top with layers of 1/3 each of the noodles, remaining sauce and cheese.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining noodles and sauce; cover.
Bake 30 min.
Top with remaining cheese; bake, uncovered, 15 min.
or until heated through.
Let stand 10 min.
before cutting to serve.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook until the onion is softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the shredded zucchini and carrots to the pan, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Pour the Classico di Napoli Tomato & Basil Pasta Sauce into the pan, stirring to combine.
7. Add the water and bring the mixture to a simmer. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until it has thickened slightly.
8. Meanwhile, prepare the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions.
9. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded Cracker Barrel Shredded Light 4 Cheese Italiano Cheese, and divide the mixture evenly among the lasagna noodles.
10. Assemble the lasagna by layering the noodles, sauce, and cheese mixture in the pan.
11. Place the assembled lasagna in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the lasagna is hot and bubbly, and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Remove the lasagna from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Saute the onion, garlic and sausage in the olive oil over medium-high heat, until onions are limp and the sausage has rendered its fat and is turning a bit crispy.
Add the well drained quinoa and saute briefly until it is lightly browned.
Add the mustard seeds and saute for a minute or two, to bring out the flavor.
Add the broth and bring to a boil.
Lower the heat, add the salt, pepper, herbs de provence, and put on a lid.
Let it cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until the water has been completely absorbed and the quinoa is no longer hard.
Add the fresh herbs and green peas.
Taste, and adjust the seasoning if needed.
I occasionally find that the quinoa is tender before all the liquid is absorbed.
I just drain off the excess.
Serve warm or cold.
This will keep in the refrigerator, well covered, for 2 to 3 days.
pred:
[INST]To prepare the Quinoa With Peas and Sausage, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan or pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the finely chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 3-5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and continue to cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the sausage to the pot and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Add the quinoa, chicken broth, mustard seeds, herbes de provence, peas, salt, and pepper to the pot.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot.
7. Simmer the quinoa and sausage mixture for about 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Remove the pot from the heat and let it sit, covered, for a few minutes.
9. Fluff the cooked quinoa with a fork and stir in the chopped parsley.
10. Serve the Quinoa With Peas and Sausage hot, garnished with additional parsley if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Pound chicken to flatten to about 1/4 inch thick.
Season with salt, pepper and garlic to taste.
Place a slice of ham and a slice of cheese on each.
Roll up as you would a jelly roll and secure with toothpicks or poultry string.
Brown chicken on all sides in oil or butter and place in casserole dish.
Mix white wine and mushroom soup and pour over chicken.
Bake at 350 degrees for 35-45 minutes or until done.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
3. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe frying pan over medium-high heat. Add butter or oil, and cook the chicken breasts until browned on both sides and cooked through.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the sliced deli ham and cook until browned.
6. Add the sliced swiss cheese to the skillet and cook until melted and bubbly.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream of mushroom soup, white wine, and minced garlic.
8. Pour the mixture over the cooked chicken and ham in the skillet.
9. Return the chicken to the skillet, and cook until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbly.
10. Serve the French Style Chicken Breasts over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy!

gt:
Position racks in upper and lower thirds of oven; preheat to 300F.
Coat 2 large baking sheets with cooking spray.
Mix flour, sugar, butter, orange zest, orange juice and vanilla in a medium bowl until smooth.
Spread 1 tablespoon of batter into a 2 1/2-inch circle on the prepared baking sheet.
Repeat with the remaining batter, making 6 cookies per baking sheet, spacing them about 4 inches apart.
Bake the cookies until lightly browned around the edges, switching the pans back to front and top to bottom once halfway through, 16 to 18 minutes.
Immediately and carefully transfer the cookies from the pan to a wire rack using a thin metal spatula.
Let cool completely.
pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To make Orange Crisps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the white whole wheat flour, whole wheat pastry flour, sugar, and melted butter. Mix until the dough comes together.
3. Add the orange zest, orange juice, and vanilla extract to the dough. Mix until the dough is well combined.
4. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it a few times.
5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the cut-out shapes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the crisps for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Remove the crisps from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/INST]

[INST]Note: If using white whole wheat flour, you may need to adjust the baking time and temperature to ensure that the crisps are cooked through and do not become too dark or burnt.

gt:
Crumble Italian sausage into a large skillet.
Brown sausage until no longer pink and drain onto paper towels.
Wipe out skillet with paper towels.
Add 1 tablespoon olive oil to pan and heat until shimmering.
Add onion and saute until translucent.
Stir in the cooked Italian sausage, tomatoes (undrained), tomato paste, sugar, half of the basil and the pepper.
Bring to boil then reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally and breaking up the tomatoes with the back of a spoon.
In a small bowl blend ricotta, egg, parsley, Parmaigano-Reggiano and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Put a layer of noodles in a 9 X 13 pan, a layer of meat sauce, layer of ricotta mixture and a layer of the cheese then repeat all the layers twice more.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes.
Uncover and bake 20 minutes more.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting and serving.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar, and black pepper. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked sausage, onion mixture, ricotta cheese, egg, and parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Spread a thin layer of sauce over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Layer the noodles on top of the sauce, then pour the sausage and cheese mixture over the noodles.
8. Repeat the layering process, ending with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
9. Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
10. Remove the lasagna from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before cutting and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Italian Sausage Lasagna!

gt:
In a large skillet, warm the veggie burger a bit.
Add the chopped onion, and cook until the onion is soft and the garlic, tomatoes, tomato paste, peppers, spices, and cornmeal, stirring to combine and allowing to simmer for about 1 minute, just till everything is hot.
Spoon the chili into an ovenproof 2- to 2 1/2-quart crock or casserole dish; add sufficient water to cover.
Cover the dish, with a lid or foil, and bake the chili in a preheated 275F oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Stir the chili after 1 hour, adding a bit of tomato juice or water if most of the liquid has evaporated, and it seems dry.
Half an hour before serving, stir in the beans, and cook until heated through.
Garnish the chili with fresh cilantro and and grated veggie cheese (with a bit of lime zest added to it), if desired.
pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the substitute, onions, garlic, and green bell pepper to the skillet or pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, cumin, and cayenne pepper (or hot sauce) to the skillet or pot. Stir to combine.
5. If using cornmeal, add it to the skillet or pot and stir to coat the ingredients evenly.
6. Add the water, kidney beans (or black beans), and cornmeal mixture. Stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the chili is thick and flavorful.
8. If desired, add the vegetarian cheddar cheese to the chili and stir to melt.
9. Season with lime zest (optional) for a burst of citrus flavor.
10. Transfer the chili to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Serve the Veggieful Oven-Baked Chili hot, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Veggieful Oven-Baked Chili!

gt:
Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain and rinse w/ cold water until cooled.
Drain again.
Place cooled drain macaroni in a large mixing bowl and add all remaining ingredients.
Stir well to evenly mix.
Chill about 2 hours before serving.
pred:
To make a delicious Salmon Salad dish, follow these steps:

1. Cook the uncooked macaroni according to the package instructions until it reaches the desired level of doneness.
2. While the macaroni is cooking, flake the cooked salmon and set aside.
3. Boil the eggs until they are cooked through, then chop them into small pieces.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked macaroni, flaked salmon, chopped eggs, diced cheddar cheese, grape tomatoes, scallions, sweet gherkin, and sweet pickle juice.
5. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.
6. Season the salad with dried dill weed, pepper, and salt to taste.
7. Serve the Salmon Salad immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

This delicious Salmon Salad dish is perfect for a light meal or a side dish, and the combination of ingredients creates a flavorful and satisfying dish.

gt:
The night before you are cooking the beans soak in water 6-8 hours or overnight as bag suggests.
The next morning drain and rinse your beans well.
Add all ingredients to crop pot and cook on low for 12 hours or on high for 8 hours stirring occasionally.
Add salt and pepper to taste after it has been cooking a while.
I like mine a little juicy, it makes a great bean soup as well.
Serve over rice.
:)
serves 4-8 Ppl depending upon how much you like it.
lol
pred:
1. Rinse the dry red kidney beans and place them in a large pot with the Knorr Concentrated Vegetable stock. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and let simmer for about 1 hour or until the beans are tender.

2. While the beans are cooking, heat a large skillet with the Downhome Smoked sausage over medium heat. Cook the sausage until it is browned and cooked through.

3. Once the beans are tender, add the cooked sausage to the pot.

4. Add the Knorr Concentrated Chicken stock to the pot, and stir to combine.

5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the flavors have melded together.

6. Season the beans and sausage mixture with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.

7. Serve the Diva's Red Beans and Rice hot, over rice or with your favorite side dish.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Rinse the new zealand orange roughy fillet and pat it dry with paper towels.
3. Season the fish with salt and pepper, to taste.
4. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice with a tablespoon of butter (optional).
5. Place the fish fillet on a baking sheet or a foil-lined baking sheet.
6. Brush the fish fillet with the lemon-butter mixture.
7. Add the fresh dill sprigs on top of the fish fillet.
8. Bake the fish for 12-15 minutes, or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
9. Remove the fish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious It's Fish, Okay? dish!

gt:
Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Mix in rum.
Heat over medium heat until apple mixture is juicy and the juice boils.
Boil for 20 minutes over medium heat.
Enjoy!
:).
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the peeled, cored, and cut apples with the white sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and rum. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Transfer the apple mixture to a baking dish, making sure to evenly distribute it.
4. Bake the apples in the preheated oven for about 30-45 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
5. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the Drunken Apples immediately, or let them cool completely before storing them in an airtight container.

Enjoy your delicious Drunken Apples, inspired by Famous Dave's!

gt:
1.
Bring stock to a simmer in a saucepan (do not boil).
Keep warm over low heat.2.
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add olive oil; swirl to coat.
Add pancetta; saute 6 minutes or until crisp.
Using a slotted spoon, remove pancetta from pan; drain on a paper towel.
Add shallots to drippings in pan; cook 2 minutes (do not brown), stirring frequently.
Stir in rice, rosemary, and garlic; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add wine; cook 2 minutes or until liquid is absorbed, stirring frequently.
Stir in 1 1/2 cups stock; cook 4 minutes or until liquid is nearly absorbed, stirring constantly.
Add remaining stock, 3/4 cup at a time, stirring nearly constantly until each portion of stock is absorbed before adding the next (about 22 minutes total); reserve 1/3 cup stock at the last addition.
Stir in pepper, truffle oil, and salt.
Remove pan from heat; stir in reserved 1/3 cup broth.
Top with pancetta.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
3. Add the rice to the saucepan and stir to coat the rice with the oil. Cook for about 1 minute, or until the rice is slightly toasted.
4. Pour in the chicken stock, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly to prevent the rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
5. Cook the risotto until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, about 20-25 minutes.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the chopped pancetta, rosemary, garlic, and white truffle oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the risotto to a large oven-safe dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and crispy.
8. Serve the Pancetta Risotto with Truffle Oil immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
Scrub and quarter potatoes.
Place potatoes in 8x8 inch baking dish.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter, garlic, salt, paprika, and lemon juice.
Pour over potatoes and stir to coat.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over potatoes.
Cover and bake for 30 minutes.
Uncover and bake an additional 10 minutes, until golden brown.
pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Garlicky Baby Reds, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the baby red potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, minced garlic, salt, paprika, and lemon juice. Mix well.
4. Add the baby red potatoes to the bowl and toss them to coat them evenly with the butter mixture.
5. Transfer the potatoes to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
7. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Garlicky Baby Reds hot, garnished with grated parmesan cheese if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Garlicky Baby Reds!

gt:
Combine potatoes, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, chicken broth and cream of chicken soup and seasonings in a dutch oven.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat to a simmer for 20 minutes or until vegetables are semi-tender.
Melt butter in a medium skillet and brown chicken until no longer pink.
Add to vegetable mixture along with frozen peas.
Cover and simmer until vegetables are tender.
Serve over warm biscuits.
pred:
To prepare a perfect Chicken Stew, follow these key steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the cubed chicken breast and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the sliced carrots, celery, and potato, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10-12 minutes.
5. Pour in the chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, and seasonings (salt, pepper, poultry seasoning). Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the frozen peas and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until they are heated through.
8. Serve the Chicken Stew hot, garnished with fresh herbs, such as parsley or thyme, for added flavor and presentation.

By following these key steps, you will be able to create a delicious and comforting Chicken Stew that your family and friends will enjoy.

gt:
Cut the firm tofu into 6 equal pieces and lay on 2 layers of paper towels.
The tofu pieces should be around 1 cm thick.
Now place another paper towel on top of the tofu and pat dry.
Add butter to a heated frying pan.
Cook the tofu for 5 minutes over medium heat.
Flip the tofu, being careful not to break it.
Cook for 5 more minutes over medium heat.
Mix together all of the ingredients and add to the pan.
Shake the pan and cook until the liquid is reduced.
Sprinkle with parsley and it's done.
pred:
To create a delicious Firm Tofu Steak Seasoned with Black Pepper, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the tofu: Cut the tofu into thin slices, and press it between paper towels to remove excess water.

2. Prepare the seasoning: In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, cooking sake, mirin, and black pepper.

3. Heat a frying pan or skillet over medium heat. Add a small amount of butter and let it melt.

4. Add the tofu slices to the pan, and cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and slightly crispy.

5. Remove the tofu slices from the pan and place them on a plate.

6. Add the seasoning mixture to the pan, and stir to coat the tofu evenly. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the tofu is coated with a rich, savory sauce.

7. Serve the Firm Tofu Steak Seasoned with Black Pepper immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of parsley.

Enjoy your delicious Firm Tofu Steak Seasoned with Black Pepper!

gt:
1.
Cut green beans to fit inside pint canning jars.
2.
Place green beans in a steamer over 1 inch of boiling water, and cover.
Cook until tender but still firm, for 3 minutes.
Plunge beans into ice water.
Drain well.
3.
Pack the beans into four hot, sterilized pint jars.
Place 1 clove garlic and 2 sprigs dill weed in each jar, against the glass.
Add 1 teaspoon of salt to each jar.
4.
In a large saucepan over high heat, bring vinegar and water to a boil.
Pour over beans.
5.
Fit the jars with lids and rings and process for 10 minutes in a boiling water bath.
pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the 2 lbs fresh green beans, rinsed and trimmed, with 4 garlic cloves, peeled. Cook over medium heat for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the beans are tender but still crisp.

2. In a small bowl, mix together 4 teaspoons salt, 2 12 cups white vinegar, and 2 12 cups water. Pour the mixture over the beans and stir to combine.

3. Allow the mixture to sit for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. The beans should be fully submerged in the liquid.

4. After the time has passed, drain the beans and rinse them under cold water to stop the cooking process and remove any excess salt.

5. In a large bowl, combine the drained beans with 4 sprigs fresh dill weed. Stir to combine and let the flavors meld together for at least 30 minutes before serving.

6. Serve the Pickled Green Beans "Dilly Beans" as a side dish or a snack, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

gt:
Slice up your loaf of bread into 1-inch thick slices.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, half-and-half and cinnamon.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture, being sure to coat both sides.
Cook up on a griddle for about 23 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
For the banana sauce, in a pan on the stove set to medium low heat, melt up the butter and add in the brown sugar.
Add to the mixture the syrup, cinnamon, salt and vanilla.
Add in the bananas.
Stir to coat bananas completely.
Remove from heat.
To make the whipped cream, whip together your cream, maple syrup and sugar until stiff peaks form.
Serve the French toast with the banana sauce over it, topped with the whipped cream.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the Hawaiian bread into 1-inch cubes.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, half-and-half, cinnamon, and vanilla until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, melt the butter over low heat.
5. Add the brown sugar to the melted butter and stir until smooth.
6. Add the maple syrup to the butter mixture and stir until well combined.
7. Add the cinnamon, salt, and heavy cream to the butter mixture and stir until well combined.
8. Add the sliced bananas to the mixture and stir until well coated.
9. Pour the mixture over the cubed bread in a large baking dish.
10. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the center is cooked through.
11. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
12. Serve the Bananas Foster French Toast warm, garnished with a dusting of powdered sugar and a drizzle of maple syrup.

Enjoy your delicious Bananas Foster French Toast!

gt:
Preheat oven to 500.
Rinse salmon, pat dry and place on a metal baking sheet.
Rub each fillet with olive oil.
Squeeze the juice from one-half lime onto each fillet.
Sprinkle fillets with salt and chipotle, then place a half lime on top of each fillet.
Turn down oven temperature to 275.
Place salmon in oven and cook for 8-12 minutes, depending on how well done you like your fish.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper on both sides.
3. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lime juice, and minced garlic.
4. Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet, and brush them with the olive oil mixture.
5. Bake the salmon for 12-15 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
6. While the salmon is baking, prepare the sliced limes by placing them in a small bowl.
7. Once the salmon is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Squeeze the lime juice over the salmon, and sprinkle the dried chipotle powder on top.
9. Serve the Chipotle Lime Salmon immediately, and enjoy the delicious flavors of the spicy, tangy, and smoky combination.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F
Line 12 cup muffin pan with cupcake liners or grease with butter well
Mix all ingredients together in large bowl until just moistened
Pour equal amounts of batter into each muffin cup
Option: u may top with a sprinkle of a few more chocolate chips before baking
Bake for about 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted comes out clean
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, flour, baking soda, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the sour cream, eggs, and butter.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Fill the muffin cups in a muffin pan with batter, about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

These muffins are a delicious and easy treat that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of bananas and chocolate chips creates a delightful and moist texture, while the baking soda adds a subtle tanginess to the muffins. The sour cream and eggs provide a rich and tender crumb, making these muffins a perfect choice for a quick breakfast or a tasty snack.

gt:
In a medium bowl cream together the sugar and butter until smooth.
Stir in the egg and vanilla.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt, gradually stir into the creamed mixture until all flour is absorbed.
Shape dough into rolls about 1 1/2 inches in diameter.
Wrap in waxed paper; refrigerate until firm, at least 4 hours or up to 1 week.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Grease cookie sheets.
Unwrap chilled rolls and cut into 1/4 inch thick slices.
Place cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned.
Remove from baking sheets immediately to cool on wire racks.
pred:
[START]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until a smooth dough forms.
6. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
7. Cut out desired shapes using cookie cutters or a knife.
8. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a non-stick mat.
9. Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/START]

[/INST]

gt:
Stir cream cheese in 9 deep pie dish until smooth.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Bake at 350F.
for 20 min.
until hot and bubbling.
Stir.
Serve with vegetables and crackers.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, chicken breasts, and red hot pepper sauce. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the sauce.
3. Add the blue cheese dressing and mix until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.
5. Serve the hot Buffalo Chicken Dip immediately, and enjoy with your favorite dipping items, such as tortilla chips or pita bread.

[/INST]

gt:
In a large nonstick skillet, heat the olive oil.
Season the scallops with salt and pepper and cook over moderately high heat until golden brown on the bottom, 2 to 3 minutes.
Turn the scallops and cook until just opaque throughout, 2 to 3 minutes longer.
Transfer to a platter and keep warm.
Melt the butter in the skillet.
Add the sliced fennel and capers and cook over high heat, stirring, until the fennel is crisp-tender and lightly golden, 2 minutes.
Stir in the lemon juice and parsley and season with salt and pepper.
Spoon the fennel around the scallops and garnish with chopped fennel fronds.
Serve with lemon wedges.
pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Scallops with Fennel Grenobloise, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced fennel and cook until it is tender but still slightly crunchy. Season with salt and pepper.
3. Add the capers and lemon juice to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
4. Remove the fennel mixture from the heat and set aside to cool slightly.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the butter, salt, and pepper.
6. Heat a large oven-safe skillet or baking dish over medium heat. Add the scallops and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the edges are slightly browned.
7. Carefully transfer the scallops to the prepared skillet or baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the scallops and toss to coat evenly.
8. Add the cooled fennel mixture over the scallops.
9. Roast the scallops in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
10. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
11. Serve the Scallops with Fennel Grenobloise immediately, garnished with the fennel fronds.

[/INST]

gt:
In a large heavy pot, heat the butter over medium heat until hot, stir the onions, carrots, celery, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in the chicken and stock bring to a gentle boil.
Cook the soup, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through, about 20 minutes.
Stir in the pasta and cook until al dente.
Stir in the spinach and cook until tender, about 4 minutes.
Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
pred:
To cook a delicious Baby Spinach Chicken Noodle Soup, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the 2 tablespoons of unsalted butter over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onions and carrots to the pot, and cook until they are tender and slightly browned.
3. Add the chopped celery stalk and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to the pot, and stir to combine.
5. Pour in the 8 cups of chicken stock, and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Add the 2 pounds of boneless skinless chicken breasts to the pot, and cook until they are fully cooked through.
7. While the chicken is cooking, cook the pasta spirals according to the package instructions.
8. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the pot and set aside to cool slightly.
9. In a blender or food processor, puree the baby spinach until smooth.
10. Pour the blended spinach into the pot with the chicken and chicken stock.
11. Bring the soup back to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the spinach is fully cooked and the flavors have melded together.
12. Add the cooked pasta spirals to the pot, and stir to combine.
13. Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning as needed.
14. Serve the Baby Spinach Chicken Noodle Soup hot, garnished with freshly grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Finely grind fennel seeds in grinder, then whisk together with salt, pepper, and lemon juice in a small bowl.
Add 1 tablespoon oil in a slow stream, whisking until combined.
Shave fennel bulb with slicer crosswise into paper-thin slices until you have enough to measure 1 packed cup.
(Halve bulb lengthwise if too large for slicer.)
Toss with 2 teaspoons vinaigrette in another small bowl.
Toss crabmeat with chives and 1 tablespoon vinaigrette in a third small bowl.
Put each metal ring in center of a salad plate.
Divide crab mixture between them, pressing down on it lightly with your fingertips.
Toss lettuces with fennel mixture and divide between rings, pressing slightly without flattening tops.
Drizzle remaining vinaigrette and remaining tablespoon oil around plates.
Remove rings before serving.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Grind the fennel seeds and salt in a coffee/spice grinder.
3. Grind the black pepper in a spice grinder or using a pepper mill.
4. In a large bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, and ground fennel seeds and salt.
5. Add the fennel bulb to the bowl, and toss to coat it evenly with the dressing.
6. Transfer the fennel mixture to a large, oven-safe baking dish.
7. Add the crabmeat to the dish, and toss to combine.
8. Roast the dish in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the crabmeat is cooked through and the fennel is tender.
9. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it cool slightly.
10. Using an adjustable-blade slicer, thinly slice the fennel and crab mixture.
11. In a large bowl, toss the baby lettuces with a pinch of salt and pepper.
12. In a small bowl, mix the chopped chives with a small amount of olive oil.
13. To assemble the salad, place a layer of fennel and crab mixture on the bottom of a large serving platter or individual entremet rings.
14. Drizzle the chive-infused olive oil over the top of the fennel and crab mixture.
15. Add a layer of baby lettuces on top of the fennel and crab mixture.
16. Repeat the layering process, alternating between the fennel and crab mixture and the baby lettuces.
17. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for up to 2 hours before serving.

[/INST]

This delightful Crab and Fennel Salad dish is a delicious and visually appealing combination of flavors and textures. The fennel provides a unique, slightly anise-like flavor, while the crab

gt:
Preheat oven to 350
Grease and flour a 9 or 10 inch iron skillet.
Mix 2 T sugar and 2 t cinnamon together and set aside.
Put flour, 1 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, vanilla, salt, eggs, and whipping cream together in large bowl.
Beat with mixer till well blended.
Pour in prepared skillet and bake 35 to 45 minutes.
When done turn our on wire rack, then over on cake plate.
Spread top generously with the 1/2 stick of butter and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
pred:
To cook a delicious Skillet Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add the eggs, whipping cream, and melted butter, and mix until smooth.
3. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
4. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
5. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
6. While the cake is cooling, prepare the frosting by combining the sugar, cinnamon, and whipping cream in a small mixing bowl.
7. Once the cake is fully cooled, use a spatula to spread the frosting evenly over the top.
8. Serve the Skillet Cake immediately, and enjoy the delicious dessert!

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 300.
Line a 9 x 13 roasting pan with foil, leaving enough extending over the sides to cover and seal in the roast.
Rinse the brisket and pat dry.
Rub with pickling spice and place in the prepared roasting pan.
Arrange celery, orange and onion slices on and around the roast.
pour in 1/2 cup of water and wrap foil up around and over the roast tightly, making sure the ends are sealed.
Bake for about 4 hours or until meat is tender.
About 45 minutes before time is up on the roast, heat 3 tablespoons margarine and 1/4 cup of water in large pot.
Add cabbage and apples, cover and simmer over low heat for about 30 minutes.
Occasionally shake the pot so that nothing sticks to the bottom.
Serve with remaining margarine and sliced corned beef.
pred:
To make a delicious My Favorite Corned Beef and Cabbage dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the corned beef brisket, pickling spices, and sliced orange. Add cold water to cover the ingredients, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 2 hours or until the corned beef is tender.

2. While the corned beef is cooking, prepare the cabbage by removing the core and slicing it into bite-sized pieces. In a separate pot, bring the cold water to a boil, add the sliced celery, and cook until the celery is tender.

3. After the corned beef is cooked, remove it from the pot and set it aside to cool. Once it's cool enough to handle, shred the meat into bite-sized pieces.

4. In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of margarine over medium heat. Add the shredded cabbage and cook until it's tender but still crisp.

5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded corned beef, cooked cabbage, sliced apple, and any remaining pickling spices. Mix well.

6. In a large pot, combine the remaining cold water, the remaining tablespoon of margarine, and the sliced onion. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the onion is tender.

7. Serve the corned beef and cabbage mixture over cooked noodles or rice, and enjoy your delicious My Favorite Corned Beef and Cabbage dish!

gt:
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Use chili as you would spaghetti sauce.
pred:
1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
2. Add the spaghetti to the boiling water and cook according to the package instructions until the pasta is al dente.
3. While the pasta is cooking, heat the chili in a separate pot on the stove.
4. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and set it aside.
5. Add the cooked spaghetti to the chili in the pot, stirring to combine the ingredients.
6. Serve the Chili-Ghetti hot, garnished with your choice of toppings, such as shredded cheese, sour cream, or crushed red pepper flakes.

Enjoy your delicious Chili-Ghetti!

gt:
Assemble salad.
Enjoy!
pred:
To prepare a delicious Pear & Walnut Salad With Balsamic Vinaigrette, follow these steps:

1. Gather the ingredients:
- 1 red pepper or 1 yellow pepper, sliced
- 1 pear, sliced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 12 cup walnuts
- 4 ounces feta cheese, crumbled
- 6 cups spring greens (such as spinach, arugula, or mixed greens)
- 12 cup balsamic vinaigrette
- pepper
- freshly ground black pepper

2. Prepare the vinaigrette:
Combine the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Whisk until well combined.

3. Prepare the salad:
In a large bowl, combine the sliced red pepper, pear, cherry tomatoes, and walnuts.

4. Add the crumbled feta cheese and spring greens to the bowl.

5. Drizzle the balsamic vinaigrette over the salad, tossing to coat evenly.

6. Season with pepper and freshly ground black pepper to taste.

7. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This delicious Pear & Walnut Salad With Balsamic Vinaigrette is a healthy and flavorful dish that can be enjoyed as a main course or a side. The combination of the sweet pear, tangy red pepper, and crunchy walnuts creates a delightful contrast of textures and flavors. The feta cheese adds a creamy, slightly tangy element, while the balsamic vinaigrette provides a zesty, slightly sweet dressing that complements the other ingredients perfectly.

gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Mix graham crumbs, butter and 2 Tbsp.
sugar; press onto bottom and up side of 9-inch pie plate.
Bake 8 to 10 min.
or until lightly browned.
Meanwhile, peel and pit mango; place in blender.
Add sour cream; blend until smooth.
Transfer to medium bowl.
Whisk in Cool Whip.
Add boiling water to jelly powder in large bowl; stir 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Add enough ice to cold water to measure 1/2 cup.
Add to jelly; stir until slightly thickened.
Remove any unmelted ice.
Add mango mixture to jelly; whisk until blended.
Refrigerate 20 to 30 min.
or until thick enough to mound.
Pour jelly mixture into crust.
Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, sugar, and graham crumbs until well combined. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
3. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool completely.
4. In a large bowl, mix the mango, sour cream, and Jell-O powder until well combined.
5. In a small saucepan, heat the boiling water and add the ice cubes. Stir until the ice cubes have melted and the mixture is smooth.
6. Pour the mango mixture over the cooled crust and smooth the top with a spatula.
7. Refrigerate the pie for at least 2 hours or until the filling is set.
8. In a small bowl, beat the cold water and Cool Whip until well combined. Spread the whipped topping over the pie.
9. Refrigerate the pie for at least 2 hours or until the whipped topping is set.
10. Remove the pie from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for 15-20 minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Cook the wild rice according to the directions on the package.
Wild rice generally takes 55-60 minutes to cook.
While thats cooking, in a large soup pot, melt the butter and saute the leeks, carrots, celery, mushrooms, garlic and thyme on medium high heat.
Cook for about 15 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened, stirring occasionally.
Add the flour and stir until blended into the vegetables.
Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, cover, turn the heat down to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
At the 30 minute point, add the wild rice, chives and cooked and diced chicken.
Stir in the cream, half-n-half and sherry.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the diced leek and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the carrots, celery, and mushrooms, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic, thyme, and flour, stirring to combine. Cook for 1 minute, then gradually add the chicken broth, stirring constantly.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
5. Add the diced chicken, heavy cream, half-and-half, dry sherry, salt, and pepper, stirring to combine. Simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the soup has thickened.
6. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup hot, garnished with fresh chives if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Using a sharp knife, cut a series of parallel slashes 1/2 inch deep in the ham.
Cut slashes in the opposite direction, forming a nice cross-hatch pattern on the surface of the ham.
Rub with oil and sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
Prepare your cooker for indirect cooking at 275 degrees F, using maple or pecan wood for flavor.
Put the ham in the cooker, and cook until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the ham reads 150 degrees F. This should take about 1 hour 45 minutes to 2 hours 45 minutes.
In a bowl, stir together the barbecue sauce with the brown sugar.
Using a pastry brush, glaze the ham with all the sauce.
Continue cooking the ham until the thermometer reads 160 degrees F. This should take about another 15 minutes, for a total cooking time of 2 to 3 hours.
Remove from the cooker and let rest, loosely tented with foil, for 15 minutes.
Slice and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Place the ham in a roasting pan or a large baking dish.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the canola oil, Big-Time Barbecue Sauce, and brown sugar.
4. Pour the sauce mixture over the ham, making sure it is evenly coated.
5. Roast the ham in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 140°F (60°C).
6. Remove the ham from the oven and let it rest for 15-20 minutes before slicing it.
7. Serve the Double-Smoked Ham Recipe hot, with your favorite side dishes.

Note: The Big-Time Barbecue Sauce can be found in the Game Plan section.

gt:
Prepare Buttery Toffee Cookies as directed.
Line inside of 9-inch square pan with plastic food wrap, extending wrap over edges of pan.
Combine all crust ingredients in bowl.
Press onto bottom of prepared pan.
Combine all mousse ingredients in bowl.
Beat at high speed, scraping bowl often, until stiff peaks form.
Cover; refrigerate.
Spread 3 cups ice cream over crust.
Spread half of mousse over ice cream.
Freeze 20-30 minutes or until set.
Spread remaining ice cream over mousse.
Top with remaining mousse.
Cover; freeze 4 hours or until set.
Remove dessert from pan.
Cut into individual servings; sprinkle each with unsweetened cocoa, if desired.
Store in freezer.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed cookies, melted butter, and whipping cream. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the powdered sugar, cocoa, and vanilla, and mix until smooth.
4. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly gooey.
6. Allow the dessert to cool completely before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Toffee Crunch Dessert!

gt:
heat skillet on med-high
spread butter/margarine on one side of each slice of bread, as you would with toast
spray hot skillet with non-stick cooking spray
place each slice of bread on skillet, butter/margarine side down
top each slice of bread with one slice of cheese
squirt mustard on one slice and dashes of oregano on the other
with spatula, pick up one slice and place it on the other, creating a sandwich
continue to cook until outside is golden brown and cheese is melted, flipping occasionally to cook each side evenly
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread a thin layer of butter or margarine on one side of each slice of bread.
3. Place the bread slices with the buttered sides facing each other.
4. Spread a thin layer of yellow mustard on one side of the bread slices.
5. Place the American cheese slices on top of the mustard-covered bread slices.
6. Spray the non-stick spray on the top side of the bread slices with cheese.
7. Sprinkle a pinch of dried oregano on top of the cheese.
8. Place the bread slices with the buttered sides facing up in a preheated oven.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Carefully flip the bread slices over and continue baking for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is fully melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
12. Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters and serve immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Blend all in a food processor.
Serve with apple slices.
Enjoy!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, brown sugar, and vanilla extract.
3. Using an electric mixer, beat the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. Add the apple slices to the bowl and mix until well coated.
5. Transfer the apple mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the apples are tender and the dip is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the warm Apple Dip immediately, or let it cool and then refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Yummy Apple Dip!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Lightly spray a 9X13 baking pan.
Pour in fruit salad with liquid and pie filling.
Mix together.
Sprinkle cake mix over top evenly.
Top with nuts.
Drizzle butter over it all.
Top with coconut.
Bake, uncovered, 50-60 minutes.
Enjoy as is or serve with a mango sorbet.
* I used a mixture of pineapple, papaya(red and yellow), and guava in passion fruit juice.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with melted butter.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lemon cake mix, chopped pecans, and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the cherry pie filling and fruit salad to the mixture, and stir until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
6. Sprinkle the flaked coconut evenly over the top of the cake mixture.
7. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Trim fat from chops.
Combine juice and next 4 ingredients in a bowl; stir well.
Combine breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning, paprika, and dash of garlic powder in a shallow dish; stir well.
Dip chops in juice mixture, and dredge in breadcrumbs mixture.
Place chops on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until tender, turning after 25 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the pineapple juice, soy sauce, ginger, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, paprika, and a dash of garlic powder.
3. Season the pork chops with salt and pepper on both sides.
4. In a large bowl, whisk the egg white until it forms soft peaks.
5. Dip the pork chops in the egg white mixture, then coat them with the breadcrumb mixture.
6. Heat the cooking spray in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork chops and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
7. Remove the pork chops from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
8. Spray the pork chops with the cooking spray and place them in the preheated oven. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
9. Remove the pork chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The cooking process involves several steps, including preheating the oven, preparing the marinade, coating the pork chops, cooking them in a skillet, and finally baking them in the oven. The dish is a delicious combination of flavors, with the pineapple juice and soy sauce adding a sweet and savory taste, while the ginger, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning provide a spicy and aromatic kick. The egg white coating on the pork chops ensures a crispy exterior, while the breadcrumbs add a satisfying crunch.

gt:
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in cumin, ginger, and cinnamon and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Stir tomato soup, coconut milk, and diced tomatoes into the onion mixture and cook until soup is heated through, about 10 minutes.
pred:
To make a delicious Spiced Tomato Soup dish, follow these steps:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the ground cumin, ground ginger, and ground cinnamon, stirring to combine. Cook for another 1-2 minutes.
4. Pour in the canned condensed tomato soup and the canned light coconut milk. Stir to combine.
5. Add the diced tomatoes, and bring the mixture to a simmer. Cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the soup has thickened slightly.
6. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Spiced Tomato Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream or a sprinkle of freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.

This delicious Spiced Tomato Soup can be enjoyed as a warm, comforting meal or as a light lunch or dinner. The combination of the rich tomato flavor, creamy coconut milk, and spices creates a delightful and satisfying dish.

gt:
In large dutch oven brown chicken legs, seasoned with salt and pepper and celery salt, in olive oil over med-high heat turning often with the lid on.
Remove legs and take off skin, place chicken legs back in pot and add onion and garlic and let sweat until just translucent.
Deglaze pot with wine for 2 minutes (being sure to scrape bottom of pot to remove bits) add carrots, then turn heat down to medium cook until wine becomes thick.
Pour in tomatoes and sauce and add spices.
Reduce heat and simmer for minimum hour to 2 hours.
Serve over favorite pasta along side a large garden salad and garlic bread.
Top dish with freshly grated romano or parmesan cheese.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced carrots and cook until they are tender.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent.
5. Add the chicken legs, crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, merlot, and oregano. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 1 hour.
7. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Transfer the contents of the pot to a large baking dish.
9. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour.
10. Remove the foil and continue to bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
11. Serve the Spaghetti Legs over a bed of cooked spaghetti.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray both sides of tortillas with cooking spray; place in single layer on baking sheet.
Bake 10 minutes or until crisp and lightly browned.
Meanwhile, bring water to boil in large saucepan.
Stir in rice; cover.
Remove from heat; let stand 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken, corn and barbecue sauce.
Return to medium heat; cook and stir 5 minutes or until heated through.
Spoon evenly onto tortillas; sprinkle with cheese.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the chicken, cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the corn, water, instant white rice, and KRAFT Barbecue Sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the chicken is tender.
6. While the rice and chicken cook, prepare the tostadas by cutting the flour tortillas into 4 equal pieces.
7. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat. Place the tortilla pieces in the skillet and cook until they are crispy, flipping them halfway through the cooking process.
8. Once the tortillas are crispy, remove them from the skillet and place them on a plate.
9. To assemble the tostadas, place a portion of the cooked chicken and rice mixture on top of each crispy tortilla.
10. Top each tostada with a generous amount of KRAFT Shredded Cheddar Cheese.
11. Place the tostadas in the preheated oven and bake for 5-7 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Serve the BBQ Chicken & Rice Tostadas immediately.

Enjoy your delicious BBQ Chicken & Rice Tostadas!

gt: Blend ice cubes, banana, yogurt, pumpkin, cinnamon, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.
pred:
[INST]
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including 8 ice cubes, a banana, yogurt, pumpkin puree, ground cinnamon, and ground ginger.
2. In a blender, combine the ice cubes and yogurt until smooth.
3. Add the pumpkin puree and ground cinnamon, and blend until smooth.
4. Finally, add the ground ginger and blend until well combined.
5. Pour the smoothie into two glasses and enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Pie Smoothie for 2!

[/INST]

gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl until completely dissolved.
Add ice; stir until gelatin starts to thicken.
Remove any unmelted ice.
Add whipped topping; stir with wire whisk until blended.
Refrigerate 20 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Stir in pie filling; spoon into glass bowl or 12 champagne glasses.
Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm.
Store leftovers in refrigerator.
pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the boiling water and JELL-O Cherry Flavor Gelatin. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the ice cubes to the mixture, stirring continuously to prevent the mixture from becoming too thick.
3. Once the ice cubes have melted, add the COOL WHIP Whipped Topping and stir until fully combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a large, clear container or a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Drain the cherry pie filling and pour it over the top of the gelatin mixture.
6. Cover the container or baking dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
7. Once the mixture has set, use a spatula to carefully scoop it out into individual serving bowls.
8. Serve and enjoy your Cherry Celebration!

gt:
Combine the milk and vanilla beans (I used vanilla essence this time) in a saucepan.
Heat over low to medium heat.
Please be careful not to boil.
Meanwhile mix the egg yolks in a bowl.
Add the sugar and mix well.
Then add the cake flour.
Combine well until similar to the consistency in this picture.
Gradually pour in the warm milk while stirring.
Now pour this mixture into the saucepan and warm over medium heat.
Keep stirring until thickened.
Keep heating for a while even after the mixture thickens to remove any flour smell.
Once mixture looks like this picture, remove from the heat.
Then add butter and combine.
Transfer this to a tray, cover tightly with plastic wrap, and cool.
If you add a little bit of whipped cream to the cooled custard cream, it becomes 'diplomat cream'.
It has a lighter texture, so it's ideal for cream puffs.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, sugar, and cake flour until smooth.
2. Gradually add the milk, whisking continuously until the mixture is smooth and free of lumps.
3. Add the vanilla beans or vanilla essence and whisk until well combined.
4. Place the bowl over a saucepan of simmering water (bain-marie) and cook the mixture, stirring constantly, until it thickens and coats the back of a spoon. This should take around 10-15 minutes.
5. Remove the bowl from the saucepan and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Add the unsalted butter, one piece at a time, stirring until it is fully incorporated.
7. Pour the custard mixture into a clean, dry saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a spoon. This should take around 5-10 minutes.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the custard cool for a few minutes.
9. Pour the custard into a clean, dry container and refrigerate it for at least 2 hours or overnight.
10. Once the custard has chilled, use a spatula to scoop it into a serving dish and refrigerate it for at least 2 hours or overnight.
11. Serve the custard cream just like custard pudding, garnished with whipped cream, if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Prepare lettuce by carefully removing each leaf from the base of the head.
Rinse the leaves in a salad spinner, then place leaves cupped side down on a clean dry towel to completely dry.
For the croutons: Cut two whole hamburger buns, English muffins or whatever bread you have on hand, into 1/2 cubes.
In a small skillet over low heat, melt a few tablespoons butter.
Add bread cubes and toss to coat with butter.
Increase heat to medium and cook for approximately 10-12 minutes, until crispy, adding a few more tablespoons butter half way through cooking.
While croutons are frying up, brown meat in a large skillet over medium heat.
When its browned, drain excess grease.
Add ketchup, mayonnaise and mustard and mix to combine.
Add salt and pepper as desired.
Taste and add more ketchup, mayo or mustard if needed.
Keep warm.
Assemble lettuce wraps by spooning meat mixture down the middle of each leaf and top with pickle, cheese, tomato, onion and croutons.
fold edges of lettuce around mixture as you bite in and thoroughly enjoy!
!
pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and dry the lettuce, tomatoes, onion, and dill pickle. Grate the cheese.
2. Cook the ground beef or turkey: Cook the ground beef or turkey in a large skillet over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain off any excess fat.
3. Prepare the wraps: Spread a thin layer of mayonnaise or Miracle Whip on one side of the English muffin or bread.
4. Assemble the wraps: Place the cooked ground beef or turkey on one side of the English muffin or bread, then top it with the grated cheese, diced tomatoes, and sliced onion.
5. Wrap it up: Place the other side of the English muffin or bread with the mayonnaise or Miracle Whip on it over the filling, creating a sandwich-like structure.
6. Serve: Cut the sandwich into bite-sized pieces and serve immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
They are ingredients.

(I used "Disaronno" this time.)
Put sponge fingers in a container.
Using tablespoon, pour strong coffee on the sponge fingers.
Mix mascarpone with spatula until it becomes smooth.
Add egg yolk and 1 tbsp sugar, mix well.
Beat egg white until it becomes white and bubbly.
Add 3 tbsp sugar and beat more to make firm meringue.
(Try to turn the bowl and if meringue is really firm like this, it's done.)
Add 1/3 meringue to mascarpone mixture (No.
4) and mix well with spatula.
Then move this mixture to melange bowl and mix well.
Place mixture in the container.
Using tea strainer (or flour shifter), shift cocoa powder on the mixture until it's all covered.
Place it in fridge for 1-2 hours and buon appetito!

pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Mascarpone cheese, sugar, and egg. Whisk until smooth and well-combined.
2. Preheat your oven to 150°C (300°F).
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
4. Spread the Mascarpone mixture evenly over the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake the Mascarpone mixture in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until it is set and slightly golden brown.
6. Remove the baked Mascarpone mixture from the oven and let it cool completely.
7. Meanwhile, prepare the sponge fingers by dipping them into the strong coffee and allowing them to absorb the coffee.
8. Once the Mascarpone mixture is cooled, carefully fold in the sponge fingers.

10. Chill the Tiramisu mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
11. Once chilled, transfer the Tiramisu mixture to a serving dish and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your homemade Tiramisu!

gt:
shred cabbage and carrot,place in large bowl.
Chop apricots,walnuts and hazelnuts roughly,add parsley, raisins,cranberries and grapes.
In separte bowl mix yogurt and mayonnaise, season with salt and pepper.Add the mayonnaise mixture to cabbage and toss together.
Cool for at least one hour.
my idea and creation, I serve this often with prawns .
pred:
1. Wash and peel the large carrot.
2. Cut the carrot into thin matchstick-like strips.
3. In a large bowl, combine the carrot strips, dried apricots, raisins, cranberries, green or black grapes, hazelnuts, and walnuts.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the light mayonnaise, natural yogurt, salt, and black pepper.
5. Pour the dressing over the fruit and nut mixture and toss to coat evenly.
6. Add the white cabbage to the bowl and toss again to combine all the ingredients.
7. Refrigerate the coleslaw for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

Sig's Fruit and Nut Coleslaw is a delicious and healthy side dish that combines the crunchy texture of the carrot strips with the sweetness of the dried fruits and grapes, the tanginess of the cranberries, and the nutty flavors of the nuts. The light mayonnaise and natural yogurt dressing adds a creamy and slightly tangy taste, while the salt and black pepper provide a subtle kick. This versatile dish can be served at various occasions, from picnics to potlucks, and can be easily customized with different fruits and nuts to suit individual preferences.

gt:
Shape the beef into 4 (1/2-inch-thick) burgers.
Lightly oil the grill rack and heat the grill to medium.
Grill the burgers for 10 minutes for medium or to desired doneness, turning the burgers over once halfway through grilling.
Heat the soup and hot sauce in a 1-quart saucepan over medium heat to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low.
Cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Top the burgers with the soup mixture.
Sprinkle with the cheese.
Serve the burgers on the buns with the lettuce, onion and tomato, if desired.
Tip: Any leftover soup mixture can also be a great dipping sauce for French fries.
Serving Suggestion: Serve with carrot and celery sticks with ranch dressing for dipping.
For dessert serve chocolate chip cookies topped with vanilla ice cream.Using Campbell's Condensed Tomato Soup: Vitamin A 9%DV, Vitamin C 6%DV, Calcium 17%DV, Iron 23%DV
pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, Campbell's Condensed Tomato Soup, hot sauce, and blue cheese until well combined.
3. Form the mixture into four equal-sized patties.
4. Place the patties on the grill or grill pan, and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F (71°C).
5. While the burgers are cooking, prepare the buns by spreading mayonnaise on both sides.
6. Once the burgers are cooked, place them on the buns, and top with red onion slices.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy your Buffalo Burgers!

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Preheat a skillet to medium heat.
Add pepperoni and cook for 5 minutes until slightly crisp and fat has rendered.
Set aside.
In a bowl, combine cream cheese, mozzarella, garlic powder, and half the Parmesan.
Spread mixture in a shallow baking dish (8x8 or smaller).
Spread tomato sauce over the cheese mixture, then sprinkle on remaining Parmesan and prepared pepperoni.
Bake dip for 2030 minutes until hot, bubbly, and browned on top.
Serve with dippers, and eat immediately while hot.
Enjoy!
pred:
To create a delicious Pizza Dip using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced pepperoni, chopped cream cheese, and grated mozzarella cheese. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Add the garlic powder, Parmesan cheese, and tomato sauce to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. If desired, add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet or a pizza stone.
6. Bake the Pizza Dip in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the Pizza Dip from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Slice the Pizza Dip into equal portions and serve on crackers or pita bread.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Pizza Dip!

gt:
Prepare stuffing: In 2 quart saucepan, over medium heat, melt butter; add zucchini and cook till tender, about 2 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove from heat.
To the zucchini add the bread; stir in the eggs, cheese, pepper and salt.
Carefully loosen the skin on each of the breasts by pushing fingers between skin and meat to form a pocket.
Spoon some stuffing into each pocket.
Place chicken in baking pan and bake@ 350 degrees for 50 minutes or till fork tender.
Remove chicken from baking pan to serving platter.
Brush with the warmed honey and sprinkle with salt.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the shredded zucchini, bread, egg, and seasonings (pepper and salt).
3. Place the chicken breasts in the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the zucchini mixture.
4. Spread the honey evenly over the chicken breasts.
5. Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.
7. Serve the chicken with the honey-glazed sauce and enjoy your delicious Elegant Stuffed Chicken.

gt:
Add the items to your slow cooker and stir.
In the small cooker it only took 4 hours on high, which could easily be stretched out to 8 hours on low.
Keep an eye on the water content -- it may need more water or broth added depending on your cooker.
pred:
1. Preheat your slow cooker on high for 10 minutes.
2. In a large bowl, combine the diced onion, celery, carrot, and split peas.
3. Add the Braggs liquid aminos, garlic, and Thai curry paste to the bowl. Mix well.
4. Add the vegetable stock, water, vinegar, dried fenugreek leaves, bay leaf, and lime leaves to the bowl. Stir to combine.
5. Place the bowl in the slow cooker and cook on low for 8 hours.
6. After 8 hours, add the light coconut milk and stir. Cook for an additional 30 minutes.
7. Remove the bay leaf and lime leaves before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Thai Twist Slow Cooker Vegetarian Split Pea Soup!

gt:
Mix seasoning together and store in airtight container for up to 6 months.
In medium bowl, beat eggs with water.
Add enough hot sauce so mixture is bright orange.
In another bowl, combine flour and pepper.
Season chicken with house seasoning.
You can let the chicken sit in hot sauce for up to 1 hour.
It will not make the chicken spicy.
Dip Chicken in egg and coat well with flour mix.
Heat oil to 300 degrees in deep pot.
Don't fill pot more than half full of oil.
Fry chicken in oil until brown and crispy.
Dark meat goes in first and takes 13-14 minutes.
White meat takes 8-10 minutes.
Preparation depends on how long you let the chicken soak in hot sauce.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, water, hot red pepper sauce, pepper, and self-rising flour.
3. Add the chicken pieces to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the marinade.
4. Heat the peanut or vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Carefully place the chicken pieces into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook the chicken until it is golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and place it on a wire rack or a plate lined with paper towels to drain any excess oil.
7. Return the skillet to the heat and add the salt and garlic powder. Cook for a few seconds until fragrant, then pour the marinade mixture over the chicken.
8. Return the chicken to the skillet, cover, and cook in the oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
9. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The cooking procedure for Paula Deens Fried Chicken involves several steps, starting with preheating the oven to 350°F (175°C) and preparing the marinade by whisking together eggs, water, hot red pepper sauce, pepper, and self-rising flour. Next, the chicken pieces are coated with the marinade, and the skillet is heated with oil. The chicken is carefully placed in the hot oil, cooked until golden brown, removed, and drained. The skillet is then used to cook the marinade mixture, and the chicken is returned to the skillet and cooked in the oven for 30-40 minutes. Finally, the chicken is removed from the oven, allowed to rest, and served.

gt:
Grease a 12x23 cm loaf tin.
(And grease it well.)
Sprinkle sides and base with sugar.
Beat eggs until pale and fluffy.
Slowly add sugar.
Fold in flour and baking powder.
Pour into prepared tin.
Sprinkle extra sugar on top.
Bake at 180 degrees Celsius (350 F.) for 35-40 minutes until top is golden and crunchy and the loaf is cooked through.
Remove from tin and cool on wire rack.

[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar, and baking powder until well combined.
3. Add the flour to the mixture and stir until smooth.
4. Grease a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan with cooking spray or butter.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
