gt:
In a medium bowl, stir all ingredients together gently, cover and refrigerate for at least an hour.
Serve with tortilla chips, sturdy crackers or in a pita sandwich.
My favorite variation: omit zucchini and add 1 diced, firm but ripe avocado and 1/4 cup chopped cilantro.
pred:
To make a delicious Feta Salsa dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the whole zucchini into bite-sized pieces and toss them in a bowl with a drizzle of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread them out on a baking sheet and roast for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
3. While the zucchini is roasting, chop the diced tomatoes into smaller pieces.
4. In a large bowl, combine the roasted zucchini, diced tomatoes, crumbled feta cheese, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine all ingredients.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
6. Serve the Feta Salsa immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

This dish is a delicious and healthy side dish or appetizer, perfect for gatherings or as a topping for sandwiches or wraps. The combination of the roasted zucchini, crumbled feta cheese, and tangy balsamic vinegar creates a delightful flavor profile that is both refreshing and satisfying.

gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
In medium saucepan, bring the water and 1 teaspoon salt to a boil.
Add the cornmeal in a slow stream, whisking.
Whisk in tablespoon of the butter 1/4 teaspoon of the sage.
Reduce the heat and simmer, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon, until vey thick, about 20 minutes.
Stir in 3 tablespoons of the Parmesan.
Meanwhile, butter an 8"x12" baking dish.
In a large frying pan, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter and 1 tablespoon of the oil over moderately high heat.
Add half the mushrooms, 1/2 of garlic 1/4 tsp each of the salt and sage and 1/4 tsp of the pepper.
Cook, stirring frequently until the mushrooms are golden, about 5 minutes.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining mushrooms, salt, garlic, salt, sage and pepper.
Pour half the polenta into the baking dish and spread in an even layer.
Top with half the mushrooms, followed by half of the Fontina and 2 tablespoons of the Parmesan.
Repeat with remaining polenta, mushrooms, Fontina and Parmesan.
Bake until cheese is bubbling, about 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley.
pred:
[INST]To prepare Baked Polenta With Mushrooms, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the water or broth, salt, and cornmeal. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and comes to a boil.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the polenta is cooked through and has a creamy texture.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the olive oil, minced garlic, and dried sage. Allow the mixture to cool slightly.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the grated Fontina cheese, butter, and freshly ground black pepper.
6. Pour the cooled polenta mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Spread the cheese mixture evenly over the top of the polenta.
7. Bake the polenta in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the polenta is golden brown.
8. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
9. Garnish the dish with chopped fresh parsley leaves before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Baked Polenta With Mushrooms!

gt:
MIX together cereal and raisins.
STORE in air-tight container and send to school in air-tight bags.
pred:
To make a delicious Mix and Match Trail Mix dish, follow these steps:
1. Combine 1 cup of each letter-shaped sweetened oat and corn cereal, whole wheat cereal squares, and honeycomb-shaped sweetened corn and oat cereal in a large bowl.
2. Add 1 cup of raisins or other dried fruit to the bowl.
3. Mix the ingredients thoroughly to ensure even distribution of the cereals, dried fruit, and sweeteners.
4. Optionally, you can add nuts, seeds, or other desired ingredients to the mix for added texture and flavor.
5. Serve the Mix and Match Trail Mix dish as a healthy and delicious snack or dessert.

This dish is a fun and creative way to enjoy a variety of cereals and dried fruits, while also incorporating the letter-shaped sweetened cereals for a fun and engaging presentation.

gt:
Preheat the oven to 180 degrees C (350 degrees F).
For the apples: Peel, core and slice your apples.
Try to get them relatively uniform so they will all cook at the same speed.
Put the apples in the bottom of a baking dish with the cranberries, sugar and a pinch of ginger.
Mix to combine.
For the topping: Rub together the flour, butter and sugar until you have something that resembles breadcrumbs.
Sprinkle on top of the fruit.
Bake for 30-40 minutes until golden brown.
Serve warm with ice cream and/or custard.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the apples, then cut them into small, even-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the apples, cranberries, sugar, ginger, and flour.
4. Add the butter to the bowl and mix until the ingredients are well combined and the butter is evenly distributed.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) square baking dish.
6. Bake the crumble in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the crumble is golden brown and the apples are tender.
7. Serve the Apple and Cranberry Crumble warm, garnished with a dusting of powdered sugar if desired.

[/SYS]

gt:
Bring a large pot of water to boil.
Add the pasta and salt the water.
Cook the pasta until al dente, 6 to 7 minutes.
Heat a large deep skillet over low heat and add the olive oil.
When the olive oil is warm, add the garlic and red pepper flakes.
Turn off the heat and set the garlic aside for 5 minutes, then raise the heat to medium, add the wine and lemon zest and boil to reduce the wine by half, about 3 minutes.
When the pasta is just about cooked, add a ladle of starchy pasta cooking water to the skillet with the sauce and stir in the heavy cream.
When the cream is warmed through, whisk the lemon juice into the sauce and season with salt.
Drain the pasta and toss with the sauce, then let the pasta stand for 1 minute so it can soak up a little of the sauce.
Toss with the parsley, basil and cheese.
Serve immediately.
pred:
To make a delicious Rachael Ray's Mamacello Pasta dish, follow these steps:

1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until it reaches the desired tenderness.

2. In a large skillet, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.

3. Add the crushed red pepper flakes and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.

4. Pour in the dry white wine and let it cook down until it has reduced by half.

5. Add the lemon juice and zest to the skillet, stirring to combine.

6. Add the heavy cream to the skillet and stir to combine.

7. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

8. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet and toss to combine with the sauce.

9. Season the dish with grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese, and adjust the seasoning as needed.

10. Serve the Rachael Ray's Mamacello Pasta dish immediately, garnished with fresh parsley and basil.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat panini grill.
Spread 1 bread slice with mayo.
Fill both bread slices with all remaining ingredients except oil.
Brush outside of sandwich with oil.
Grill 2 to 3 min.
or until sandwich is golden brown and cheese is melted.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Lightly toast the two slices of Italian bread.
3. Spread a thin layer of KRAFT Mayo with Olive Oil Reduced Fat Mayonnaise on one side of each slice of bread.
4. Place the toasted bread slices on a baking sheet.
5. Top each slice of bread with a generous amount of baby spinach leaves.
6. Add the four slices of OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Oven Roasted Turkey Breast on top of the spinach leaves.
7. Sprinkle the roasted red pepper strips over the turkey.
8. Add a slice of KRAFT Big Slice Colby Jack Cheese Slice on top of the turkey.
9. Drizzle olive oil over the top of the cheese slice.
10. Bake the bread slices in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into halves or quarters.
12. Serve the Bistro Panini immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
In a large pot, heat olive oil.
Add the garlic and onion, cook until soft about 5 minutes.
Add the kale and saute, stirring, cook until wilted about 2 minutes.
Stir in the broth, chick peas and tomatoes, herbs, salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Divide among the serving bowls.
Top with chopped cilantro leaves.
Serve warm with naan bread or any kind of crusty bread.
pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and onions, and cook until the onions are softened and translucent.
3. Add the chopped kale and cook until it has wilted, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the stock vegetable, chickpeas, tomatoes, and Italian seasoning. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chickpeas are tender and the flavors have melded together.
6. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly chopped cilantro.

[/INST]

1. Heat the oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and onions, and cook until the onions are softened and translucent. This step helps to create a flavorful base for the soup.
2. Add the chopped kale and cook until it has wilted, about 5 minutes. This step ensures that the kale is tender and adds a nutritious element to the soup.
3. Add the stock vegetable, chickpeas, tomatoes, and Italian seasoning. Stir to combine. The stock vegetable provides the necessary liquid for the soup, while the chickpeas and tomatoes contribute to the flavor and texture.

gt:
Preheat your oven to 375 F.
Wash and dry your chops.
Salt and pepper one side and sprinkle the smoked paprika evenly over both chops on the same side.
Rub in the seasonings.
Warm the olive oil in a small oven-safe skillet.
Add butter and turn up the heat to medium-high.
When butter stops sizzling, add the chops, seasoned side down.
Brown the chops on that side for about 3 minutes.
While the chops are browning, season the top side with salt and pepper.
Turn chops over.
After 2 minutes, drain grease out of the pan, add the wine and sprinkle the trail mix on top along with the red chili flakes, distributing evenly.
Put the skillet in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes.
Then test the meat with an instant meat thermometer.
It should be at 145 to 150 F before removing the skillet from the oven.
Remove the chops to a platter, scraping all the goodness on top.
Let them sit for 5 -10 minutes and the temperature will increase to the perfect degree of doneness.
Garnish with the cilantro and serve with love!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the pork chops with salt and pepper, then coat them with olive oil and butter.
3. In a small bowl, mix the sweet smoked Spanish paprika, red chili pepper flakes, cilantro, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Spread the spice mixture evenly over the pork chops, then place them in a baking dish.
5. Pour the dry red wine over the pork chops, and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the pork is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
6. While the pork chops are baking, prepare the apple trail mix by combining the ingredients in a large bowl.
7. Once the pork chops are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. Slice the pork chops into thin pieces and serve them over the apple trail mix.
9. Enjoy your savory Chili Chocolate Pork Chops dish!

[/INST]

gt:
Melt butter, brown sugar and Karo over medium heat in a small saucepan.
Stir until smooth.
Pour mixture in a 13x9 casserole dish.
Place bread on top, squeezing it in if you need.
Whisk eggs, half and half, vanilla, Grand Marnier and salt in a large bowl until combined.
Pour mix evenly over bread.
Chill in the fridge overnight.
In the morning: LET CASSEROLE COME TO ROOM TEMPERATURE!
Preheat oven to 350F.
Bake uncovered 35-45 minutes.
Edges will be puffed and golden.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, half-and-half, vanilla extract, Grand Marnier, and salt.
3. Dip each slice of French bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides evenly.
4. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the bread slices in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
6. Remove the bread slices from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
8. Add the brown sugar and stir until it has melted and combined with the butter.
9. Pour the melted butter and sugar mixture over the cooled bread slices.
10. Return the bread slices to the oven and bake for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the topping is bubbly and golden brown.
11. Remove the bread slices from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
12. Using a fork, carefully scrape the top layer of the topping off the bread slices.
13. Return the bread slices to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the topping is bubbly and caramelized.
14. Remove the bread slices from the oven and let them cool completely.

[/INST]

gt:
Mix all ingredients until well blended; cover.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.
Serve with crackers or assorted cut-up fresh vegetables.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the sour cream, shrimp, green onions, horseradish sauce, cocktail sauce, and hot pepper sauce. Mix well.
2. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
3. Serve the Bayou Shrimp Dip with crackers or pita chips.

This recipe is a delicious and easy way to enjoy a creamy, spicy, and flavorful shrimp dip. The combination of sour cream, shrimp, green onions, horseradish sauce, cocktail sauce, and hot pepper sauce creates a unique and satisfying dip that can be enjoyed at parties or gatherings.

gt:
Mix all burger ingredients together, cuting up large pieces of mango in the chutney.
Form into four burgers.
Grill, broil or pan fry to medium well.
Mix together topping ingredients, cutting up large pieces of mango in the chutney.
Top burgers and enjoy.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix together the ground turkey, panko breadcrumbs, mango chutney, sour cream, monterey jack cheese, Dijon mustard, chili powder, salt, and mango chutney.
2. Shape the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.
3. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and cook the turkey burgers for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
4. Serve the turkey burgers on buns, and enjoy your delicious Turkey Burgers With a Twist!
